story:
WE BELIEVE IN PROVIDING SERVICE TO UNDERPRIVILEGED CHILDREN SEEKING HIGHER EDUCATION, IMPROVING THE STATUS OF SINGLE PARENT HOMES, PROVIDING HOUSING FOR THE HOMELESS, FEEDING THE HUNGRY AND MAKING AN IMPACT ON THE WORLD IN A POSITIVE WAY.

THE WAY WE MAKE OUR REVENUE IS THROUGH T-SHIRT SALES, MEMBERSHIPS, PUBLIC SPEAKING ENGAGEMENTS, DEVELOPING LEADERS AND MANAGERS OF EVERY SORT.

OUR APPAREL IS KNOWN IN DIFFERENT COUNTRIES AROUND THE WORLD FROM PUERTO RICO, ECUADOR, MEXICO, SPAIN, CANADA, AMSTERDAM AND MALAYSIA.


"RICHT" Project App

Imagine having missions, goals, upgrades and getting paid to play? Through this app, you can keep track of your progress for each level completed, while improving your real life! Today is your day to join an experience that is changing the world and how we live. The "RICHT" project consist of various activities that include helping others, promoting a healthy lifestyle and being positive that allow you to explore outside of your realms. On top of that, once you succeed and make a difference you are paid real money! In order to develop the app we need $15,000 in 32 days. This amount of money will allow us to finance the game, design the game, develop the proper team, develop a final product, help provide for single parent homes, children reaching higher education, homeless, hungry and distribute the game across the world!


How do we keep track of all the positive that you do?

Once you have completed a level, you will send us a picture and a quick note saying what you did, once you add the note, video or picture to the “RICHT”project app, our team looks it over and allows you to go to the next level. Every level has an opportunity to earn money.

How many levels will there be?

We currently have the “RICHT” project setup for 3-4 quadrants in health, fitness, personal development and acts of kindness with different levels.


How can I help?

We have package deals that allow us to not only bring you on board for the game, get you limited edition apparel and help the process but we will be able to coach you along the way, have meet and greets and get you VIP service here in Puerto Rico, depending on what package you pursue.

We currently have 12 packages available for you to purchase. The more money you spend for each package the more we invest in your reward, which helps you through the “RICHT” project. You have an opportunity to meet our team and contribute to the world.

Here’s how you can help: by purchasing a package, donating and telling friends, you know about this and partake in an adventure that is going to change you and the world we live in.

This project is a game changer, you will be surprised at how it changes your life in a positive manner. This game has the potential to test your ability to give back, help others,  adapt to culture, fitness and a healthy lifestyle. The end result will make you a better person from the inside.



1. *Creating the app

2.*PROVIDING SERVICE TO UNDERPRIVILEGED CHILDREN SEEKING HIGHER EDUCATION, IMPROVING THE STATUS OF SINGLE PARENT HOMES, PROVIDING HOUSING FOR THE HOMELESS, FEEDING THE HUNGRY AND MAKING AN IMPACT ON THE WORLD IN A POSITIVE WAY.

3. *Creating opportunity for employment

4. *Changing the world

Please share this concept with friends family and your social media networks. We are more likely to reach success with your help.

Thank you!

story:
Ever dreamed of playing a really awesome horror maze runner? A game where you are chased by horrifying monsters through realistic looking environments? So have we and that is exactly what we set out to create! The big difference being that we wanted to create a game that has a story arc, RPG elements, different enemies, and a larger world that contains various different horror environments. Here's what you can expect:


  • Engaging & suspenseful story arc.  
  • Different enemies with different attack/movement patterns in each level.
  • Huge procedural levels
  • Fun gameplay mechanics. 
  • RPG elements 
  • Compatible with Oculus Rift (not needed to play the game though). 
  • Extras (art gallery from super talented concept artists around the industry, story archives, and more!).  
  • Amazing soundtrack by Jake Kaufman
  • USB controller support for PC users

*All images are from a pre-alpha build and are not representative of final work.*



So the big question: Why are we bringing this game to IndieGoGo and asking for money? We have been self-funding the game for awhile, but the scope of the game has grown beyond what we can afford. We've gone as far as we can with our own money (which was actually pretty far) and need just a bit more to guarantee a quality game. 

The main areas we need the additional funding for are multiplayer and character animation. Naturally, the most talented contractors cost more. Every cent of money contributed will be going towards speeding up development and making the game look and play better.

Here's a brief list of how successful funding would allow us to improve the game:

  • Top quality animation - We have a couple of awesomely talented animators from the Bioshock Infinite team that would like to help out. We need more money to pay them. 
  • More platforms - In addition to PC/PS4/Vita/WiiU, we also want to bring the game to Xbox One, Mac, Linux, and mobile. Additional funding makes that possible.
  • More levels - More levels to play with new monsters!
  • Local and Online Multiplayer- Compete for shards with other players in arenas filled with monsters. Find power ups to become a monster or create traps to kill off the competition. Who will survive?

Risks & Challenges

As with all games, there is the risk that problems could arise at any point during the final stretch of development. These problems could involve technical issues, earthquakes, sudden untimely/horrifying death, etc. Such problems, should they occur, could delay the release of Dark Deception.

In all seriousness, rest assured, we will never abandon Dark Deception or leave it in an unfinished state. We have been working on this game for a year. We have put too much of our time, sweat, and passion into the project. We've also put a lot of our own money to prove our dedication to seeing this game through. Thanks to our previous experience in the industry, we know how to stay focused, hit our milestones, and not waste a lot of time in iterative loops that do not make the game better. This is not our first rodeo and if you trust us with your hard earned cash, we WILL deliver.

With your help we can make Dark Deception the best it can be and deliver a truly intense and terrifying VR horror game!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Help us spread the word! We are a small indie team, so we don't have any spare money to market this campaign. Only with your help can we make this campaign a success. Help us get the support of horror game fans around the world :)!

story:
Who Are We?

Midwinter Gaming Convention is a 4 day convention held each January in Milwaukee, WI. Started in January of 2000, this event was founded on a Classic World of Darkness Live Action Role Playing game (LARP), and over the years grew to become a full gaming convention offering everything from Tabletop RPG's, CCG's, Miniatures, LARPs and of course, Board Games.

At this point in we have decided to create and curate our own Board Game Library.  In this way we can be fully assured that the services offered our Board Game guests are everything we expect to offer as a convention.  We can maintain consistency and continue to grow toward a future of improving and expanding our Board Game track.

Board Games are incredibly important and directly reflect the goals of Midwinter to be able to bring people together to interact face to face.  They teach cooperation, strategy, critical thinking skills and even how to graciously accept a win or loss.  Overall Board Games are an integral part of our convention as a whole.

What We Need & What You Get

While the gaming industry has a track record of being very generous in helping conventions with game donations, there are many titles or series of games that we cannot expect to have donated to us.  Whether they be classics that have stood the test of time, or the newest hot item, Midwinter wants to be able to offer a solid selection to our guests.

The funds raised through this campaign will go directly to expanding our library and making sure we are able to supply you with the games you want to play.  Additionally, we will be looking at inexpensive storage options for when the library is not in use, so that we can keep the games in good condition and be able to transport them easily.

In the meantime, as we travel towards our goal, we have some very cool backer options for you!

PDF Perks

Thanks to a few of our awesome publisher friends, we have a tier for $20.00 that will unlock a whole bunch of PDF options! You also can get this perk if you move to the bigger tiers as well!
That is over $40.00 worth of free eBooks for backers!


From Matt Forbeck:
Dangerous Games: How to Play

From Onyx Path Publishing:

Scion: Hero

From John Kovalic:

Dork Shadows

From Flames Rising Press:
Queen of the Crows

From Margaret Weis Productions:
Firefly Echoes of War: Wedding Planners Cortex Plus


The Impact

Midwinter Gaming Convention has a responsibility to the gaming community to not only produce the highest end convention we can, but to make sure that each of our individual event tracks has the opportunity to shine and encourage new players.  Our Board Game Room for 2016 will not only greatly increase the square footage for games, but will have the best possible lighting and a lot of space for overflow when things really get going.  How great would it be to cover an entire wall with games availble for play?

Risks & Challenges

We understand there are risks and challenges to every project.  We've tried to minimize those in every way possible.  No matter if we raise $3.00 or $3,000.00 we promise those funds will be used toward building our own library.  Worst case scenario we will still be able to offer the games we have received as very generous donations from game companies and publishers.  If we are not able to support the funding of a storage space, we will still maintain the library in a clean, safe environment to make sure it remains in peak condition.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not able to donate, there are still ways you can help us reach our goal!  Spread the word on social media to all your friends!  Share our campaign to your status!  Even a Like or a word of encouragement will let us know we are providing you with a product you will value.

Thank you for taking the time to check us out...now go be epic!

story:
Arcana Kira is PLAYABLE NOW in alpha, hits beta/Early Access in August, and full release on November 2, 2015.

Arcana Kira was also GREENLIT on Steam (aiming for Steam Early Access release in August, and yes, purchasing the game now through this IndieGoGo campaign means you will get a Steam key once the game hits Early Access.)


Wait, What The Heck is the Game Even About?

Arcana Kira is an epic action role playing game with innovative 3rd person platforming gameplay, memorable characters, and a modern aesthetic. You play as the enigmatic Arcana Kira, a space assassin chasing a bounty that will make her rich enough to retire in luxury. But such bounties are hard to secure, especially on a huge alien world and across multiple trans-dimensional boundaries while fighting hoards of elemental beasts and bosses.

If you love RPGs fused with other genres, beautiful sci-fi art, delicate handcrafted music, insane bosses, subtle dark humor and total sci-fi nerdom… Arcana Kira is for you! 


What's In It For You (aka tl;dr)

By supporting this campaign you:

  • pre-order the final release of the game & save $11.00 USD
  • you get to start playing the game now, before it's finished,
  • you get to directly help the game reach completion faster & with a higher quality, 
  • directly participate in the development process, and
  • to observe in real time as the game evolves into it's final polished form
  • includes a free content & bugfix updates every Friday until release candidate phase!

Some Cool Facts About the Game:

  • An indie 3rd person action RPG with JRPG & platforming elements, vehicles, and more. 
  • 26 enemy types, 8 boss battles
  • Optimized multi-threaded 64-bit Direct X 11 game engine with configurable SMAA, HDR, Bloom & more (all that current-gen techno-babble you love!)
  • Latest testing version available to play immediately if you pre-order now (new update each Friday)
  • 144 km2 world map + 5 alternate dimensions
  • Custom game launcher & arcanakira.ini file for easy tweaking

Nobody wants to play an empty open world game, and that's not the game I am going to ship at the end of this process.  However, this game is near the beginning of the development process as it is currently at Alpha release, which by definition means it is both feature incomplete and buggy. 

To prove that this game is real and shaping up quickly, each Friday those who have pre-order can download a new playable Alpha release.  These releases intend to both fix bugs, and provide additional content.  This will be repeated every single Friday until all features are implemented, at which time the game will enter Beta phase, where it will stay until all bugs are believed ironed out.  The goal is to have all the content and features implemented and all the bugs squashed by November 2, 2015.

The year is 3417: the dawn of the Federation Civil War . You are Arcana Kira a professional assassin & bounty hunter, hired by the Federation to capture a rogue scientist and his transdimensional weapons. Journey through a massive alien planet, fight hordes of multidimensional beasts, and chase your bounty through dimensional vortexes in this huge open world action RPG game.

Talon IV is located in the Talon solar system, which is in the Maffei Galaxy. On March 15, 3349 a probe sent to the Talon system discovered metallic compounds & structures associated with the lost alien race called the Zira. It wasn't until August 31st, 3416 that a full expedition from the Federation Archaeology Department arrived to investigate, headed by Dr. Taiyokera. Audio logs and initial reports from the team were unremarkable, but after several months Dr. Taiyokera reported a remarkable discover: there were 5 portals to 5 different dimensions constructed from Zira technology. 3 days after sending his stunning report, on December 31st, 3416 the Federation Star Alliance declared war against the Imperial Allegiance, which became known as the "Federation Civil War." All attempts at contact to Dr. Taiyokera and the Talon IV archaeology team failed. Both sides of the Federation Civil War were aware of Dr. Taiyokera's research, and both sides view his transdimensional vortexes as potential weapons that could turn the tide of war. You are Arcana Kira, a hired assassin, who was commissioned by the Federation on February 1st, 3417 to find and return Dr. Taiyokera & his research and to keep him away from the Imperial factions.

The playable in-area area of Talon IV is around 144sq/km.

    What Shady Stuff Will You Be Doing With My Cash?

    Are you sick of indie developers selling Alpha releases?  Me too!  Let's end that now by contributing to my campaign so that I can move on to selling the beta version.  Every contribution will spent on one of the following total downers :(

    • Unity PRO which costs $75.00 USD a month.  9 more months of payments to go, that means $500 doesn't even cover my remaining Unity PRO monthly costs.  
    • Console Dev Kits - I can't disclose how much they cost (NDA) but they're not cheap.  Any help towards purchasing a console devkit is much appreciated, and $500 doesn't come close to getting one, but everything helps.
    • Really awesome middleware.  There's about $2000 worth of middleware that I would love, so yeah $500 again doesn't even cover the middleware costs.  I'm not going to post a big list here, but message me if you want some specific examples of the middleware I'd like to buy for Arcana Kira.
    • VR Support.  There's a few headsets out there, and I'd like to support at least the VIVE VR and Oculus Rift if possible in 2016.  The costs of developing for VR are higher than typical due to the equipment costs, so it goes without saying that once again $500 doesn't cover it.
    • Website & Marketing expenses (Please refer to Bill Hick's quote regarding Marketing)
    • Food. An upgrade to the Pizza and Coffee diet (right now it's Ramen and Tea diet)
    • Rent.  You've probably never heard of it, but I've fallen victim to an obscure scam whereby I have to keep paying a bunch of money each month just to not be homeless.  I heard a rumor that it's hard to develop games when you're homeless.

    Risks & Challenges

    Arcana Kira is coming whether you like it or not.  Whether you support it or not.  That's not to say that I don't need your help, because I definitely do.  I need your feedback, your scathing criticisms, your unreserved judgement on what you feel would improve this game.  Financially, I need your assistance to take Arcana Kira to the next level, although I've designed the game so even if the campaign ends at $0, Arcana Kira is still coming to Steam and to select home consoles as originally intended.  With your support the game will still come to the same platforms, but it will get there with more polish, more content, more eye candy, and maybe even arrive a hair sooner. 

    This Pitch Scared Me, Where Can I Get Help?

    Yeah, I was a bit silly with this pitch, but I'm dead serious about shipping a fun game at the end of this development process.  If I haven't got you on board right now, don't write this game off so quickly.  I update the game each Friday, so follow this game's IndieGoGo and check back as I update to see if I manage to impress you later with the updates.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you don't have a $1 to spare I understand (no, I really do) but at the same time, if you would please take a second and share this IndieGoGo campaign on Reddit, Facebook, Twitter, or where ever else you post, I would greatly appreciate it.  Thank you!

    System Requirements:

    Minimum Specs:

    • 64-bit Windows Vista or greater (Windows 7 x64, Windows 8 x64, Windows Vista X64)
    • Dual Intel Core i3 at 2.4GHz or higher or AMD Quad Core Phenom II at 3 Ghz or higher
    • ATI Radeon 5870 with 1GB GDDR5 or higher or Nvidia GeForce GTX 470
    • 4GB of RAM or higher
    • 2GB of hard drive space

    Recommended Specs:
    • Core i7 2600k or higher or AMD FX8350 or higher
    • 8GB of DDR3 or higher
    • AMD Radeon 7970 or higher or Nvidia GTX 680 or higher

    Arcana Kirā utilizes multi-threading, requires DirectX11, and requires a 64-bit version of Windows.

    Play Arcana Kira Now!

    Arcana Kira is in public testing now, and is scheduled for retail release on November 2, 2015, at the retail price of $14.99 USD.

    However, if you pre-order Arcana Kira now you can get it for only $4 USD, that's over a 66% savings, and you can immediately download and play the current testing version of Arcana Kira!

    Alpha & Beta Release Schedule

    Arcana Kira comes out in November, but you can play pre-release testing versions now. The initial alpha testing releases are not fully feature complete, however that is to force active testing on the areas that are near complete. For example, the game launcher is near feature complete, and it needs to be tested by as many users as possible. In order to perfect the game launcher, the ability to change settings inside of the game is not yet implemented, forcing you to use the launcher only for configuration. Once the game launcher is solidified, then in-game setting changes will be implemented, and then released into the current beta. The in game settings will share much code from the launcher, meaning it shouldn’t require the same level of testing, since it is based heavily on already tested code.

    Regular Releases: New Update Every Friday

    Some indie games sit in early access or beta forever, and unfortunately some never make it out of this phase. Arcana Kira on the other hand, has a proactive design spec and which allows for up to 1 year of testing before going gold. This should be more than enough time. In fact, I think Arcana Kira only needs 3 months of beta testing. Following my rule to double all time estimates when it comes to development, I therefore posit Arcana Kira will most likely exit beta before 6 months have passed from the initial beta release. However, just to be safe, the official testing period is 1 year, from April 2015 to April 2016. So I believe Arcana Kira will be out of beta in 3 months, but I’m giving the game at maximum 12 months in beta. Expect 12 months, although it shouldn’t take more than 6, and I’m still shooting for 3 months or less.

    After the beta period ends I will be supporting Arcana Kira for at least an additional year. Here are the details:
    • I will attempt to fix any additional bugs or exploits that are discovered after beta.
    • I may or may not port Arcana Kira to other platforms and consoles.
    • I will implement performance enhancements or update the underlying game engine if it’s feasible without breaking stuff or adding too high of a development burden.
    • I may or may not add other content (for free) such as additional enemies, quests, items, expansions, but currently there are NO PLANS for any additional content. This is just not off the table at this point, but it’s also not part of the roadmap.
    • If the beta finishes earlier than April 2016, then the additional time is added the 1 year of post release support. For example, if Arcana Kira exited beta and launched as a retail game in July 2015, then 9 months would be added to the post-release support period, for a total of 21 months of post release support.
    • So regardless of everything, the end date of support for Arcana Kira is May 1st, 2017. After this period, I may still issue updates for the game, but nothing is promised.

    So to quickly recap the above:
    • 3 months to 1 year of beta testing
    • After beta testing ends, and the retail version is released, an additional year of full support for Arcana Kira
    • End date of Arcana Kira support is May 1st, 2017.

    Where's the Screenshots & Links

    Glad you asked.  They're right here:
    • http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=409342929
    • http://blacklodgegames.com/arcana-kira.html
    • https://www.facebook.com/arcanakira
    • https://twitter.com/BlackLodgeGames
    • http://www.indiedb.com/games/arcana-kir
    • https://indiegamestand.com/store/1774/arcana-kir-/
    • http://black-lodge-games.itch.io/arcana-kira
story_txt:
Arcana Kira is PLAYABLE NOW in alpha, hits beta/Early Access in August, and full release on November 2, 2015.Arcana Kira was also GREENLIT on Steam (aiming for Steam Early Access release in August, and yes, purchasing the game now through this IndieGoGo campaign means you will get a Steam key once the game hits Early Access.)Wait, What The Heck is the Game Even About?
Arcana Kira is an epic action role playing game with innovative 3rd 
person platforming gameplay, memorable characters, and a modern 
aesthetic. You play as the enigmatic Arcana Kira, a space assassin 
chasing a bounty that will make her rich enough to retire in luxury.  
But such bounties are hard to secure, especially on a huge alien world 
and across multiple trans-dimensional boundaries while fighting hoards 
of elemental beasts and bosses.

If you love RPGs fused with other genres, beautiful sci-fi art, 
delicate handcrafted music, insane bosses, subtle dark humor and total 
sci-fi nerdom… Arcana Kira is for you! 


What's In It For You (aka tl;dr)
By supporting this campaign you:

pre-order
 the final release of the game & save $11.00 USD

you get to start playing the game now, before it's finished, 

you get to directly help the game reach 
completion faster & with a higher quality,  

directly participate in the development process, and

to observe in real time as the 
game evolves into it's final polished form
includes a free content & bugfix updates every Friday until release candidate phase!

story:
****************************************************************************

We want to make this game an Online experience!

****************************************************************************

All funding from this campaign (if successful) will go into funding this game to become an online experience to enjoy with your friends! You will be able to build cities together and defend them against other players and complete quests together! If this campaign is unsuccessful all money raised will be used to improve the single player expeirence freefold.
****************************************************************************

Blood of Old, Indie , RPG, First person, Strategy, with an in depth story line.

****************************************************************************
Begin as a simple mercenary and make a name for yourself, become commander of armies and conqueror of cities, or become a despised outlaw with murder and thievery. 
Manage your castles and cities from First Person ensuring they keep a smooth economy and happy peoples. 
Manage your armies and battle on the ground with them in epic intense battles! 
Play through the story line and find the Blood of Old and help them regain their throne and restore peace to a war torn country. 
*************************************** 

Key features

*************************************** 
* Army building 
* Castle Management 
* Troop management 
* RPG storyline 
* Buy and ride horses and explore the vast open world! 
* Renown system, become and outlaw or hero, your choice! 
* Earn gold by completing quests or by outlaw ways, and use gold to buy castles and items 

*************************************** 

Planned for future Development

*************************************** 
* Hunger/Thirst player survival elements 
* Siege warfare 
* Base Building from scratch 
* Improved graphical and gameplay elements. 
*multiplayer (co/op and PVP) 
(with your help we can make a game tailored to the communites wants) 
*************************************** 

What makes us different?

*************************************** 
* Active development with the community, what you want in the game you will get! 
* A mix between strategy and rpg games elements from both inculded! 
* Planned survival elements against nature, including hunger and thirst!

story:
About the game

First of all I'd like to tell you about the basic concept of the game. In Arcanix you can't rely on weapons or martial arts but solely on magic. Spells can be learned and upgraded through a spell tree that resets in every match. There are several different gamemodes but in most of the cases, you are able to spend points on the spells every time you die which makes the game more balanced. The longer you are alive the harder it gets since the other players will be able to upgrade their arsenal of spells. Some of the gamemodes such as Team deathmatch, Capture the point,  King of the hill, GunGame are well known but we intend to introduce unique and fun based ones. 

We tried to make the spells interact with each other and the world as much as possible.

  • Projectiles collide with each other and dynamic objects like the rock shield
  • Projectiles are also affected by gravitational fields and wind based spells.
  • Through these interactions spells can create fearful combos.
Demo version of the game can be downloaded from our website or through torrent: Torrent / RAR File 
(The servers use the Steam online subsystem, which means you need to be logged in to play with others.)

What We Need & What You Get

The money we ask will cover the expenses for Greenlight, setting up a company in our country and other registration fees. In case we hit the goal we intend to buy better equipment such as high quality draw pads, better computers (we had a hard time with Unreal Engine 4 since our own computers are far from good and it took quite a while to load shaders, compile maps and other similar processes. )

Unfortunately, we can't really offer you anything else above the copy of the game itself as perks. The copies of the game will be delivered after we get greenlit. (In case we don't get funded and/or greenlit, we will figure out something about the copies.)

About the development

I would like to share some information about the development because I feel it is important to clarify a couple of things. First of all, since we had no money to spend on this game we were forced to use only free software and contents. Although the maps were made with the use of the free Infinity Blade content Epic released, the others were mostly custom made or modified contents. We used Blender, Gimp, Krita, Audacity to make the assets. Since we are not professionals, some of these assets are "weak" compared to the assets of Infinity Blade that were made by professionals and had a financial background. We would like you to look at it as an indie game that could use awesome contents (mostly) for its maps.

About the team

Our "team" consists of 2 members: Mark and Gabe. We haven't really divided the work but you could say Mark is the designer and I'm the "coder" (UE4 blueprints) though that's not exactly true. We both contributed to several different fields of the game. Mark made most of the icons and effects, designed the character and was responsible for many concepts in the game. I am the lead developer of the game and the base concept was my idea, I made the blueprints, the maps and most of the HUD and UI. The reason why I haven't said anything about the audio is probably quite obvious (in case you have watched the gameplay video). We are still struggling with the sound effects and the music but we hope to finish that within the time of this campaign.
I would like to tell you some personal things because I feel it necessary. Mark is 18 years old and still attends school while I'm 21 and just finished a course after school. This is the first game that we managed to develop to this extent even though we have been trying for quite some time now (about 2-3 years). We are nowhere near professionals but we have the passion for game development. Please take that into consideration when looking at our game.

Other Ways You Can Help

We really appreciate any kind of help, even a simple share on any kind of social media could help us, since we can't really advertise ourselves.

Although the maps were made with the use of the free Infinity Blade content Epic released, the others were mostly custom made or modified contents. We used Blender, Gimp, Krita, Audacity to make the assets. Since we are not professionals, some of these assets are "weak" compared to the assets of Infinity Blade that were made by professionals and had a financial background. We would like you to look at it as an indie game that could use awesome contents (mostly) for its maps.About the teamOur "team" consists of 2 members: Mark and Gabe. We haven't really divided the work but you could say Mark is the designer and I'm the "coder" (UE4 blueprints) though that's not exactly true. We both contributed to several different fields of the game. Mark made most of the icons and effects, designed the character and was responsible for many concepts in the game. I am the lead developer of the game and the base concept was my idea, I made the blueprints, the maps and most of the HUD and UI. The reason why I haven't said anything about the audio is probably quite obvious (in case you have watched the gameplay video). We are still struggling with the sound effects and the music but we hope to finish that within the time of this campaign.I would like to tell you some personal things because I feel it necessary. Mark is 18 years old and still attends school while I'm 21 and just finished a course after school. This is the first game that we managed to develop to this extent even though we have been trying for quite some time now (about 2-3 years). We are nowhere near professionals but we have the passion for game development. Please take that into consideration when looking at our game.
    Other Ways You Can Help We really appreciate any kind of help, even a simple share on any kind of social media could help us, since we can't really advertise ourselves.

story:
Short Summary

The developers behind Blanco are always hard at work to make the game a fun platforming experience for the players! We always try to push the game to it's limit to make it the best game possible.

What We Need & What You Get

We need the funds to pay for composers to create an amazing soundtrack for Blanco.

The Impact

Your contributions will help us greatly in doing what we believe in, "Making the best game possible."

Risks & Challenges

I've never been good at creating music, so I'm sure that the composer would be able to make the best soundtrack for Blanco.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have any way to back the game, that's OK! You can still help us! All you need to do is share our Steam Greenlight page, and help us get greenlit.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetai...

story:
CrossWorlds is a hardcore game in which you will have to deploy all your skills to survive in a huge open world that is susceptible to changes in weather, seasons and various natural phenomena. You have to start from scratch, supplying yourself with food, tools, clothing and shelter. You need to protect yourself against enemies who may turn out to be stronger than you, and you have to prepare for winter and summer. As you do all these, it would be quite good to at the same time look for a way to get out of this strange world where you happened to be against your will.

Key features:

  • A 64 km2 game world, which you can explore without any restrictions
  • Change in seasons:

Hot summer – time when you would want to be closer to the snowy peaks or at least to the cool creek

Fertile fall – the period of big travels and discoveries, a time you shouldn't forget about the coming winter

Severe winter – the time when a warm shelter with a hot fireplace and pre-readied stocks will be useful

Refurbishing spring – ready to sweep away your shelter from places perfectly coping without it for centuries

  • Weather phenomena:

Gentle breeze that helps you to cope with the summer heat or that turns you into an icicle in winter playfully

Long-awaited rain, which will prevent you from dying of thirst, but at the same time, will flood your shelter

Mysterious fog, which will help you to escape from the crowds of enemies, but thanks to which you will pass the desired location without finding it you have missed your destination

Soft snow that decorates everything around. The snowdrift, which you will turn into, will be quite beautiful

  • Severe and deadly magic that changes the laws of nature, gives enormous power, but demands long and difficult preparation and unreasonably huge cost in exchange
  • Enemies – both those that got trapped in this world against their will and the indigenous inhabitants with advanced intelligence, ready to call their friends to gladly kill you if they can’t do so alone. But if they can’t kill you with friends, they will play dirty tricks on you and crush your temporary shelter
  • Deadly creatures with immeasurable levels of strength. You will have to find or summon them, and then win them, to get out of this world. But if you don't hurry up, they may get bored and will come to you by themselves at the wrong time
  • Various biomes willing to share their wealth ... if you can cope with their inhabitants

  • A construction and crafting system you can use to acquire strength, new clothes, armor and weapons, deadly traps, and even beds! This system will force you to visit the most remote corners of the world, destroy already endangered species, explore the dark and inhospitable caves, where you will be seen as enemy number one
  • A cooperative of 4 people will increase your chances of survival and successful search for a way out of the CrossWorlds

Our Goals

$5000 Additional game characters and additional endings

$7000 Professional translation into additional languages

$10.000 Additional 3d-modeler for faster development

$15.000 VR support

story:
WHAT MOODSHIFTING DOES FOR YOU

We all slip regularly into moods that drag us down. The MOODSHIFTER App will help you advance quickly out of negative thoughts and feelings into a more enjoyable and productive mindset. Wherever you are and whatever you're doing, our program is your coach in your pocket, offering uplifting guidance and valued relief.


 

Most stress is caused by time pressure and habitual worrying. The MOODSHIFTER App teaches you a new way to quiet upsetting thoughts, let go of old stress habits, and focus on experiences that make you feel better.

 

WizeWell fully appreciates the value of traditional long-form meditation practice. However, most people don’t have the time or discipline to devote 15-30 minutes a day to long-form meditation. To resolve this dilemma, WizeWell has developed pleasurable game-based adventures that  progressively strengthen your mindfulness muscle.

 

Gaining control of your emotions means consciously focusing away from gloomy thoughts toward positive present-moment experience. Whenever you feel frustrated, anxious or depressed, our app provides professional guidance and support to help you regain inner balance and peace of mind.

 

HOW THE MOODSHIFTER WORKS

Based on new research in cognitive psychology, the MOODSHIFTER App offers a compressed, short-form process to consciously break free from old habits, and reactive emotions. WizeWell encourages this moodshifting through animated excursions, visual images, audio guidance, cognitive cues, and video inspiration.

 

Breather Ball

If you consciously relax and deepen your breathing, you actively uplift your spirit. Our patent-pending Breather Ball helps you tap your body’s natural ability to balance and relax your inhales and exhales. Each time you use the MOODSHIFTER App you adjust the Breather Ball to match your own breathing. The Breather Ball then provides a visual model for improving your breathing habits.

 

WizeWell Game

Many people enjoy the game-dynamics of expectation, challenge, achievement and reward. So why not put mood management and mindfulness training within a game context – why not make self-advancement fun? We’re in the process of developing an ever-expanding set of mini games and challenges that enable you to strengthen your various mindfulness skills as you complete one level after another.

Nature

What can you do in just ten seconds to shift your mood in uplifting directions? Psychological studies prove that just glancing out a window or at a photo onto a nature scene will instantly boost your mood and relax your body. Relief is literally just a touch away – we have over a thousand unique nature visuals which can also be enjoyed as a slide-show.

 

Emotional First Aid

Whenever you feel overwhelmed, frustrated or depressed, our app provides professional video guidance to shift your attention away from worry and conflict, toward inner balance, acceptance, and recovery. There are eight different 3-minute programs to choose from, depending on your current need.

 

Inspire

For thousands of years, human beings have been exploring the power of elicitor phrases and stimulus statements to evoke an associative flow that awakens insight. Our founder John Selby has developed a new set of uplift sayings and insight queries that in just seconds, stimulate a flow of insight and inspiration.

 

Audio Vacation

Soothing audio guidance of a particular type can help quiet your mind, calm your emotions, and awaken wholebody relaxation and recharging. Every time you have just half a minute free, you can pause and enjoy one of 50 WizeWell Mini-Vacations.

 

Master Class

When you have a couple minutes free, you can explore a master class with John Selby. We offer 30 short videos for step by step mastering mindfulness. Each class has its own Focus Phrase for you to integrate into your daily routine, reminding you of a particular aspect of the mindfulness experience.

 

 

OUR HISTORY

WizeWell has spent the last decade researching game-based tech tools that transform mindfulness mastery into challenge, anticipation, advancement, victory and pay-off.

Teaming with mindfulness-pioneer and psychologist John Selby and his collection of mindfulness-training programs, WizeWell first developed short-form mindfulness programs with Microsoft and Plantronics. The result is the WizeWell PC-based Stress-Relief App for call-center agents and at-work office employees.

At Plantronics we conducted Beta survey tests and also EEG studies to identify the impact of our PC at-work program. The results are shown below:

WizeWell Beta Metrics:

Stress: "WizeWell helps relieve stress."  100% yes

Leadership: "WizeWell helps boost leadership skills."  92% yes

Engagement: "WizeWell helps staying engaged at work."  90% yes

Wellness: "WizeWell is a valuable wellness strategy."  100% yes

Creativity: "WizeWell helps stimulate creative insight."  90% yes

Anxiety: "WizeWell lowers anxiety & worrying."  95% yes

Hurry: "WizeWell reduces chronic hurrying."  90% yes

Team-Work: "WizeWell improves team spirit." 100% yes

Long-Term Interest: "Want to do the WizeWell Process again." 92% yes

Recommend WizeWell: "Colleagues would benefit from the app."  100% yes

The quantitative EEG results documented that during the 3 minutes spent watching a WizeWell training video, the user's brain activity shifted immediately in the direction of more calm, balance, present-moment alertness and relaxed wellbeing.

Our WizeWell team is now independently building an advanced game-based version for iOS and Android, so that everybody can benefit from our programs. Our Indiegogo funding will carry this personal game-based development through Level One completion and Phase One launch.

 

WHY WE CREATED THE MOODSHIFTER

Krishnamurti, one of the primary spiritual teachers of the 1960s, stated that the next revolution won’t be religious, political, or economic – it must be an interior, psychological revolution. The recent ‘Feel The Burn’ movement of the millennials, and world-wide growing interest in the mindfulness movement, reflect our planetary need for a core attitudinal shift.

Our generation’s great challenge throughout the world is to stop focusing on all our differences that generate chronic conflict, and instead focus on our inherent human similarities that hold us harmoniously together. The MOODSHIFTER App has come into being to further the mindful unfolding of this positive planetary revolution.

How can just a moment of refocused attention in mindful directions make a difference in our world community? When we regularly pause and bring to our mobile screen short expressions of universally-shared wisdom and aspiration, positive mini-events happen: our breathing deepens, our attitudes relax and expand, our hearts open up, and our actions naturally nurture a more compassionate and cooperative society. 

 

MEET OUR TEAM

Although we’ve recently engaged with larger corporations, WizeWell remains a family-owned business that strives to practice the mindfulness methods we teach.

John Selby, creator of the WizeWell Process, has spent three decades researching the dynamics of short-form mindfulness practice. A native of Ojai, California and graduate of Princeton University, UC Berkeley, the Graduate Theological Union and the Radix Institute, John is the author of two dozen books on positive psychology and accelerating personal growth. 

Birgitta Steiner has been working with John Selby for two decades developing the content and technologies of the WizeWell Process, researching on cognitive-shifting methodologies, short-form mindfulness meditation, and the WizeWell's Focus Phrase Program. She was on the original board of the Brightmind Network and co-founded BedRock Productions. 

Jesse Smith received his computer-science degree from UC Santa Cruz. He was in charge of coding the WizeWell PC App, working with  Plantronics advisors to integrate WizeWell content with various computer interfaces. Jesse was also the primary developer of the WizeWell Breather Ball. He is now building the iOS and Android versions of our new app. 

Steve Tennis, VP/Business Development for WizeWell Inc., has three decades of experience serving the legal and business needs of emerging technology companies.  His areas of expertise include company formation, venture capital financing, business operations and strategy, mergers and acquisitions, securities law and technology issues.

Robyn Payne is a graduate of International Business at the California State University of Monterey Bay.  Born in Hong Kong and raised in the UK, Robyn worked for a sports social-networking company marketing the Spanatix via a grass-roots promotion strategy. She currently lives in Santa Cruz, CA. 

Terry Tillman, world-renown culture transformation leader, is the founder of the 22/7 Consulting Company. His clients have included Ford Motor Company, International Paper, Ericsson, Morgan Stanley,  and Weyerhauser. With a dozen top consultants on his team, Terry's participation makes WizeWell fully scalable for live-seminar training.

Christine Cavanaugh-Simmons is head of WizeWell’s Master Trainer program and manages WizeWell’s in-house corporate-training division. Also President of CCS Consulting, she oversees an international community of consultants and executive coaches located in California, the East Coast, Canada, Europe, Asia Pac and Australia. 

Kibo Smith is a graduate of UC Santa Cruz in economics and business management. He participated in the beginning phases of several start-up businesses, and is currently working for WizeWell on new product development, marketing strategy, and new customer acquisition.

 

EARLY ADAPTORS

When you pledge WizeWell, we welcome you to our ʻEarly Bird’ community, and always alert you when something new is emerging.

Your pledge funds will be used toward advancing our progress in app design, game development, and coding; along with final alpha and beta testing.

As an early adaptor you will gain first access to this emerging app, before it’s visible to anyone in the general marketplace. You can also participate in our beta testing if you enjoy that Early Bird adventure.

We should also mention that, for our next funding phase in 2017, we’ve decided to offer stock in our company beyond our family circle – not to a few VC investors, but to a larger number of smaller investors who choose to actively support this new venture - we'll alert you when this new round of funding is being offered.


THE SCIENCE

All human beings suffer from disturbing mood swings and ingrained emotional constrictions. Understanding, controlling and liberating human emotional programming is a final frontier of science. The new field of Positive Psychology highlights current interest in successfully managing our moods. 

Recent research has proven that one of the most effective long-term tools for overcoming disturbing mood swings is mindfulness training. WizeWell's founder psychologist John Selby did early brain research on cognitive-emotive control for the National Institutes of Health – from which the WizeWell approach to mindfulness training and conscious moodshifting has evolved.

Using EEG equipment to document how the mind shifts gears when meditating or doing yoga, John identified key elicitor cues and cognitive-shifting mechanisms that help a person shift from habitual mental activity into a deeper, more aware, present-moment mindset.

This same set of cognitive-shifting techniques has now been compressed by our team into short-form experiences (10 seconds to 2 minutes), and converted to app-friendly game formats. WizeWell’s content, design, and delivery systems are based on the latest scientific breakthroughs of cognitive science and neuropsychology. Please visit our website www.wizewell.com for an extensive presentation of mindfulness and mood-shift research.

 

FAQ

1:  Why was this app first produced for Windows PC computers rather than for mobile platforms?

While doing early development for an iOS/Android MOODSHIFTER app, we happened to engage first with Microsoft, and then with Plantronics, who were interested in at-work PC versions of our program. Now that we’ve fully developed our concept and design, we’re ready to go public with mobile versions.

2:  How long must I wait to receive my mobile MOODSHIFTER App?

We’re aiming to have our new app ready for alpha testing by mid-November. If you sign up for alpha, you can have your app in hand at that date. We aim for the public launch January 2017.

3:  What do you mean by ‘short-form’ mindfulness training?

Long-form mindfulness practice from the Buddhist tradition is based on a minimum of 15 minutes of silent unmoving meditation, preferably twice a day. Short-form meditation requires less than 2 minutes at a time but uses very similar techniques, with parallel results.

4:  Why is breath awareness so important to this program?

When we’re lost in thoughts of the future or remembrances of the past, we lose awareness of our present-moment breathing and wholebody presence – we’re basically ‘not here’ at all. Mindfulness is all about regularly shifting our mind’s attention back to the present moment – and breath awareness is the primary anchor for holding us in the present moment.

5:  How often do I have to pause and take a WizeWell  MOODSHIFT break in order to gain lasting benefits?

Research shows that to permanently change a negative habit and develop a new one, you need to focus at least once a day for a month on the new habit – even though you’ll immediately feel positive effects from the app, you’ll want to stay with a daily engagement with the app in order to transform your inner mood on a more permanent basis.

6:  Why are you using an add-on content model for the MOODSHIFTER App?

As weeks and months go by, users get progressively better at managing their emotions and shifting their mood – and they will periodically want fresh content in order to stay engaged. Therefore WizeWell is committing to creating and delivering new games and mindful experiences on a regular basis.

7:  Do you have a non-profit dimension?

Yes, definitely, our higher goal is to get these mindfulness tools to the people as quickly as possible, which means keeping the price low and availability high. We’re already exploring how best to get free MOODSHIFTER apps into schools. prisons, senior communities and third-world countries. Our monthly newsletter will keep you posted on this front.

8:  Is the MOODSHIFTER a religious program?

No, we’re entirely non-religious. Secular mindfulness meditation is a psychological process with no theological overtones. People of all faiths or no religious affiliation can equally participate and benefit in the WizeWell programs.

9:  What if I want to bring the WizeWell PC at-work app into my company?

We are currently putting our marketing/facilitator team together for the corporate marketplace. Please visit our wizewell.com website to learn how we can help you bring this short-form mindfulness training into your workplace.

10:  I still have questions – how can I reach your team for answers?

Please visit our website at www.wizewell.com to connect with us.


WIZEWELL TIMELINE

With several years of mindful-app development now finished, WizeWell is ready to complete, test and launch both iOS, Android, and PC versions of its core programming. We aim to have the alpha version of the MOODSHIFTER App ready for user-testing in mid-December, and the formal launch of Level One  in February 2017. New game development continues through 2017.

  • March 2013 ............. begin work with Microsoft
  • July 2013 ................. first WizeWell funding
  • April 2014 ................ first iOS WW App completed
  • May 2014 ................. begin work with Plantronics
  • January 2015 .......... first PC At-Work App completed
  • May 2015 ................. PC App Beta completed at Plantronics
  • February 2016 ......... Mindfulness Game Research started
  • June 2016 ................ Mobile App Design started
  • October 2016 .......... MOODSHIFTER Indiegogo launch

 

  • December 2016 ...... New Mobile App Alpha testing
  • January 2017 .......... New Mobile App Beta testing
  • February 2017 ........ PC Corp Marketing begins
  • March 2017 ............ Mobile App Marketing begins
  • April 2017 ............... non-profit app distribution begins

 

CHOOSE YOUR PLEDGE & PERKS

WizeWell is committed to bringing effective new mindfulness tools to as many people as we can, as soon as we can. We thank you for pledging and supporting our world-community cause. Please go to the top of this site and pledge whatever amount fits your budget - we look forward to exploring how we might work together to help raise consciousness and bring people together in sustainable cooperation.

Jesse was also the primary developer of the WizeWell Breather Ball. He is now building the iOS and Android versions of our new app. Steve Tennis, VP/Business Development for WizeWell Inc., has three decades of experience serving the legal and business needs of emerging technology companies.  His areas of expertise include company formation, venture capital financing, business operations and strategy, mergers and acquisitions, securities law and technology issues.Robyn Payne is a graduate of International Business at the California State University of Monterey Bay.  Born in Hong Kong and raised in the UK, Robyn worked for a sports social-networking company marketing the Spanatix via a grass-roots promotion strategy. She currently lives in Santa Cruz, CA. Terry Tillman, world-renown culture transformation leader, is the founder of the 22/7 Consulting Company. His clients have included Ford Motor Company, International Paper, Ericsson, Morgan Stanley,  and Weyerhauser. With a dozen top consultants on his team, Terry's participation makes WizeWell fully scalable for live-seminar training.Christine Cavanaugh-Simmons is head of WizeWell’s Master Trainer program and manages WizeWell’s in-house corporate-training division. Also President of CCS Consulting, she oversees an international community of consultants and executive coaches located in California, the East Coast, Canada, Europe, Asia Pac and Australia. Kibo Smith is a graduate of UC Santa Cruz in economics and business management. He participated in the beginning phases of several start-up businesses, and is currently working for WizeWell on new product development, marketing strategy, and new customer acquisition. EARLY ADAPTORSWhen you pledge WizeWell, we welcome you to our ʻEarly Bird’ community, and always alert you when something new is emerging.Your pledge funds will be used toward advancing our progress in app design, game development, and coding; along with final alpha and beta testing.As an early adaptor you will gain first access to this emerging app, before it’s visible to anyone in the general marketplace. You can also participate in our beta testing if you enjoy that Early Bird adventure.We should also mention that, for our next funding phase in 2017, we’ve decided to offer stock in our company beyond our family circle – not to a few VC investors, but to a larger number of smaller investors who choose to actively support this new venture - we'll alert you when this new round of funding is being offered.
THE SCIENCEAll human beings suffer from disturbing mood swings and ingrained emotional constrictions. Understanding, controlling and liberating human emotional programming is a final frontier of science. The new field of Positive Psychology highlights current interest in successfully managing our moods. Recent research has proven that one of the most effective long-term tools for overcoming disturbing mood swings is mindfulness training. WizeWell's founder psychologist John Selby did early brain research on cognitive-emotive control for the National Institutes of Health – from which the WizeWell approach to mindfulness training and conscious moodshifting has evolved.Using EEG equipment to document how the mind shifts gears when meditating or doing yoga, John identified key elicitor cues and cognitive-shifting mechanisms that help a person shift from habitual mental activity into a deeper, more aware, present-moment mindset.This same set of cognitive-shifting techniques has now been compressed by our team into short-form experiences (10 seconds to 2 minutes), and converted to app-friendly game formats. WizeWell’s content, design, and delivery systems are based on the latest scientific breakthroughs of cognitive science and neuropsychology. Please visit our website www.wizewell.com for an extensive presentation of mindfulness and mood-shift research. FAQ1:  Why was this app first produced for Windows PC computers rather than for mobile platforms?While doing early development for an iOS/Android MOODSHIFTER app, we happened to engage first with Microsoft, and then with Plantronics, who were interested in at-work PC versions of our program. Now that we’ve fully developed our concept and design, we’re ready to go public with mobile versions.2:  How long must I wait to receive my mobile MOODSHIFTER App?We’re aiming to have our new app ready for alpha testing by mid-November. If you sign up for alpha, you can have your app in hand at that date. We aim for the public launch January 2017.3:  What do you mean by ‘short-form’ mindfulness training?Long-form mindfulness practice from the Buddhist tradition is based on a minimum of 15 minutes of silent unmoving meditation, preferably twice a day. Short-form meditation requires less than 2 minutes at a time but uses very similar techniques, with parallel results.4:  Why is breath awareness so important to this program?When we’re lost in thoughts of the future or remembrances of the past, we lose awareness of our present-moment breathing and wholebody presence – we’re basically ‘not here’ at all. Mindfulness is all about regularly shifting our mind’s attention back to the present moment – and breath awareness is the primary anchor for holding us in the present moment.5:  How often do I have to pause and take a WizeWell  MOODSHIFT break in order to gain lasting benefits?Research shows that to permanently change a negative habit and develop a new one, you need to focus at least once a day for a month on the new habit – even though you’ll immediately feel positive effects from the app, you’ll want to stay with a daily engagement with the app in order to transform your inner mood on a more permanent basis.6:  Why are you using an add-on content model for the MOODSHIFTER App?As weeks and months go by, users get progressively better at managing their emotions and shifting their mood – and they will periodically want fresh content in order to stay engaged. Therefore WizeWell is committing to creating and delivering new games and mindful experiences on a regular basis.7:  Do you have a non-profit dimension?Yes, definitely, our higher goal is to get these mindfulness tools to the people as quickly as possible, which means keeping the price low and availability high. We’re already exploring how best to get free MOODSHIFTER apps into schools. prisons, senior communities and third-world countries. Our monthly newsletter will keep you posted on this front.8:  Is the MOODSHIFTER a religious program?No, we’re entirely non-religious. Secular mindfulness meditation is a psychological process with no theological overtones. People of all faiths or no religious affiliation can equally participate and benefit in the WizeWell programs.9:  What if I want to bring the WizeWell PC at-work app into my company?We are currently putting our marketing/facilitator team together for the corporate marketplace. Please visit our wizewell.com website to learn how we can help you bring this short-form mindfulness training into your workplace.10:  I still have questions – how can I reach your team for answers?Please visit our website at www.wizewell.com to connect with us.
WIZEWELL TIMELINEWith several years of mindful-app development now finished, WizeWell is ready to complete, test and launch both iOS, Android, and PC versions of its core programming. We aim to have the alpha version of the MOODSHIFTER App ready for user-testing in mid-December, and the formal launch of Level One  in February 2017. New game development continues through 2017.
March 2013 ............. begin work with Microsoft
July 2013 ................. first WizeWell funding
April 2014 ................ first iOS WW App completed
May 2014 ................. begin work with Plantronics
January 2015 .......... first PC At-Work App completed
May 2015 ................. PC App Beta completed at Plantronics
February 2016 ......... Mindfulness Game Research started
June 2016 ................ Mobile App Design started
October 2016 .......... MOODSHIFTER Indiegogo launch
 
December 2016 ...... New Mobile App Alpha testing
January 2017 .......... New Mobile App Beta testing
February 2017 ........ PC Corp Marketing begins
March 2017 ............ Mobile App Marketing begins
April 2017 ............... non-profit app distribution begins
 CHOOSE YOUR PLEDGE & PERKSWizeWell is committed to bringing effective new mindfulness tools to as many people as we can, as soon as we can. We thank you for pledging and supporting our world-community cause. Please go to the top of this site and pledge whatever amount fits your budget - we look forward to exploring how we might work together to help raise consciousness and bring people together in sustainable cooperation.

story:
All right y'all! I actually had this idea last year but now I'm determined to make this work!! We're printing these adorable chibis, inspired by the characters of that totally Not Natural television show, unto a poker size (2.3" x 3.5") deck of cards for you to enjoy! Yes you!

I apologize for all the exclamation points. Can you tell I'm excited?

Here's the gist of it. my friend does the artwork and I get these printed via makeplayingcards.com. There will be one design to be used at the back of the cards and then 13 characters for the face of each suit. At this point, only Charlie as the Queen ('Sup, Bitches!),  Crowley as the King (duh!), and Gabriel as the Trickster (again, duh!) is set in stone. The rest are still in the works. You're totally free to provide input on that! The photo for this campaign gives you a sample of the general look of the chibis, although these will be tweaked before actual production. Of course, we will post the final designs here as updates.

Why did I price them at $17 ($15 for early birds)? Well, first of all, if the total decks to be made is less than 50, this cost will just about cover all the printing cost + platform/Paypal fees + small royalty for my friend's artwork. There will also be an additional $5 shipping cost (will be added to the pledge amount).

But what if we get pledges for 50 or more decks?

That's the fun part. No, I won't be keeping the extra money as profit. Instead, I will use them to print additional decks, hopefully there is enough, to give to each guest at JIB7 and one for Daniela. If this happens, I will be writing a short note for them as well, which will say that the decks are gifts from the JIB/SPN family. =)

And what if there's more money leftover after everyone gets their pledged deck + the extra guest decks? Then, if this happy event occurs, the extra money will be donated to my pet charity - Real Life Foundation (http://www.igivetolife.com). Basically it's a charity from my home country, the Philippines, that provides scholarships, feeding programs, and other community projects to help people in need.

Before you ask, if there's not enough to print decks for all the guests and Daniela, then the extra goes to the charity instead. I am not in this to gain anything, I just loved the chibis my friend made for my autograph cards so I thought people might want them as playing cards also. And hey, if I can help out my pet charity while doing so, why not, right?

What about shipping? Unfortunately, airmail is too damn expensive from Singapore (where I currently live) to the rest of the world so if I have to ship it to you, I will have to use regular surface mail which takes anywhere from 6-15 weeks after I send them off, according to SingPost.

The other option is to collect it from me in person at JIB7! Or, have your friend who's going to JIB7 claim it for you. If you are going for this option, then you won't need to pay for the $5 shipping cost. However, I can only bring a limited number of decks with me as I'll be going to other places prior to JIB7 and it would be too heavy to carry around too many. I've indicated the limits on the perks.

Tentatively, we are looking to get this off for printing by the end of October, and then start shipping by November. But please understand there could be delays along the way. However, definitely, these will be ready to bring to JIB by May 2016.

Any questions please feel free to ask on here!
