story:
Short Summary

Have you ever wished you could meet a "wise old oracle" and get answers about your life?
Have you ever dreamt of a life made of smooth changes, a clear and purposeful path filled up with fun moments all at once? 
Then, THIS IS IT! 

Hi! My name is Aline Hanle and I am the Catalyst!

For the past 10 years, I have dedicated myself to designing personal development tools and experiences focused on self-empowerment and intuitive strategies - the crazy “right brained” stuff that people find hard but is actually the most fun!

Say what?

Well... In short... I help people find resolutions to their daily life challenges and moments of confusion or uncertainty in a fun and, to use what others described it as, “mind blowing” way!

A sort of a Life Coach mixed with Yoda wisdom ninja and YES... with a French accent! (Yes.. I am French, I admit!). 



The Cosmic Compass Game is a Soul-Strategy game that allows you to tap into all the subconscious information that you have stored in your mind throughout your entire life without having to work hard at it. Indeed, this game is all about the fun!

What it does for you is to help you make sense of who you are, what you need to focus upon and even how to do it!

The Cosmic Compass Game is your ultimate “Life Coach” in the box. I’m on the seventh version, or “alpha” / “beta” version  and the first sets of the game I made by hand have already changed hundreds of people. You can read the typical feedback I get after people play the game for the first time below.



    My wish is, for the Cosmic Compass to spread its wings even more, touch many more people and transform many more lives.

    For that, I wish to publish the next version of the Cosmic Compass Game Box so that it becomes available for thousands!!

    I wish for you to own your very own NEW and ENHANCED Cosmic Compass Game so that you can impact yourself and all your family and friends, at home. I also wish to make the Cosmic Compass an essential and celebrated experience for EVERYONE!  Children, parents, grand-parents, spouses, entrepreneurs or corporate employees and others  can experience this innovative form of enlightening entertainment to find resolutions through clarity and guidance!

    How do we do that? 

    We designed the first EVER Enlightened Soiree... 

    Now you wonder... what is an Enlightened Soiree?

The Enlightened Soiree

It’s not only entertainment, It is Enlightened Entertainment

The Enlightened Soiree is an entertaining and innovative concept for girls night IN!

We, girls, wanna have fun! (Thank to Cindy, she told us what we wanted..).

Unlike Cindy, I am not only telling you what you want, I am offering it to you with a twist of enlightenment!

Think about this…

What do you want to offer to your greatest girlfriends?

  • A different kind of evening. Something unique, unexpected and mind-blowing!
  • A space for them to enjoy themselves as women.
  • The time of their life filled with connection and support.
  • Memories they will forever cherish.

More than anything, you want them to remember YOU as the one who made a difference in their life because of THAT very Evening…

We got it for you and it is called “The Enlightened Soiree”.

Simple yet revolutionary, you, now, have the opportunity to be a Catalyst for Greatness in your life and the life of those you love and all of that while having fun!

The Enlightened Soiree is a women networking mixer that brings girlfriends closer to each others.

Started in 2008 in Austin Texas, and designed by  Aline Hanle, a French Life Coach living in Austin, TX, the Enlightened Soiree Kit is an At-home girlfriends Party package that offers the first Life Coach in a box (literally!).

We know you are intrigued.. (We are too.. and we already know what this is all about! Imagine!!).

So, really.. beyond the fun we will all experience and the transformation, we will live, here is, in short, what this vision is all about...
  • In short, together we can make magic and shift global consciousness towards more kindness, more compassion, more inner-responsibility because we all become more aware of our own journey on Earth.


What We Need & What You Get

Here is what we need to spark that vision!

  • $6000 for Package Design, Manufacturing, shipping and handling of 250 game boxes
Here is what YOU get:
  • Fun and practical perks that will help you grow greater such as

    1. A 33-day Prosperity Challenge

    2. My Passion Manifesto

    3. A personalized Cosmic Insight

    4. The NEW COSMIC COMPASS GAME VERSION

    5. Private game and mentoring sessions with me!



The Impact

Slowly and surely, the game has grown its notoriety because each and every person who has played has had his/her mind blown by the unique strategy it uses and the endless positive ripple-effects it has on one's life.

  • What People Experience:

    • Powerful Insights about your Life.

    • A renewed sense of directions.

    • A revived sense of personal power and confidence.

    • A greater clarity about your purpose and true desires.

    • A crystal clear path to overcome your self-sabotaging patterns, conflicts and challenges.

    • An amazing experience of connection and personal transformation.

Imagine now the impact this can have within a family, a community, a group, a nation!! It is all about understanding oneself better so that we can all serve greater.


Risks & Challenges

So you may wonder... Why has she waited 7 years to make her BIG move?

Well... Walk your talk, first, says the wise...

I needed to do my own journey into greatness before I was able to fully share it with the world. It has been a 7 year walk , for me, to embrace my dream and find the courage to show it... I had to find the balance between the visionary entrepreneur, the feeling-inadequate mama, and the French person on foreign soil (Thank God for choosing the land of opportunity to learn courage, strength and limitless possibility!).

What Players have to say

Jacob Nordby

Author of The Divine Arsonist: A Tale of Awakening                http://JacobNordby.com  

"I will never forget my first encounter with the Cosmic Compass and its creator, Aline Hanle. I was at a dramatic crossroad juncture in my life and felt so confused about how to move forward. Aline invited me to ask my deepest questions and allow the Cosmic Compass process to reveal the truth. I was stunned by the accuracy of the answers which came forth during that session. My life has unfolded in beautiful ways since then and I am grateful for the clarity and confidence which emerged from the fog after this experience."

Jennifer Quinn

Business Owner and Author                                                               http://SimplyQuinn.com 

"It’s not often that I’m speechless.  However, that’s exactly what I was after I turned over my first card in the game (Well, after a few choice words that basically conveyed shock and awe).   Why speechless?  Because the card revealed the very thing that I had been hiding from for decades. The very path my soul most feared – using a gift I have been blessed with; however, one that does not “fit” within the carefully chosen structure of my life.  But, in the moment the card was shown, I knew I could no longer deny it, for my very inquiry was, “How do I find meaning in my life right now?”

Is the game life changing?  Only if you want it to be.  That’s what I loved.  The game merely reveals what your soul wants you to know – it’s still your life and you are still in charge.  The game is truly and brilliantly inspired, of that, I have no doubt.

Brett Youngberg                                                                                                    Business Owner and Former Professional Athlete                                seevirtual360.com 

"This game blew my mind. I’m very left brained and want to win every game I play, especially board games. At the beginning of the game I won’t lie, I was really disappointed about lack of points and scoring only to find out that I was instantly being challenged with certain beliefs and thoughts. Then it got REALLY weird and powerful when the other people playing the game with me started to help me see and understand my strategy and get me “home”. Aline has a gift of reading people and helping you find your own“answers”. When people ask me about it, it’s hard to explain, the words that come to mind are “magic” and “mind blowing”. The best part is that the game and your strategy changes each time you play. Really, you just have to play this game.


Other Ways You Can Help

    • Sharing on social media about this project

    • Sharing this Indiegogo page with your circles of friends and family

    • Writing an article about the project to raise awareness

    • Playing the game and making a video-testimonial

    • Connecting with me for any ideas you may have to spread the word!


So.. not what do you think, but what do you feel? Ready to dive into the Cosmic Compass Game Box Challenge with me?

Together, let's do this!

In love and Light, thank YOU!


Want to know what could be next?....

Listen to how the landscape of the entertainment industry is will change when it will get hold of the Cosmic Compass Game... 

Cosmic Compass isn't simple entertainment...  It is enlightened entertainment...



Come and join the the adventure....

story:
With your help, we've raised almost $1,000, and can now afford printing, shipping, proofreading, cover art and more! 

While we will only be printing 45 copies of the book (including contributor copies), the .pdf and .mobi versions of this book will be available for free. 

Please follow the Updates section of the project if you'd like to keep tabs on our progress.

Peace & love,
Maxim

There are dozens of books about video game writing out there. But as somebody who's had a chance to work on a couple of titles, I can tell you that it's not the theory that counts; it's the practice. 

Which is why it's surprising that nobody had interviewed professional video game writers in a single book, magazine, or web page, asking them, in extensive detail, about the process of writing the actual games that they'd worked on.

This is such a book.

Here is the line-up of the games that this book will cover (as per the confirmed video game writers as of May 17, 2016):

  • Broken Sword: The Sleeping Dragon
  • Choice of the Vampire
  • F.E.A.R. First Encounter Assault Recon
  • FTL: Faster Than Light
  • Gemini Rue
  • Guild Wars 2
  • Half-Life
  • Half-Life 2
  • Heroes of Might & Magic V
  • Mirror's Edge
  • Need for Speed: Most Wanted
  • No One Lives Forever
  • No One Lives Forever 2
  • Overlord
  • Penumbra
  • Pillars of Eternity
  • Planescape: Torment
  • Prince of Persia (2008)
  • Risen
  • Shadowrun: Dragonfall
  • Shadowrun: Hong Kong
  • Rhianna Ford and the Da Vinci Letters
  • Royal Trouble: Honeymoon Havoc
  • Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic 2
  • The Talos Principle
  • Tomb Raider (2013)

It is a book of case studies, a book of experiences; a book that every professional or aspiring video game writer can find entertaining and useful, no matter where they are in their video game writing career.

Moreover, this book is designed to be available as a free download to anyone who wants it. 

I believe that video games are the future of entertainment, and I believe that for video game writers, the future is bright.

The book will contain interviews with video game writers who had worked on at least 20 successful video games across different genres. Some writers have already agreed to contribute. Some I am yet to approach, and the successful funding of this campaign will make that much easier. 

As of May 17, 2016, these are the writers who kindly agreed to participate in this project:

  • Andrew McIntosh (Shadowrun: Dragonfall, Shhadowrun: Hong Kong)
  • Andrew Walsh (NFS: Most Wanted, Prince of Persia, Risen)
  • Chris Avellone (Planescape: Torment, Pillars of Eternity, KotoR2)
  • Craig Hubbard (No One Lives Forever, F.E.A.R.)
  • James Dearden (Technobabylon)
  • Jason Stevan Hill (Choice of the Vampire)
  • Jeff Spock (Heroes of Might & Magic)
  • Jonas Kyratzes (The Talos Principle)
  • John Ryan (Guild Wars 2)
  • Joshua Nuernberger (Gemini Rue)
  • Marc Laidlaw (Half-Life, Half-Life 2)
  • Rhianna Pratchett (Overlord, Mirror's Edge, Tomb Raider)
  • Steve Ince (Broken Sword: The Sleeping Dragon)
  • Tom Jubert (Penumbra, The Talos Principle, FTL: Faster Than Light)
Different genres, different approaches, different technologies, different teams ... the only thing these games have in common is that somebody wrote their scripts.
I, for one, would love to learn what these writers have to say about the work that went into the process.


Let's say you're interested (fingers crossed)! 

What do you get for supporting this project? First of all, a top-notch quality book that will be available for free to everyone as a digital download after the crowdfunding is complete, and softcover copies to all backers at Game Master level and above.

Most of the funds will go to finance professional layout, formatting, and the printing and mailing of softcover copies to backers ... all delivered within 3 months from hitting the funding goal.


Make sure to check out the different reward perks on the bar to the right if you consider helping making this book a reality. 

Even if you can not afford to contribute money, you can still help! Share this project on your social media, send e-mails about it to your friends, tell about it to everyone you know. With your help, we can make a book like the video game industry has never seen before.

How's that for a modest proposal?

Why $7,950? 

Check out the graph below to see where the money is going to go; the annotations for why are right under the graph. 

It goes without saying that if we hit our goal, the backers will receive regular updates on the project's progress.

Printing

Calculated with 200 colored softcover copies in mind, as per discussions with local high quality book printing presses in Budapest.

Shipping

Since I live in Hungary, shipping around the world can be costly. Calculated with the average of $12.5 per package.

Cover Art

These are professional rates. Worth every penny.

Layout

How much it costs to hire a professional layout artist to make the book as sexy on the inside as it's going to be on the outside.

Editing

This is professional proofreading, editing, spellchecking, etc. Requires at least one person other than me.

Work

To be able to release the project within 3 months of hitting the funding goal, I would have to dedicate at least 2 months of my life to it. I'm a freelance writer, which means that it's time spent not working on anything else ... $600 a month is the absolute minimum I need to support myself and my family during that time.

Other

These are IndieGoGo fees together with payment processing fees; a cumulative average of 10%.

No crowdfunding is complete without stretch goals, so here is some cool stuff we'd be able to do if the funding exceeds the original goal.

$7,950

If we get fully funded (a stretch goal in itself!), we would commission the artist Yvan Quinet to paint custom covers for the writer contributor copies of the books. The game-related digital painting will be included as a print for backers who will receive the softcover copies of the book. We would also be able to afford to translate the book into Russian, Polish, German, Brazilian Portuguese, and Spanish.

$9,300

In addition to helping create the finest book possible, every backer at the PRO level and above will also receive a print of an original game-related painting by the Hollywood concept artist Brion Verkler.

But that's not all!

Add to that five (5!) more video game case studies, with the games chosen and voted on by the contributors of any tier. Curious how that would work in practice? Check out the Google+ vote for choosing the title of this book, in which more than 150 people had chosen to go with Video Game Writing by Video Game Writers.

$12,300

Everything above and commissioned portraits of video game writers in the .pdf and print versions of the book preceding every chapter.

Because, hey, writers are cool.

$15,000

At $15,000, you will allow me to fund an audio version of this book read by professional voice actors, made available as a free download to anyone who wants it.

What can possibly go wrong, right?

Actually, not  much. I've written and put together at least half a dozen books for my clients as a freelancer, so I've some experience in getting books done. And before I became a full time writer, I managed pharmaceutical trial IT tech at Oracle for 5 years, so I know a few things about project management and accountability ... but not everything depends on Yours Truly. 

This is a collaborative project, and what if some of those writers that I haven't contacted yet don't get back to me, or what if they're too busy to participate?

It's a valid question, but let me put it this way: Drew Karpyshyn didn't write Mass Effect alone.

And in the case I fail to secure any of the writers on one of the games, as improbable as that seems, I'll change the lineup and include a few other titles instead as long as their writers are good to go. It's the successful funding of this project that will prove that people are interested in such a book, so if the funding goal is met, I'm sure persuading the writers to contribute is not going to be a problem. And, once again, some awesome writers already agreed to participate months ago.

But what if the funding goal is not met? As sad as such an outcome would be, preparing for the worst is a sound strategy. 

Depending on the funds raised, I will still create the book (as such a book should exist), with the following differences:

  • No custom art for the cover
  • No professional proofreading, layout, or editing
  • No (or fewer) translated versions
  • It will take longer to put the book together

Art by Yvan Quinet, used with permission.
story_txt:
With your help, we've raised almost $1,000, and can now afford printing, shipping, proofreading, cover art and more! 
While we will only be printing 45 copies of the book (including contributor copies), the .pdf and .mobi versions of this book will be available for free. 
Please follow the Updates section of the project if you'd like to keep tabs on our progress.
Peace & love,Maxim

But as somebody who's had a chance to work on a couple of titles, I can tell you that it's not the theory that counts; it's the practice. Which is why it's surprising that nobody had interviewed professional video game writers in a single book, magazine, or web page, asking them, in extensive detail, about the process of writing the actual games that they'd worked on.

story:
On the 12th of January 2010 most of Haiti was ravaged by a massive earthquake that killed more than 230,000 people and made 1.3 million people homeless, the majority of whom lived below the poverty line. The earthquake also reduced much of the capital and surrounding countryside into rubble. Five and a half years later, there isstill 25 million tons of rubble spread over the island. This rubble is a real killer. It’s world’s largest polluter in volume, it’s destroying the environment and it’s a health hazard for the people who are forced to live among it.

What is the Mobile Factory?

The Mobile Factory is a mobile sustainable solution that uses an innovative approach to the problem of rubble in Haiti. By transforming rubble into a new resource. It fits into two shipping containers and can be sent to any location where there is rubble, hence the name. Crushed rubble goes in at one end, is processed into liquid concrete, and eventually comes out the other side as brand new concrete building blocks. These are designed so that you simply need to stack them. Just like Lego. The new blocks allow victims of natural disasters to construct their own new, safe and affordable, earthquake proof houses, schools, hospitals or businesses. In short, the Mobile Factory helps them rebuild the communities they lost.

Why Haiti? 

The Mobile Factory is a cheap long lasting solution to a global problem. Unemployment in Haiti is 65% and there is an endless supply of our main building material, the 25 million tons spread throughout the country. Which the Mobile Factory can turn into tens of thousands of new, safe homes, built by the victims themselves, with our help.

What are we going to build?

Petit Paradis: our pilot community, situated on the outskirts of Port-au-Prince, Haiti's capital. A small village for 30 families built by its residents. Here we will teach the residents how to operate the Mobile Factory by themselves so that they can teach others, we’re going to pay them a salary, part of which will be reserved for a down payment on their new home. Once construction is complete, the inhabitants of Petit Paradis will posses valuable skills which they can not only pass on to others, but also to get involved in new reconstruction projects.



We want to raise $400,000. 

This money will pay to get our Mobile Factory to Haiti, designing the pilot community, readying the construction site, building 30 new homes, spread the word and most important of all, setting up a teaching programme so that local communities can learn how to build their own homes. Idealistic? Maybe, but with your support we can make it happen.

This is how you can help

It only takes 750 blocks to build one house of 30m2. You can help us get started by ‘crushing’ rubble right here on Indiegogo.com. For every $5 you give, you ‘crush’ 125 kg of rubble. This creates one new building block and pays for the preparation of other infrastructural projects like earthquake proofing the ground on which the new houses will be built, and the construction of safe water tanks.

Our philosophy

From outstretched hand to working hand, from charity to local economy, that’s the philosophy of The Mobile Factory. To empower those who want to be empowered, instead of keeping them locked in the vicious cycle of disaster-charity-abandonment. We believe in instrumental, structural and economic support so that victims of war or natural disaster can get back to shaping their own future.


For more information go to themobilefactory.org
Or e-mail us at info@themobilefactory.org

F.A.Q

First of all, thanks so much for taking the time to read about The Mobile Factory. We know it's a lot of information, but we have tried to be as transparent as possible. 

What are the benefits of using rubble as a building material?

a. Economic benefits
Giving rubble a positive economic value as a raw material, instead labelling it as waste, will create jobs for low- and uneducated labour and stimulates local economies. It reduces costs in chain, like transportation and construction costs and the demand on shrinking natural sources.

b. Humanitarian benefits
The transformation method that the Mobile Factory uses is a low tec - high touch technology. This enables uneducated workers to quickly learn how to crush, separate and transform rubble into liquid concrete. The stacking system, developed by The Mobile factory, is simple too. Allowing residents to build up their self confidence, independency, and to shatter the ever present glass ceiling of poverty themselves.

c. Environmental benefits
Re-using rubble on location, reduces the need for new natural sources. It lowers cost and CO2 emissions, caused by traditional energy, extraction of raw materials and transportation. It develops awareness of the  multiple values of recycling at all levels of society. 

What’s your mission statement?

  • Sharing knowledge and technology with social-economic related organisations
  • Training local trainers to pass on this knowledge to unemployed labour. 
  • Reducing in-chain costs, including transportation and natural sources.
  • Production on location.
  • Use of local resources.
  • Empowering local economies.
  • Developing environmental awareness on all levels.

I just paid $5. What happens now? 
Your $5 'crushes' 125 kg of rubble.  We use 25kg to produce 1 building block. The remaining 100 kg, which we call granulate, is used to strengthen infrastructures, build cellars, water collection systems, and most importantly, earthquake proofing the ground on which new homes are built. So, in fact, your $5 goes a lot further than you think.

Reusing rubble is such a simple solution. How come it doesn't already exist?Funny you should ask. We were wondering the same thing when we started. The basic technology that the Mobile Factory uses, that of reconstituting rubble, has been around in Holland for over 20 years. But it was only being used in industry, for example, to build industrial walls and those giant blocks that you see when driving past roadworks on the highway. We simply asked  ourselves: "How can we  make'm smaller, cheaper, and easy to use?". Obviously, there's more to it than that, but suffice it to say that we took an existing technology and applied it in a way no one had thought of before.

Why focus on people living below the poverty line? 
The simple answer would be that these people need our help the most. And they do. But it's about much more than that. For those living below the poverty line, employment is one of the few ways in which they can improve their living standards. Which is why we give them the skills to build their own homes and pay them a salary, so that they can pass on this knowledge or use it to create an independent labour and skill base.

How do people build their own home? 
The whole idea behind the Mobile Factory is that anyone can build their own home. Once the Mobile Factory is on location and up and running, we teach local workers how to produce a stock of building blocks out of rubble. Because our building blocks are designed so that you only need to stack them, there is no need for masonry or carpentry skills. 

Shouldn't you work together with N.G.O's? 
We'd love to, as they have the funds to help us, but we feel that we first need to prove to the world that The Mobile Factory works. Once we've built our pilot community in Haiti, we will be able to show NGO's that the Mobile Factory is a duplicable formula to be used by anyone. Sharing instead of taking or giving.

Who owns the houses built by the Mobile Factory? 
We believe in self-help, not charity. Initially, all houses built with The Mobile Factory will be owned by a housing corporation, specifically set up for this project. The person or people building the house will be paid a salary for doing so, part of which is reserved for a down payment. That down payment allows the future owner(s) to get a small mortgage from the housing corporation, specially designed for low income families.

story:
“Amai” is a story-driven platformer, influenced by masterpieces in the industry like “Journey” and “Abzu”. The game aims to present the modern-day collision between humanity and nature in a unique and interesting way.

We’ve been hard at work over the past 7 months to bring “Amai” to life. After quite a bit of iteration, the foundation has been laid. We plan to release the game on Steam in Q4, 2018. However, this is not where we want to stop. “Amai” will be a perfect fit for many different platforms – Playstation, XBOX and Nintendo Switch. Furthermore, what if we could make the game even more accessible by adding localization support and a color-blind mode? We should also level up our sound design, artwork and voice acting. This is where we need your help!

Knowing that "Amai" is a 3D platformer, it's easy to guess that the gameplay consists mainly of platforming, right? It's true. And that is why we work tirelessly to make it feel smooth and natural.

We've spent countless hours on designing new platform types, adding up to the diversity and the escalating difficulty of the game. They break under your paws, move around, become invisible, change colors, drop stones on your head and much more.

Focusing on that aspect of the platforming was important for us because we aim to always bring new challenges for the player to tackle. 

Speaking of challenges, we have to mention the puzzles in "Amai". They are mainly focused around player observation and coordination. Their difficulty increases throughout the game, leading to a greater sense of accomplishment with each success.

Diversity was the key here as well. We don't want you to play a reskinned version of the same puzzle time after time. In fact, each one of the puzzles in the game works completely different from the others.

During this adventure, our protagonist will traverse a rich and colorful world. From the green floating islands up in the skies, way down to the deserted lands of the Old Ones; you'll find interesting interactions around every corner.

Exploration is something that we wanted to encourage from the very first design meeting we had. That is why we created large areas, that let you go off the beaten path. There, you can spend time collecting artifacts, gather ability items and learn more about the secrets this world keeps.

"Amai" follows the story of a young wolf cub, child of Mother Nature, which is presented in the game as a majestic white wolf. In fact, the name we chose for the game comes from the Shona language, where it translates to "mother".

Hurt by the actions of humanity, Nature is forced into exile. That is where the adventure of her child begins. The young wolf cub now has to bring her back and help her restore the balance in the world before everything falls apart.

We drew inspiration from many different civilizations that spoke about the importance of nature thousands of years ago. Working closely with our artist, we managed to create a form of language for "Amai", based on ancient symbols and idols. Finding them in the game could really help you see the whole picture, and it is another side activity that we are excited about.

Transparency is important when it comes to building trust between the developers and the backer. That is why we would like to let you know exactly what you are getting by putting your money into our project.

  • A story that can take you up to 5 hours to complete
  • 35+ achievements
  • 100+ platforming and puzzle sections to beat
  • Multiple endings

When it comes to pure game mechanics, perhaps the biggest change that is going to occur is the transformation of the current camera system into something more dynamic and level-based. This way we will create a more unique feeling to "Amai" and how the game plays.

Meet with our small, but very passionate team of game developers. A group of dreamers aiming to bring the idea of "Amai" to life.

Game development can be a harsh taskmaster, with challenges around every corner. However, we are being realistic with our budget and time requirements and we are confident that we will be able to deliver the great experience we have in mind for "Amai".

Perhaps the biggest challenge in front of us is to find the perfect balance between our own ideas for "Amai" and the expectations of the community. That is why through our social media pages, we were working side-by-side with the community during the last couple of months. The development process is as transparent as possible and we love hearing all the feedback so that we can incorporate it into the game, so our supporters feel like they're part of this journey.

The game aims to present the modern-day collision between humanity and nature in a unique and interesting way.We’ve been hard at work over the past 7 months to bring “Amai” to life. After quite a bit of iteration, the foundation has been laid. We plan to release the game on Steam in Q4, 2018. Furthermore, what if we could make the game even more accessible by adding localization support and a color-blind mode? We should also level up our sound design, artwork and voice acting. story:
Imagination Meets Reality.

Remember when we were kids? All we needed was a toy racing car and our imagination would take the driver’s seat! We would race our cars through living rooms and bedrooms, imagining that they were race tracks and grand prix circuits. We felt like we were part of the experience. Crashing and overtaking would send chills down our spines!

But times have changed…

Video games emerged and deprived us from our imagination. Every aspect of the game had already been designed and developed by someone else. Imagination had nothing to do with it. Flashy rides, thrilling races and hair-raising sound effects have replaced our imaginary tracks! All we have to do is push some buttons and simply participate.

Until now.

Introducing the revolution.

We are a team of expert game developers that had a dream. To blend the unparalleled benefits of mobile video games and our nostalgic childhood memories. We painstakingly examined different ideas and perspectives until one blew our minds…

AR Racer Speed. The Racing Game That Combines Past & Future!

What we have designed is genuinely unique. A mobile game that combines actual miniature racing cars and incredible graphical fidelity is really out of this world. It’s not reality. It’s even better. Reality 2.0 or as it’s better known Augmented Reality! We have incorporated the innovative augmented reality technology into our mobile game to make sure that you are offered an unforgettable experience.

 

 

 

All you have to do in order to enjoy our racing masterpiece is to place your exclusive miniature racing car on your smartphone screen and we will take care of the rest! Our stunning augmented reality game engine will create unique racing tracks, incredible boss battles and magnificent 1-on-1 battles! We have carefully created more than 20 different levels that are filled with breath-taking tracks and amazing bonuses!

 

You Can Finally Feel Like You’re In The Driver’s Seat Again!

We have already produced the first 1.000 miniature cars, which are 100% adaptations of real world supercars, such as Lamborghini, Bugatti Veyron, Land Rover and Blue Phantom.

All you have to do is choose the one the better matches your style and start racing!

Real-time Action-filled Racing!

Our toy cars are built with your maximum satisfaction in mind. Front and rear lamps, as well as windows, feature vibrant multi-colored LED lights that change colors according to your game settings! Plus, there is a magnet on the car body, which creates an unparalleled vibrating and shaking effect, especially when you crash or overtake on opponent! Every part of the miniature car is interconnected with your mobile phone and you can see your car react to your in-game actions!

Mobile Racing Like You’ve Never Seen Before!

Our game offers you two different but equally thrilling modes. Once you place your toy car on the screen you can choose between driving along a majestic, infinite racing track, avoiding numerous obstacles, collecting amazing bonuses and battling bosses,

or completing more than 35 different levels

by accomplishing challenging tasks and collecting awards!

Now You Can Finally Enjoy An Authentic Racing Game!

Due to its ergonomic design, you can control your car with one hand, thus making maneuvering easier and effortless!

In addition, you can play online, compete against your friends and climb up the ranks! Plus, you can choose the car that better represents your style! We have developed 4 different cars, but many more are right around the corner! The ground-breaking combination of a real racing car and virtual reality is what makes this mobile game ideal for both children and adults!

We Want You To Become A Part Of Our Success Story!

Given the chance we plan on producing more racing cars than the original 1.000 already developed! As a result, we will be able to introduce our revolutionary approach towards racing games to bigger markets! Plus, your support is invaluable to our continuous efforts to improve the gameplay and incorporate new ideas into our racing simulator!

 

Support & Faith Must Be Rewarded.

If you share our belief, that video games should represent all our childhood memories and take advantage of modern technological breakthroughs to offer a unique experience, then you should not miss this amazing opportunity to become a supporter of our project. AR Racer Speed is a project that cannot be fulfilled without your generous contributions. And we promise to offer our backers exclusive discounts on our elite mobile game, plus more bonus gifts, once the production is complete!

Our Success Depends On Your Selfless Contributions.

Since AR Racer Speed is a crowdfunding project, our hopes of realizing our childhood dreams depend on your support! Your continuous contributions motivate us to strive for perfection. Being an independent game developer has had its ups and downs, but with your help, we can be extremely optimistic about our future!

Let’s Create An Augmented Reality For Everyone!

There are many ways in which you can further support our project. Besides donating straight to our page, you can help us spread the word. By sharing our unique idea, you can help other people, who are interested in innovative projects and truly high-tech gaming ideas, to learn more about us and perhaps assist us in making our dream come true.

#ARracerspeed Is The New Trend!

Our faith in crowdfunding platforms that help innovation become a reality has inspired us to create this exclusive AR project! Your contributions are vital to our success and we cannot carry on with this ground-breaking mobile racing game without your invaluable support.

 

AR Racer Speed Needs Your Help To Take Off!

 

 

 

#ARracerspeed Is The New Trend!

 

Please contact service@asylabs.com with further questions or requests.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Contact for General Inquiries

info@asylabs.com

 

Contact for Press Inquiries

media@asylabs.com


Contact for Sales Inquiries

sales@asylabs.com


Contact for Investment

investors@asylabs.com

story:
Here's the english translation!

Kurzbeschreibung

Es gibt viele Sports Bars. Man schaut Fußball oder Snooker, Sport wie man ihn eben kennt.

Doch ein Phänomen unserer Zeit ist "E-Sports", Spieler, die sich in Multiplayer Spielen messen und ganze Hallen füllen - in Turnieren mit riesigen Preisgeldern. 

Wieso also nicht eine E-Sports - Bar? Livestreams von Events, Turniere vor Ort und vieles mehr. In gemütlicher Atmosphäre mit Freunden oder neu-gewonnenen Menschen, die das gleiche Hobby teilen.

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

  • Eine Bar in unserem Wunschstandort Heidelberg benötigt ein hohes Maß an finanziellen Mitteln zur Unterhaltung. Strom, Wasser und Miete beanspruchen einen Teil des Budgets, der aber durch die Einnahmen im späteren Verlauf abgedeckt wird. Die Größere Herausforderung besteht darin, den Umbau mit Konsolen, TV´s, Beamern Lautsprechern usw. zu finanzieren. 
  • Zum einen soll eine herkömmliche Bar mit nettem und gemütlichem Ambiente entstehen. Der Fokus soll aber auf das Gaming und auf den Esport gelegt werden. Mann soll die Freude an diesem Hobby mit seinen Freunden gemeinsam teilen-das ist die Idee.
  • Das Hauptziel ist die Bar, umso mehr finanzielle Mittel aber zur Verfügung stehen, umso mehr und vielfältiger wird die Bar ausfallen. Mit mehr Geld könnte z.B. eine größere Location angemietet werden, bei der dann beispielsweise Platz für Billardtische oder ähnliches wäre. 

Die Folgen

  • Es wird eine fast einzigartige Bar im deutschen Raum entstehen.
  • Der Spaß am Esport und am Gaming wird mit klassischen Kneipenbesuchen kombiniert.
  • Je mehr Leute uns unterstützen, desto größer, vielfältiger und exklusiver wird die Bar aussehen.

Risiken & Herausforderungen


  • Sind wir ehrlich: Bei jedem Projekt dieser Art können ungeplante Nebenkosten auftreten. Das Risiko besteht drin, nicht die geplanten Ziele zu erreichen und umzusetzen, so wir wir es uns vorstellen. Deshalb sind wir auf jede Unterstützung angewiesen, werden aber auch alles andere zu tun, um diesen Traum zu verwirklichen.
  • Wir haben eine Menge an Freunden und Bekannten, die uns tatkräftig beim Umbau/Gestaltung der bar helfen wird.
  • Die Anfragen an Sponsoren laufen auf Hochtouren! Steelseries und Blizzard sind einer der wenigen Vertreter, die uns bei diesem Projekt unterstützen würden.

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Manche können einfach keinen Beitrag leisten, das heißt aber nicht, dass sie nicht helfen können:

  • Wenn ihr denkt, dass die Idee, den Esport und das Gaming in unseren Alltag so zu integrieren, dann teilt unsere Projekt, auch das ist eine große Hilfe.
Vielen Dank-Milan Steiner und Jan Neumeyer

English

Summary

There are a lot of Sport Bars, where you can watch football, snooker or similar. Sport as usual.

But there is a new aera. "Esports" - Players who compete with each other in multiplayer online games. Large halls are filled and sold out at such events. But where's the public viewing part?

So, why not an E-Sports Bar? Livestreams, Tournaments and much more in comfortable atmosphere with friends or people who share the same hobby.

What you give & what you'll get

  • A bar in Heidelberg requires a high level of financial resources for maintenance. Electricity, water and rent claim a part of the budget, which is covered by the revenue at a later stage. The greater challenge is to finance the renovation and buy  consoles, TV's, projectors, etc. speakers.
  • On the one hand is to create a traditional bar with nice and comfortable atmosphere. But the focus should be the Gaming- and eSports - Part.
  • The main objective is the bar, but the more financial resources are available, the more you will get in the bar.

    • Consequences

    • There will be  an almost unique bar in southern - Germany.
    • The fun of the gaming- and e-sports part combined with classical pub visits.
    • The more people support us, the larger and more exclusive the bar will look.

    Risks & Challenges

    • Let's be honest: For every project of this kind, unplanned costs may occur. The greater risk is not to achieve the planned su. Therefore, we are dependent on any donation, but also everything else to do in order to realize this dream.
    • We have a lot of friends and acquaintances who will help us with the renovation / design of the bar.
    • The requests to sponsors are in full swing! SteelSeries and Blizzard are one of the few representatives who would help us with this project.

    Other ways to support us

    Some simply can not contribute, but that does not mean that they can not help:

    • If you like the idea, combining eSport and gaming with pub visits, you can share our project! That's also a great help.

    Thank you, 

    Milan Steiner and Jan Neumeyer

story:
Ascension x in a new fighting game built from the ground up in unity, for Steam, Xbox1, and PS4. We are a small dedicated  studio located in Ohio, and this is our baby.

      Ascension X's main selling point is the idea of 'Ascension', or an evolution of the mechanics of the game as you play. Traditional fighting games have a set curve in that the game is static in how it plays in order to retain a fundamentally solid game. Though retaining the idea of Ascension, we implemented systems in order to make it so characters grow stronger the longer the game lasts. This not only makes the game visually appealing to look at but causes a change in how players approaches the game.








We've been hard at work for two years now, Using our own funds for equipment and software.  We may be a small team but we are passionate about our project, and with your help we will be able to bring Ascension X to live. 

Timeframe We have been working diligently on Ascension X and we are approximately 3 months away from releasing our Beta. The beta will include 2 Playable characters and 2 game modes. Vs and tag team



       We're putting every dollar raised into Ascension X's development (and reward fulfillment), while holding true to the goals  we've described below. Improvements go beyond what is easily explained in Stretch Goals, but here are some specific ways we'll enhance the game.




The system

Ascension

Each character will have an ascended form that will be Unique for each character. This will cost your entire Ascension bar to perform, but while in the ascended form you will have access to additional special moves, combos, and have access to the overdrive attack.

Special Attacks

Each character will also be given a set of special moves. Each special move in Ascension X requires the use of psion.  At the very basic example a normal fireball cost 10% of your psion bar. Once your psion bar reaches zero you will not be able to use special attacks, however you can refill your psion bar in battle by powerup. 

Enhanced Attacks

Enhanced attacks are modified version of Normal special attacks  that either deal extra damage, or knock down an opponent. A player has to spend a quarter of the Ascension meter to use enhanced attacks.

Combos

Combos in Ascension X are unique in the sense that you can create your own combos, by stringing together various basic attacks. You also have the ability to include your transformations within you combo allowing for some pretty interesting setups.

Combo Breakers

A combo breaker is a special move where a player can spend meter to interrupt a combo performed by the attacking player. You can also use your  entire meter to ascend which will automatically break any combo.

Overdrive Attack

Overdrive attacks are ultimate special moves that are unique to each character.  This is the strongest attack the character is capable of pulling off.  The overdrive attack will not be readily available to the player. The player will have to link attacks together while in their ascended form to use the Overdrive attack. Correctly pulling this attack off will result in over 50% damage.

Powerup

In order to recharge your Psion bar each character has the object to power up, which leaves them vulnerable to attack. however if you don't powerup you could run out of the ability to use special powers.

Parrying

Each character will be given a parry block,  which will allow the user to repel a direct attack. The parry block does not work against special moves.  Parry blocks are hard to perform but do not use any meter.  They are meant to be a way to deflect physical attacks, and leave an opponent open to a counter attack.






Digital Perfect is an interactive design studio that was formed late 2009, for the express purposes of freelance design for mobile apps.  For the next 5 years we focused mainly on design for various clients, the most famous being Rovio entertainment, where we were asked to design screens for Angry Birds. Since then we went on the to develop mobile apps for various clients in Ohio.

Our core team is made up of 3 primary members,  Chris Sanders, Brian Warner, and Elijah Hudley.


In order to transition from mobile design / development to console game development we are collaborating with a team of talented individuals.  whose work can be seen in movies such as iron man 2, the Avengers, to games such as Gears of War2.
story_txt:
Ascension x in a new fighting game built from the ground up in unity, for Steam, Xbox1, and PS4. We are a small dedicated  studio located in Ohio, and this is our baby.       Ascension X's main selling point is the idea of 'Ascension',
 or an evolution of the mechanics of the game as you play. Traditional 
fighting games have a set curve in that the game is static in how it 
plays in order to retain a fundamentally solid game. Though retaining 
the idea of Ascension, we implemented systems in order to make it so 
characters grow stronger the longer the game lasts. This not only makes 
the game visually appealing to look at but causes a change in how 
players approaches the game.We've been hard at work for two years now, Using our own funds for equipment and software.  We may be a small team but we are passionate about our project, and with your help we will be able to bring Ascension X to live.  Timeframe We have been working diligently on Ascension X and 
we are approximately 3 months away from releasing our Beta. The beta 
will include 2 Playable characters and 2 game modes. Vs and tag team


       We're putting every dollar raised into Ascension X's development (and reward
 fulfillment), while holding true to the goals  we've described below. 
Improvements go beyond what is easily explained in Stretch Goals, but 
here are some specific ways we'll enhance the game.









The system
Ascension 
Each character will have an ascended form that will be Unique for each character. This will cost your entire Ascension bar to perform, but while in the ascended form you will have access to additional special moves, combos, and have access to the overdrive attack. 
Special Attacks
Each character will also be given a set of special moves. Each special move in Ascension X requires the use of psion.  At the very basic example a normal fireball cost 10% of your psion bar. Once your psion bar reaches zero you will not be able to use special attacks, however you can refill your psion bar in battle by powerup. 
Enhanced Attacks
Enhanced attacks are modified version of Normal special attacks  that either deal extra damage, or knock down an opponent. A player has to spend a quarter of the Ascension meter to use enhanced attacks. 
Combos
Combos in Ascension X are unique in the sense that you can create your own combos, by stringing together various basic attacks. You also have the ability to include your transformations within you combo allowing for some pretty interesting setups. 
Combo Breakers
A combo breaker is a special move where a player can spend meter to interrupt a combo performed by the attacking player. You can also use your  entire meter to ascend which will automatically break any combo. 
Overdrive Attack 
Overdrive attacks are ultimate special moves that are unique to each character.  This is the strongest attack the character is capable of pulling off.  The overdrive attack will not be readily available to the player. The player will have to link attacks together while in their ascended form to use the Overdrive attack. Correctly pulling this attack off will result in over 50% damage.
Powerup
In order to recharge your Psion bar each character has the object to 
power up, which leaves them vulnerable to attack. however if you don't 
powerup you could run out of the ability to use special powers.
Parrying
Each character will be given a parry block,  which will allow the user to repel a direct attack. The parry block does not work against special moves.  Parry blocks are hard to perform but do not use any meter.  They are meant to be a way to deflect physical attacks, and leave an opponent open to a counter attack.









Digital Perfect is an interactive design studio that was formed late 2009, for the express purposes of freelance design for mobile apps.  For the next 5 years we focused mainly on design for various clients, the most famous being Rovio entertainment, where we were asked to design screens for Angry Birds. Since then we went on the to develop mobile apps for various clients in Ohio. 

Our core team is made up of 3 primary members,  Chris Sanders, Brian Warner, and Elijah Hudley. In order to transition from mobile design / development to console game development we are collaborating with a team of talented individuals.  whose work can be seen in movies such as iron man 2, the Avengers, to games such as Gears of War2.

story:
Meet Jack...

Jack was an ordinary guy, living an ordinary life with his family in a small town called Seward, simple job, simple hobbies, happy well-balanced life. Even though he graduated summa cum laude, top of his class from biochemical engineering, he was never a careerist, a talent like him could have made huge discoveries, innovation, he could have been a rock star scientist, but he never wanted that. Just enjoy life, keep all stress on minimum, love his family and grow old.

But one horrible day, all his visions, all his dreams were crushed like a hammer crashes a vase, everybody lost their humanity, became some sort of ugly monsters...

No one really knew what happened that day... or who patient zero was, but since then 3 years have gone by, 3 years since Jack had to leave behind everything.

Surviving without his family, not knowing if they are still alive alone, or even worse turned to something indescribable, all those thoughts hunt him every day and every night, even for a blink of an eye... 3 years is a long time with all these questions in his heart. Always questioning himself, if he could have done more to save his loved ones, it must feel like torcher.

3 years ago, "initiation day" as we know it nowadays, Jack was busy as usual working alone in his private lab, trying to analyze remaining of thousand years old animals of some species he believed could result in a cure of diseases like Alzheimer. He was no older than 40, but really old-school guy, he only used the technology necessary for his research, but mainly he loved to store all his findings, ideas in his small notebooks. It never really occurred to him until after "initiation day", that a life without electricity, which definitely means no technology, may come one day, and all those old-school kind of habits are about to be handy again.

There was a huge light out that day long after the sun had gone down, sure, light outs were usual at that part of town, old electricity wires, rats... no more ingredient needed, but this was different, the whole town has gone black. Jack, as the always-the-calm guy kept his cool, walked out on the street to check if anyone had electricity. His lab was right on the top of a small mountain just in the middle of the city, so as he walked out, and it was instantaneously clear for him, this was something else.

"Maybe a power-grid failure? Or some sort of attack?" - he was not sure, but as he looked closely down the streets, he, the-always-cool guy become so frightened, his legs froze for a couple of seconds. Large groups of people were running the same direction on nearly every street, and it was not clear why.

At that moment, Jack realized, this time of the day, his family must be home... he should be home, protecting them... he rushed back to his lab, grabbed his Glock, he never loved guns, but now, he thanked all gods for buying them last year after their home was robbed on a Sunday night while they were sleeping upstairs.

As he rushed down the streets, he had to go straight in the opposite direction of desperately escaping groups of people. Streets were filled with these groups, he had a hell of a time getting home... but he finally did it, as he turned right in their long street, there was his home. His family home. As he ran up on the stairs leading to the front door, he had a feeling developing in his stomach, something was wrong, no lights inside, of course, there was no electricity, but no candles? Nothing? And then, finally he reached the front door, it wasn't locked...

He rushed inside, and shouted out loud: "honey, are you home? Dave - Jack's son, 10 years old - "Dave! Are you home?", no one answered, he shouted again and again while searching their home, but it was empty...

At that moment, standing in his son's room upstairs, he looked out the window, it was so dark, he could only see silhouettes of rushing people, and some sort of human-like things moving strangely weird in the crowd. As he tried to focus more on those creatures, he heard a loud noise from downstairs, it was the door being crushed... "They are in, I gotta get out now!" Jack immediately thought, maybe his wife has her phone with them. "I call them when it's safe".

Jack climbed up to the roof on the ladder which was so old, it literally crashed after each step he made upwards. As he reached the roof, something grabbed his shoulder and pushed him sideways to the chimney. It was a monster of some kind, maybe an ill human, Jack couldn't decide at the moment, but it was getting closer and closer. Slowly crawling, like it was hurt, Jack shouted: "Stop! Or I'm gonna shoot you! Stop!", but the monster kept coming, step by step closer to Jack's leg, it was wounded, bleeding slowly, it wasn't made by the creature, he had hit it to the pipe coming out of the chimney's side. "One last warning, I'm gonna fu**ing shoot you! Stop!", but it just kept coming and coming. Jack reached for his Glock, safety off, he loaded the gun with his left hand, the adrenalin just raised to a level, his vision was perfectly clear and everything was moving so slowly for him, he only needed less than a second, aimed and shot the zombie right in the middle of his forehead... At that very moment, he realized, it was a young man, turned to something indescribable... best definition would be a zombie, "what the hell" Jack just kept repeating the same thought. 

After a couple of seconds of processing what just happened, he had to run faster than he ever thought he could, all the monsters heard the loud sound of his gunshot and reoriented to catch him.

Jack jumped off the roof of the 2-floor home,  with his already wounded left leg, and just started to run away, escape the chasing, and find someplace to reevaluate, plan the search and rescue of his family, and find out what the hell just started to be happening in the world...

Good luck mate!

 

Lights Out Concept Arts and In Game Scenes

 

Funding Milestones of Lights Out development

  1. Single player story mode with 12 chapters - $200.000
  2. Cinematic animations through all chapters - $350.000
  3. Single player AI adaptive mode - $425.000
  4. Multiplayer, co-ops story mode based on the above chapters - $475.000
  5. Additional survivor levels, arena fights - $500.000

Why every contribution is a huge help for us?

We are an indie game development studio with a vision of combining advanced artificial intelligence technology with professional game development to create a new level of game experience. With this project, we not only try to focus on astonishing level design, great character control, and storyline but we also try to make all challenges and game experience unique by integrating applied reinforcement learning in every game level. Adding these technologies to the game opens a whole new area of features which will make every second of the playing more individualized, every challenge more exciting.

Our goal with mixing VR and regular gaming experience is to allow the players to enjoy the game any way they want, VR or regular keyboard control, or even console, and can change platform or way of playing anytime, truly making the experience borderless.

Of course, developing all these technologies require a lot of resources, and we are more than thankful for any size of contribution! Let's make a new kind of game experience together!

How will we use the contributions?

The development of the general AI engine which will run simultaneously with the render pipeline will be 100% developed in-house, every contributor will be listed in the credits of the AI engine as well. 

We do mainly all the game developments in-house as well, but of course, some tasks are way better executed and a lot more efficient through outsourcing, like:

  • music composition
  • teaser making
  • motion-capture

Where to go next?

During this campaign, we already started developing the basics of the AI system, as well as our Art Designers brainstorming hard on more awesome concept arts. Within the next 2 weeks, we are also planning to release the first teaser video of Lights Out.

We would be more than pleased if you could share this campaign through any social media platform!

See you when the Lights Out!

story:
Short Summary

Queenship's team represents a variety of skills and backgrounds, including video game composition, concept art, narrative writing, game engines, and a variety of other skills essential to successful game development. 

What We Need & What You Get

This is what your funding will be paying for:

-new and upgraded hardware
-recording equipment
-license purchasing
-work hours

What you get: check out our perks section! 

The Impact

Our goal is to make a positive impact on those facing challenges in their mental health via entertainment and genuine validation of their experiences - not to mention neurotypical players who want to learn more about mental health and relationships via a fun platform. 

In addition, the positive impact that the development of Queenship will have on other female game developers cannot be overstated. Our aim is to produce amazing games and encourage other women to do the same. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, share around our campaign and encourage others to donate! Help us spread the word!

story:
The tides of evil flowed through Ethiryon, and sorrow spread like a plague among humans. Far upon the forgotten skies, the Skyward Gates were breached, unleashing the darkness within. Eleven years later, eight Magus Lords created the Hallowed Divinity; the spell that banished Aemohriel back into the depths of the Aetherworld. Pieces of remaining worlds were kept afloat by the Dim Unity, the archaic relic of Vaelyon.



Ethirians forged magic artifacts protecting humankind from roaming rifts and bloodshed. Two decades have passed since the war of origins, the darkness still peering through the gates, waiting to be found. Embark on a grand journey to become a notorious Magus and put an end to an ever-lasting war.

  • 15 hours main campaign with over 150 side quests.
    [...] The length of the campaign may increase but will be no lesser than 15 hours.

  • All decisions you make intertwine into a huge pool of variables affecting nearly every main quest and tasks available.
    [...] Shape your experience with the things you say and the decisions you make.

  • A vast world to explore filled with challenging foes and puzzles.
    [...] The focus is to balance combat with exploration and role-playing.

  • Fast paced, turn based combat with a twist reminiscent of old school RPGs.
    [...] Encounters are short and deadly, unleash devastating attacks and summon allies.

  • Thousands of customizable items, upgrades, abilities and character builds.
    [...] Upgrade and highly customize characters with hundreds of possibilities.

  • Craft and rebuild a shattered world as you make enemies and allies for the final stand.
    [...] There's many out of combat activities and ways to complete the game. Looking for the final boss? You might become it.

  • Post-game and 2 free updates with hours of additional content.
    [...] There's 3 major updates currently planned, they are part of the post-game and will be released at later dates. 2 of them will be free to anyone who back or purchase the game.


 

G L O S S A R Y: chapter i - part i
C H A R A C T E R S

Nel Aevadr: Magus in training and protagonist. Nel has an unusual talent to communicate with Aether.
Fehnrir: Skillful fighter. Fehnrir is afflicted with Sinistris yet his mind seem unaffected.
Rhea Bexley: Adept mechanic and gunner from a distant world. She has no other than Nel and Fehnrir.
Xezkiel Grimm: Once a mercenary, he now serve and protects the academy from all threats.
Corisande Pavlis: Third Commander of the Empire's army. Injured during the war, she left to help with her cousin's tavern.
Joakim Ragnaurizio: Peculiar, inexperienced and hungry Pathfinder. Everyone else's trash is his treasure.
Markelius Thyvald: One of the eight Magus Lords and headmaster of Hiegholm's academy.
Arisae: She claims to be a Guardian of Vaelyon and came to help put an end to the war.
Tuv: Strange shadowy creature, Tuv is as shy as they come and only trusts Arisae.
Twins: Wicked brother and sister, they want the world cleansed from the Aether and would kill for a piece of candy.
Vhagnir: Ruler of Vaelyon and maker of the Dim Unity. He sealed both worlds into the abyss then was killed by Aemohriel.
Aemohriel: The first Aether to roam the world taking many forms. He keeps his body hidden deep within the depths.
Leonore (Cheerless Lady): Vhagnir's bride, she attempted to steal the Dim Unity and was exiled to never be seen again.

E S S E N T I A L

Magus: The title given to magic users trained to protect Ethiryon. These mages can learn to manipulate multiple elements.
Dim Unity: An ancient and powerful artifact forged by Vhagnir to keep Vaelyon safe. Its whereabouts are unknown.
Skyward Gates: Colossal walls were built east of the Empire to separate the Forgotten Skies from Ethiryon.
Hallowed Divinity: The spell created by Magus Lords to shield the Skyward Gates from the chaos within.
War of Origins: The endless battle against the Aether that shattered worlds into pieces.
Rifts: Tears made to connect the Aetherworld with the outside world. They can be closed by defeating the source of it.
Sinistris: Affliction that causes the victim's mind to collide with the Aether's conscience.
Aether: A soul that does not cease to exist once the entity dies. It can possess interrupted minds and objects.

W O R L D / F A C T I O N S​

Ethiryon: Worlds consisting of floating islands inhabited by humans and magical creatures.
 
  • The Empire: Main force of the land far east, they built the Skyward Gates and vow to protect Ethiryon from the Aether.
  • Ordrumei: Free people of the west and friends of the Empire. The faction is populated with outcasts and survivors.
  • Azna'Khal: An influential faction and dominant strength of the north. They are proud and only abide by their own laws.
  • Skyhearth Guild: Home of pathfinders, merchants and adventurers. The guild seeks the Dim Unity.

Vaelyon: Destroyed long ago beyond the Forgotten Skies, its remains are sealed away with the Aetherworld.
Aetherworld: Wastelands used to lock away the Aether. Imprisoned, the darkness and chaos only spread deeper.
Forgotten Skies: Unstable skies infested with rifts and out of reach.

I've been wanting to create role-playing adventures ever since I can remember. My love for story-telling and arts compelled me to play all sort of games to escape most of my life. I've spent years learning and using softwares, what was a hobby grew into a passion. I am creating Skyward Fantasy with RPG Maker MV and JavaScript for nearly two years now. With the support of a friend and the community we pushed the limits of the engine, making this game a possibility!

I've been working very hard on Skyward Fantasy, actively developing the game while I work a full time job. I never miss a day of progress and I am highly determined to releasing this game. It is my gateway into indie game making and it's a dream I am devoted to making come true. I want Skyward Fantasy to become an experience rather than a distraction. There is more to what I would love to accomplish with the final state of the game and we need your help!

The funds will be used for:

  • Improved battler graphics, more enemies and visual weapons.
  • Original soundtrack by Toshi Clinch and Drew Zaremba.
  • High-definition illustrations for cut-scenes and events.
  • More character faces and expressions.
  • English Major for localization.
  • Codes and polish.

  • Like and support us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/rehmlok
  • Subscribe at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPgD3yvxQu0AXgg37mrNiVw
  • And follow us on Twitter at: https://twitter.com/rehmlok

  • Toshi Clinch (Musician)
    https://www.toshiclinchmusic.com/
    https://www.facebook.com/toshi.clinch
    https://www.youtube.com/user/toshmosh117

  • Drew Zaremba (Musician)
    http://drewzaremba.com/
    https://www.facebook.com/drewzarembamusic/
    https://www.youtube.com/user/jazZaremba

  • Aekashics (Battlers)
    https://www.patreon.com/aekashics/

The risks and challenges I face during this project are not many. The funds we raise will improve it beyond what I imagined the game to be, I am hoping to make it the most fun and polished possible. I've put thousands of hours into this project, every single day and weekend. I have already completed a generous amount of content. The biggest challenge might be the Tower of Truth and the online features, involving dynamic quests that will be shaped by the players' decisions (the entire registered player base!). All online features will be OPTIONAL, this game is bought once and can be played while you are offline, no cash shop. This is part of the stretch goals and if accomplished, I am excited to keep the adventure exciting to the best of my abilities!

Thank you for all the support you provide and your interest in Skyward Fantasy.

Craft and rebuild a shattered world as you make enemies and allies for the final stand.[...] There's many out of combat activities and ways to complete the game. Looking for the final boss? You might become it.



Post-game and 2 free updates with hours of additional content.[...] There's 3 major updates currently planned, they are part of the post-game and will be released at later dates. 2 of them will be free to anyone who back or purchase the game.

 
G L O S S A R Y: chapter i - part iC H A R A C T E R S
Nel Aevadr: Magus in training and protagonist. Nel has an unusual talent to communicate with Aether.Fehnrir: Skillful fighter. Fehnrir is afflicted with Sinistris yet his mind seem unaffected.Rhea Bexley: Adept mechanic and gunner from a distant world. She has no other than Nel and Fehnrir.Xezkiel Grimm: Once a mercenary, he now serve and protects the academy from all threats.Corisande Pavlis: Third Commander of the Empire's army. Injured during the war, she left to help with her cousin's tavern.Joakim Ragnaurizio: Peculiar, inexperienced and hungry Pathfinder. Everyone else's trash is his treasure.Markelius Thyvald: One of the eight Magus Lords and headmaster of Hiegholm's academy.Arisae: She claims to be a Guardian of Vaelyon and came to help put an end to the war.Tuv: Strange shadowy creature, Tuv is as shy as they come and only trusts Arisae.Twins: Wicked brother and sister, they want the world cleansed from the Aether and would kill for a piece of candy.Vhagnir: Ruler of Vaelyon and maker of the Dim Unity. He sealed both worlds into the abyss then was killed by Aemohriel.Aemohriel: The first Aether to roam the world taking many forms. He keeps his body hidden deep within the depths.Leonore (Cheerless Lady): Vhagnir's bride, she attempted to steal the Dim Unity and was exiled to never be seen again.
E S S E N T I A L
Magus: The title given to magic users trained to protect Ethiryon. These mages can learn to manipulate multiple elements.Dim Unity: An ancient and powerful artifact forged by Vhagnir to keep Vaelyon safe. Its whereabouts are unknown.Skyward Gates: Colossal walls were built east of the Empire to separate the Forgotten Skies from Ethiryon.Hallowed Divinity: The spell created by Magus Lords to shield the Skyward Gates from the chaos within.War of Origins: The endless battle against the Aether that shattered worlds into pieces.Rifts: Tears made to connect the Aetherworld with the outside world. They can be closed by defeating the source of it.Sinistris: Affliction that causes the victim's mind to collide with the Aether's conscience.Aether: A soul that does not cease to exist once the entity dies. It can possess interrupted minds and objects.W O R L D / F A C T I O N S​ Ethiryon: Worlds consisting of floating islands inhabited by humans and magical creatures. 

The Empire: Main force of the land far east, they built the Skyward Gates and vow to protect Ethiryon from the Aether.

Ordrumei: Free people of the west and friends of the Empire. The faction is populated with outcasts and survivors.

Azna'Khal: An influential faction and dominant strength of the north. They are proud and only abide by their own laws.

Skyhearth Guild: Home of pathfinders, merchants and adventurers. The guild seeks the Dim Unity.

Vaelyon: Destroyed long ago beyond the Forgotten Skies, its remains are sealed away with the Aetherworld.Aetherworld: Wastelands used to lock away the Aether. Imprisoned, the darkness and chaos only spread deeper.Forgotten Skies: Unstable skies infested with rifts and out of reach.
















I've been wanting to create role-playing adventures ever since I can remember. My love for story-telling and arts compelled me to play all sort of games to escape most of my life. I've spent years learning and using softwares, what was a hobby grew into a passion. I am creating Skyward Fantasy with RPG Maker MV and JavaScript for nearly two years now. With the support of a friend and the community we pushed the limits of the engine, making this game a possibility!
I've been working very hard on Skyward Fantasy, actively developing the game while I work a full time job. I never miss a day of progress and I am highly determined to releasing this game. It is my gateway into indie game making and it's a dream I am devoted to making come true. I want Skyward Fantasy to become an experience rather than a distraction. There is more to what I would love to accomplish with the final state of the game and we need your help!

The funds will be used for:

Improved battler graphics, more enemies and visual weapons.
Original soundtrack by Toshi Clinch and Drew Zaremba.
High-definition illustrations for cut-scenes and events.
More character faces and expressions.
English Major for localization.
Codes and polish.







Like and support us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/rehmlok


Subscribe at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPgD3yvxQu0AXgg37mrNiVw


And follow us on Twitter at: https://twitter.com/rehmlok




Toshi Clinch (Musician)https://www.toshiclinchmusic.com/https://www.facebook.com/toshi.clinchhttps://www.youtube.com/user/toshmosh117
Drew Zaremba (Musician)http://drewzaremba.com/https://www.facebook.com/drewzarembamusic/https://www.youtube.com/user/jazZaremba

Aekashics (Battlers)https://www.patreon.com/aekashics/




The risks and challenges I face during this project are not many. The funds we raise will improve it beyond what I imagined the game to be, I am hoping to make it the most fun and polished possible. I've put thousands of hours into this project, every single day and weekend. I have already completed a generous amount of content. The biggest challenge might be the Tower of Truth and the online features, involving dynamic quests that will be shaped by the players' decisions (the entire registered player base!). All online features will be OPTIONAL, this game is bought once and can be played while you are offline, no cash shop. This is part of the stretch goals and if accomplished, I am excited to keep the adventure exciting to the best of my abilities!

Thank you for all the support you provide and your interest in Skyward Fantasy.

story:
Overview

Whether you're a Casual or a Competitive Gamer we guarantee you have had to wipe your hands due to sweat. Especially, if you are a competitive Gamer, we know how hard it can be to keep composure in competitions, scrims and public matches.

The first problem with wiping your hands while playing is that you have to pause, which can take crucial time out of your gameplay and in video games seconds matter. The second problem with wiping your hands on a towel or your legs is that it only gives temporary relief and doesn't last.

What are we?

GetGrip is a long-lasting, non-stick hand antiperspirant aimed for gamers to provide relief from sweat for up to 5 hours. Feel confident as this non-sticky solution ensures your hands will never slip.

Non Stick

No Residue

5 Hour Grip

 

 

Personal Background

I'm a 23-year-old student out of Sydney. For the past couple of years, I have always thought there are antiperspirants for other body parts, so why can't there be one for the hands? It was only recently I started looking into hand antiperspirants (when I figured there is such thing). The most common drawback with hand antiperspirants already in the market is the ingredients, ingredients such as talc. The problem with talc and similar ingredients are that they can create residue which isn't ideal for gamers and their expensive equipment.

 

What We Need & What You Get

My original plan was to personally invest in the first order and test the market. However, after getting in contact with multiple manufacturers around the world, I realised I wouldn't have the funds to do so. GetGrip is a unique formulation, which means the manufacturers must purchase the raw ingredients in bulk resulting in large MOQ's usually 20kg to 50kg.
My goal is relatively small. All I'm looking need is enough funding to create my first order. $12 per unit

30kg = 30,000 ml

30,000ml / 50ml = 600 units

 $12 x 600units = $7200

 

 

Perks Of Backing Us

  • Backers who donate $10 or more will receive a free GetGrip tube to test the product.
  • Backers who donate at any amount will receive 50% off with a unique code. 

Every donation counts and will help GetGrip to get closer to entering the market, even donating the price of your daily coffee will make a huge impact.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute money, that doesn't matter feel free to follow our socials to help build a brand presence. Even sharing this campaign with your friends and family would help dramatically.

Thanks to everyone who helps out.
Feel free to leave a question in the comment section if you have any.

Instagram @getgripoffical
