story:
SubterAlien Rescue.

Introduction.

I have always been fascinated by computer graphics and video games from the very first time I saw TRON on the big screen. The first time I played Defender in the arcades. I was hooked on creating CG and becoming a CG artist in the games industry.

I have worked for small, medium and ‘AAA’ studios since 1995.  Studios such as Psygnosis, Bullfrog in the UK. I went on to work for Electronic Arts, Acclaim, Midway, Kuju, Koei Japan and Asylum Entertainment. I emigrated to work for EA Canada in their PSP division. My experience, knowledge and skillsets are well suited to deliver this game to the market.

I’ve been a game artist and developer on 24 game projects and have a credit for artwork on 16 published games. Titles include. Tiger Woods PGA, Need for Speed Carbon, Pogo Island, Theme Park World, Track Attack, Need for Speed Pro Street, plus many more.

We have a small but very experienced team that have worked in the game industry for at least 10-25 years each.

SubterAlien: Rescue Game Demo: -

https://tigersharkstudios.ca/subteralien-rescue

SubterAlien: Rescue Project.

I've always found the story to games I liked, limited. This posed me with what if questions.

  • What if the lunar lander ship had weapons like in Defender or R-Type
    • We have designed a unique set of upgrades that will give your ship awesome firepower.
  • What if we had to rescue downed pilots like in Choplifter ?
    • Pilots will run towards you for rescue or bases for shelter from enemies.
    • Pilots can also help enhance your ship with salvage tech
  • What if precious minerals in the catacombs could be extracted as a resource for technology.
  • What if we had crazy alien mechanical robots after us?
    • The robots are aliens from another galaxy intent on mining our resources
    • Robots hunt our pilots and will attack our bases to hamper your rescue efforts

These questions led me to combine features and ideas from some popular arcade and computer games into this project.  Collaborating with my colleagues  and good friends in the industry, we created SubterAlien Rescue. 

The Roadblocks.

The initial game design was to create levels based on our Solar systems planets, moons and asteroid fields in the game. The proof of concept is complete.

With our campaign funding levels met, we can hire key staff for the completion of the game. Having professional experienced programmers, artists, animators and audio technician will ensure completion of the game on time and successful launch of SubterAlien: Rescue to the Steam and other online market platforms.

We Need your Help.

With your help and support we can deliver: -

20 levels of challenging game play

Arcade and story modes to the game

Unique weapons inventory and ship upgrade system

25 Original designed Alien Robot enemies

Challenging game level environmental puzzles.

If you could use the Indiegogo share tools to share our content on YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and other social media sites, this will help us gain additional support and raise game awareness. We appreciate your support.

STRETCH GOALS

$70,000.00 CAD  - Space Flight Participant - Initial Funding Goal - Digital version of the game on Win / Mac / and Steam with perks as listed.

$95,000.00 CAD - Mission Specialist Level 1 - Achievements Goal - Test your skills with the addition of 5 new challenging levels to the game.

$120,000.00 CAD - Mission Specialist Level 2 - Achievements Goal - Test your skills with the addition of 5 new challenging Levels to game along with access to Prototype defense pod the Space Witch.

$150,000.00 CAD - Science Pilot - Unlocked Research: Weapons Goal - Additional Research Weapons & tools would be available on the inventory system.

$170,000.00 CAD - Flight Engineer - Unlocked Research: Ships Goal - Reaching this objective means that you get additional Ship Hulls, Engines and Shielding options.

$220,000.00 CAD - Payload Commander - Graphics Enhancements Goal - At this point we could enhance the overall art of the stages, animations and effects to perfect the final product the best we can.

$250,000.00 CAD - Space Craft Pilot - Backstory Levels Goal - Enjoy 3 additional new playable episode ( levels), discovering what happened to the human expeditions before the rescue mission was launched.

$300,000.00 CAD - Lunar Module Pilot - Level Editor Access Goal - A user version of our level editor would be available in game. You would be able to create your own unique planetary levels.

$400,000.00 CAD - Command Module Pilot - Persistent Local Mode Goal - World that continues to run locally on your machine when you are away, earning game points and resources.

$450,000.00 CAD - Commander - Ultimate Achievements Goal - Test your skills with the addition of 10 new challenging levels to the game.

story:
Who are We?

Small Victoria based games development team focused on developing a unique FPS experience. We wish to only show the world Australian made Indie games and put Australia in the big game development area. Now especially the game we are working on named "Blood Metal"  we hope to finish and show the world what two home taught game devs can do.

This campaign is to advertise and get funding for us to attend PAX 2019 and to develop the game itself. The booth alone costs $1804 and we also need merch and some hardware to present our work.

Each contribution has 15% go towards charities and helps us greatly in achieving our dream jobs as game developers.

What's in it For You:

If you attend PAX AUS and show us you donated you shall receive an exclusive reward.

Funding goes into the key areas of:

  • Paying for the space: $1804
  • Exhibiting costs (transport, merch)
  • Hardware
  • Software Licensing
  • Music Licensing
  • 15% towards charities (varies by month)

The Impact

PAX Rising is the Indie showcase at the biggest gaming convention in Australia. This gives us exposure and a chance to show the world what we can do and form a community around our game. This is also a great stride in entering the games industry as a whole.

  • Press and Community exposure
  • Ability to donate more to charity
  • Supports Australian games industry

Risks & Challenges

If we don't secure funding by September 3rd we will not be able to refund any money, as any contributions would further development.

No matter what the 15% of all funds goes to charity.

  • We will dedicate all time and personal incomes to reach the goal
  • Development will continue regardless if we reach the goal (nothing can stop us)

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this page on social media (tag us and we will shout you out)

  • Referrals = Shoutouts and Special thanks in game credits
  • Give us feedback on the game, after all we want to show you the best game we can make!

Thank you for any contributions

~Seth and Will

story:
Overview

Stoutheart is an in-development roguelike, souls-inspired 3D character action game built upon the concept of enemy possession. As a lingering spirit with a hardened will, you traverse an ever-changing steampunk island populated by once-human machines. Each opponent you encounter can be possessed to inherit their unique abilities, provided that you have fought hard enough to break its will.

Become your enemy. Master their potential.

Starting as a passion project by 5 college students in Spring 2020, this game is built upon our team’s love of the rogue-like genre and the combat experience of games like From Software’s Dark Souls series. After a few months of independently-funded full-time development, we want to take this project one step further and publish to Steam early access so we can continue to work towards bringing this game out into the world.

 

Try The Demo

Development Timeline

Our current development goals revolve around building out our core gameplay first and foremost, and as such, our plan is to have our full Alpha update by the end of this year. More features will be developed and added to the game as time goes on, and we hope to constantly take in feedback from our community at every step of the way!

Campaign Goals

As a small independently funded game studio with no immediate means of profit, it is pretty hard to safely support development towards a fully released product, as well as ensure that we can work on the game past December. There are a lot of expenses associated with running our company, such as paying the team compensation for their hard work so they can afford to continue at a reasonable pace, paying for platform development kits, as well as hiring new talent. Without funding, continuing to work on this game would not be financially feasible for the team. We are passionate about this project, and we want your help to bring it to its full potential! Here are our current funding goals:

  • $15,000: Part-time Development, Company Expenses, + Audio/Music Commissions

    • Development team can afford cost of living for 3 months, and justify part-time work

    • Reimbursement for core company expenses (i.e. studio formation, publication, trademark, copyright, etc.)

    • Commissioned unique character audio, environmental ambience, and custom music

  • $30,000: Part-Time Fall Development + Additional Programmer

    • Development team can continue to work part-time into the Spring (past Alpha)

    • We can afford to hire another programmer on board to help develop new content

  • $60,000: One Year of Full-Time Development Past Alpha Release

    • Development team can officially work full-time and ensure consistency past Alpha

    • Beta release within a year!

 

Features

  • Enemy Possession

  • Souls-Inspired Combat

  • Roguelike Elements

  • Steampunk World

Possession

In this game, you control a disembodied spirit that has been granted the ability to take control of bodies via possession. Each robotic body, or Vessel, you encounter in this game is puppeteered by a human soul, and that control is tied to their strength of will, or Resolve. The Resolve of an enemy can be temporarily broken within combat, which leaves you the opportunity to possess them, inheriting all of their abilities and attributes. Your playstyle is dependent on the Vessel you choose to possess. 

Whether you want to play from a distance, defend attacks that come your way, or opt for weaving in and out using speed as your weapon, it all hinges on what you control. With possession being an active and dynamic part of combat, how long you stay in a Vessel comes down to choice - and your mastery of your current Vessel’s attacks, abilities, and attributes. Develop strategies through observing your enemies before taking control of their abilities for yourself, or use possession to better understand them.

Our hope is that with each new Vessel we introduce, we get closer to having a play-style for every kind of player. Possession for our game isn't just about changing bodies, it's about finding the style that best matches YOU the player.

Souls-Inspired Combat

Every fight in this game is intended to require careful and deliberate combat, and our base mechanics are heavily inspired by that of From Software’s Dark Souls series. Each enemy has their own attacks and abilities that can pose a constant threat if the player is unable to react. Over time, and with enough patience, players should be able to recognize the patterns of their opponents and understand the abilities of their current Vessel well enough to adapt to the fight at hand. Planning your attacks, dodging to avoid threats, and utilizing your Vessel’s powers is key to your survival.

Each Vessel has two special abilities unique to them as possessable characters, and they can drastically influence the way you and your enemies engage in combat. These abilities range from buffs or debuffs, to more complex actions like parrying, dashing, shooting a sidearm, or changing stances. How you choose to approach situations is completely up to you, and the Vessels you choose to possess.

For each area of the game, bosses are a final test of your combat skills. The difficulty of these bosses will tower over any other encounter. The character you choose to be for this fight is the character you must stick with for its duration. Either you kill them, or they will kill you again, and again, and again. Which they probably will. Plan accordingly.

Roguelike Elements

Each area the player explores throughout the game is intended to be a unique experience. The level layouts, enemies within them, and the items that can be found along the way are randomized, which we believe will add a lot of replayability to our core gameplay. Through exploring these levels you could come across secret rooms, hidden passages, and unlock completely new paths, as long as you survive the encounters along the way!

Death is a constant threat to the player, as when you die, you start all the way from the beginning. There are no checkpoints to save your progress, nor is there a way to keep the various upgrades that you have obtained. However, new potential modifications for Vessels can be unlocked for you to discover in future lives.

Steampunk World

The world of Stoutheart is one that has pursued steampunk technology and as a result lost most of its humanity. Its inhabitants have chosen to have their souls placed within robot bodies to preserve life. As they went to greater extremes, one rose above the rest to exert influence over all Vessels, creating a Hive Mind that exercises near-total control, robbing the island’s transposed inhabitants of their free will. Believing this new, robotic form of life to be greater, this Hive Mind continued to spread its influence, forcing those who were opposed to robotic conversion, into Vessels.

Pockets of resistance remain that either hide away or fight for survival, their souls having been already forced into Vessels but their strength of will making them capable of resisting the Hive Mind’s influence. Your home is a place that stands in resistance to the Hive Mind, once in tune with an ancient Goddess of Nature and attempting to grasp at spirituality.

Your resistance has failed. But all hope is not lost. You are one who has an incredibly hardened will, a Resolve that goes beyond that of any other. And so you have been chosen by your Goddess, given the ability to use your strength of will as a weapon to possess your enemies after disrupting their connection to the Hive Mind. With this power, your goal is to confront the Hive Mind and free the people of the island from its control.

Over the course of the game, you'll meet a lot of fun and interesting NPC's, like our wonderfully adorable shopkeeper, who will send you various upgrades and blueprints as you progress through the game. In future updates, there will likely be additional characters that will greater engage the player within the game's world.
 

Thank You

Thank you so much for taking time out of your day to listen to us show off what we've been working on. If you decide to join in on the campaign, then thank you again for helping us to reach further!
story_txt:
OverviewStoutheart is an in-development roguelike, souls-inspired 3D character action game built upon the concept of enemy possession. As a lingering spirit with a hardened will, you traverse an ever-changing steampunk island populated by once-human machines. Each opponent you encounter can be possessed to inherit their unique abilities, provided that you have fought hard enough to break its will.Become your enemy. Master their potential.Starting as a passion project by 5 college students in Spring 2020, this game is built upon our team’s love of the rogue-like genre and the combat experience of games like From Software’s Dark Souls series. After a few months of independently-funded full-time development, we want to take this project one step further and publish to Steam early access so we can continue to work towards bringing this game out into the world. Try The DemoDevelopment TimelineOur current development goals revolve around building out our core gameplay first and foremost, and as such, our plan is to have our full Alpha update by the end of this year. More features will be developed and added to the game as time goes on, and we hope to constantly take in feedback from our community at every step of the way!Campaign GoalsAs a small independently funded game studio with no immediate means of profit, it is pretty hard to safely support development towards a fully released product, as well as ensure that we can work on the game past December. There are a lot of expenses associated with running our company, such as paying the team compensation for their hard work so they can afford to continue at a reasonable pace, paying for platform development kits, as well as hiring new talent. Without funding, continuing to work on this game would not be financially feasible for the team. We are passionate about this project, and we want your help to bring it to its full potential! Here are our current funding goals:

$15,000: Part-time Development, Company Expenses, + Audio/Music Commissions

Development team can afford cost of living for 3 months, and justify part-time work
Reimbursement for core company expenses (i.e. studio formation, publication, trademark, copyright, etc.)
Commissioned unique character audio, environmental ambience, and custom music



$30,000: Part-Time Fall Development + Additional Programmer

Development team can continue to work part-time into the Spring (past Alpha)
We can afford to hire another programmer on board to help develop new content



$60,000: One Year of Full-Time Development Past Alpha Release

Development team can officially work full-time and ensure consistency past Alpha
Beta release within a year!


 Features
Enemy Possession
Souls-Inspired Combat
Roguelike Elements
Steampunk World
PossessionIn this game, you control a disembodied spirit that has been granted the ability to take control of bodies via possession. Each robotic body, or Vessel, you encounter in this game is puppeteered by a human soul, and that control is tied to their strength of will, or Resolve. The Resolve of an enemy can be temporarily broken within combat, which leaves you the opportunity to possess them, inheriting all of their abilities and attributes. Your playstyle is dependent on the Vessel you choose to possess. Whether you want to play from a distance, defend attacks that come your way, or opt for weaving in and out using speed as your weapon, it all hinges on what you control. With possession being an active and dynamic part of combat, how long you stay in a Vessel comes down to choice - and your mastery of your current Vessel’s attacks, abilities, and attributes. Develop strategies through observing your enemies before taking control of their abilities for yourself, or use possession to better understand them.Our hope is that with each new Vessel we introduce, we get closer to having a play-style for every kind of player. Possession for our game isn't just about changing bodies, it's about finding the style that best matches YOU the player.Souls-Inspired Combat
Every fight in this game is intended to require careful and deliberate combat, and our base mechanics are heavily inspired by that of From Software’s Dark Souls series. Each enemy has their own attacks and abilities that can pose a constant threat if the player is unable to react. Over time, and with enough patience, players should be able to recognize the patterns of their opponents and understand the abilities of their current Vessel well enough to adapt to the fight at hand. Planning your attacks, dodging to avoid threats, and utilizing your Vessel’s powers is key to your survival.Each Vessel has two special abilities unique to them as possessable characters, and they can drastically influence the way you and your enemies engage in combat. These abilities range from buffs or debuffs, to more complex actions like parrying, dashing, shooting a sidearm, or changing stances. How you choose to approach situations is completely up to you, and the Vessels you choose to possess.For each area of the game, bosses are a final test of your combat skills. The difficulty of these bosses will tower over any other encounter. The character you choose to be for this fight is the character you must stick with for its duration. Either you kill them, or they will kill you again, and again, and again. Which they probably will. Plan accordingly.Roguelike Elements
Each area the player explores throughout the game is intended to be a unique experience. The level layouts, enemies within them, and the items that can be found along the way are randomized, which we believe will add a lot of replayability to our core gameplay. Through exploring these levels you could come across secret rooms, hidden passages, and unlock completely new paths, as long as you survive the encounters along the way!Death is a constant threat to the player, as when you die, you start all the way from the beginning. There are no checkpoints to save your progress, nor is there a way to keep the various upgrades that you have obtained. However, new potential modifications for Vessels can be unlocked for you to discover in future lives.Steampunk World
The world of Stoutheart is one that has pursued steampunk technology and as a result lost most of its humanity. Its inhabitants have chosen to have their souls placed within robot bodies to preserve life. As they went to greater extremes, one rose above the rest to exert influence over all Vessels, creating a Hive Mind that exercises near-total control, robbing the island’s transposed inhabitants of their free will. Believing this new, robotic form of life to be greater, this Hive Mind continued to spread its influence, forcing those who were opposed to robotic conversion, into Vessels.Pockets of resistance remain that either hide away or fight for survival, their souls having been already forced into Vessels but their strength of will making them capable of resisting the Hive Mind’s influence. Your home is a place that stands in resistance to the Hive Mind, once in tune with an ancient Goddess of Nature and attempting to grasp at spirituality.Your resistance has failed. But all hope is not lost. You are one who has an incredibly hardened will, a Resolve that goes beyond that of any other. And so you have been chosen by your Goddess, given the ability to use your strength of will as a weapon to possess your enemies after disrupting their connection to the Hive Mind. With this power, your goal is to confront the Hive Mind and free the people of the island from its control.Over the course of the game, you'll meet a lot of fun and interesting NPC's, like our wonderfully adorable shopkeeper, who will send you various upgrades and blueprints as you progress through the game. In future updates, there will likely be additional characters that will greater engage the player within the game's world. Thank YouThank you so much for taking time out of your day to listen to us show off what we've been working on. If you decide to join in on the campaign, then thank you again for helping us to reach further!

story:
EDIT: After some confusion with IndieGoGo, we have relaunched this campaign on a new page: https://igg.me/at/voxalia

Voxalia is a modern voxel game produced, promoted, and designed by Frenetic LLC using the Frenetic Game Engine.

It is a game centered around the notion of survival in a voxelized, randomly generated world. The game has functioning dynamic physics. Every portion of the natural environment from land to sea moves and flows in reaction to all you do. It's designed to make you feel like it is actually vibrant, alive, and moving at all times around you to simulate a realistic ecosystem.

From the grass-filled plains to the jagged mountain ranges, the world is in constant flux. Giving you the feeling that you are actually living in a whole nother universe.

The world is also changing at all times. Gradual shifts between night and day, as well as changes in season. With all of the survival hazards that may accompany it. From temperature fluctuations, snowstorms, thunderstorms, hurricanes, tornadoes, et cetera. The game is made and designed to throw everything it has at you to give you the best experience possible.

Every single object in the terrain can be used in a multitude of various ways. From the rain that comes from the sky, to the earth beneath your feet, giving your imagination wings.


Every aspect of the world and how it works is one-hundred percent customizable. So, that every single game can be ultimately designed for any individuals desires. Every section of the world and how it functions can be altered to whatever desire seen fit using either console commands, or alternatively, a friendly user-interface to alter the game itself.

You wish for a hardcore survival experience? You can make that.

You wish for a light and forgiving world that you can play casually? You can make that too.

Every single part of the world is what you want it to be.

There is so much more we wish to add to this developing world:

- A full single player story campaign, playable with up to four of your friends
- A dynamic melee system with item durability, strength weapons, finesse weapons, armor weak spots
- Functioning injury system as well as proper medical application
- Fully customizable technological tiers

Every day our team works collaboratively to come up with even more ideas to pour into our project for you, the players, to enjoy the way you want. So, that you may enjoy playing it as much as we do making it.

All we would ask is for a little help making our dream a reality for you. Any donations that can be provided to Frenetic LLC help in ensuring the official release of this wonderful game as fast as possible.

We are also looking for people skilled in various studies to assist in not only creating Voxalia, but possibly future projects and becoming part of a team. From animation, artwork, writing, coding, sound effects and more. If you want to contribute please let us know.

We have a Discord server everyone is welcome to be a part of:

https://freneticllc.com/Go/Discord (or invite code ' eggWVJt ').

We would love to have you in our dysfunctional family here at Frenetic LLC and hear all the wonderful ideas you have.

Anyone that donates fifteen dollars or more will get access to the closed alpha and a copy of the game to keep forever.

Donations of $5 or more get a role on the Frenetic public Discord. At $5, you can see the crowdfunders-only text and voice channels, at $15, your name is elevated on the userlist sidebar, and at $50, your name will be colored gold.
To receive the role, send a DM to AlexGoodwin#9512 on Discord, and in your message include your name and email that you donated with.

Thank you so much for your consideration and thought.

----------------------------------------------------

Zachary "Angel" Brooks
Chief Creative Officer of Frenetic LLC

story:
Set in a post-apocalyptic world five years after a global pandemic, The Fight follows the story of a lonely man, after discovering that there is a chance that his family is still alive.

The Fight is a unique action-adventure survival horror game set in a post-apocalyptic open world, played from a third-person perspective. The game takes place five years after a global pandemic occurred which killed almost all of humanity, and transformed millions of others into  mindless  zombie-like creatures that are quickly evolving

 

 

 

 
 
KEY FEATURES
  • Online and single player
  • Massive unique interactive open world experience
  • Defeat hordes of zombies
  • Gather recruits, weapons and many vehicles
  • Build your own camp
  • Customize your character, vehicle and weapons
  • Massive world filled with enemies, vehicles, weapons, animals and friends
  • Dynamic time of day and weather
 
GIGANTIC MAP
The map is filled with obstacles, traps, zombies, factions, and other things that want to hurt you or kill you.
 
 
 
 
 
PERSONALIZE YOUR CHARACTER
The Fight gives you the opportunity to choose from a wide selection of equipment that you can find around the map. Some items are in plain sight and some are hidden with puzzles that you must solve.
 
 
Backpacks are your friend, they will help you to carry your inventory, but be careful to not carry too many items because that will affect your movement speed and stamina.
 

 

 

 
 
 
Choose from a variety of looks and set your character apart.
 
 
 
As you progress in the game you will receive badges.

 

 

 
BUILD YOUR OWN CAMP
Build a camp and start recruiting friends that will help you to fight your enemies. Your camp will be where you can fix your vehicles, sleep and eat without having to look over your shoulder. Find some missions, but in order to do so you will need to first find a space to do so and protect it as best as you can, and that is your camp.
 
 

 

 

 
TAKE THE FIGHT TO THEM
Don't just sit and wait for the people to come to you. Take initiative and destroy the factions in order to conquest part of the map and allow people to exit the bunkers.
 
 
You can expect all sorts of combat in The Fight, better be prepared.
 
 
 
Explosions are the way to go.
 
 
 

 

 

 

Bigger explosions than ever will make all the enemies within its radius be blown away.
 
 
 
Hordes of all types. Some hordes are bigger than others but some of them, you will need help from friends.
 
 
 
MEET THE ZOMBIES

All zombies have their own characteristics. Some are faster and some are stronger. In all of the hordes you will find one or more bosses.

 

 

 

MULTIPLE WEAPONS TO CHOOSE FROM

All weapons can be customized with attachments that you can scavenge around the world. Each weapon has its own characteristics but with attachments you will make them slightly better.

 

SOME OF THE MANY WAYS TO MOVE AROUND

All vehicles will require maintenance to keep them running and fuel to keep them going. If you damage your vehicle or end up without fuel for it you will have to leave it and come back for it.

 

 

You can customize your vehicles with weapons and attachments in order to make them more resistant and powerful.

story:
Want to play the game before you decide to contribute? No problem!

Here is the link to our demo for the PC. This demo has only a few levels in it. Its purpose is to demonstrate the game’s unique mechanics and overall theme. The finished game will have many more puzzles than this. Please note that this is a tech demo and therefore does not represent the quality we expect the game to have at launch. The graphics, sound effects, and music in the final version will all have a major upgrade with your help. 

A USB game controller (such as a Mad Catz or Logitech gamepad) is required.

Click here to download the tech demo

Check out our Steam Greenlight page!

What is Transcend?

Transcend is the story of an average guy who is given the power to bring himself back from the dead and travel back in time. The story unfolds as the player guides the character through mind bending puzzles that utilize intuitive game mechanics that capitalize of the player's special powers.

Game Mechanics

  • Resurrection: By using an ancient artifact, the bones of an ancient wizard, the player has the ability to bring him/herself back from the dead. This is not merely a way to avoid death so as to make the player invincible to his his/her enemies. Far from it. Each puzzle in the game depends on the player's ability to die and come back from the dead. In each level the player will notice that some walls and platforms are transparent/ghostly. While the player is alive, he/she will be able to pass directly through these objects. But when the player dies, he/she collides with these ghostly objects while passing through the solid ones. Instead of being a punishment for failure, in this game, death becomes a means to an end.

  • Time Travel: The player also has the ability to travel back in time. Imagine if Marty McFly knew that, in the future, he would travel back in time and visit his past self. By knowing this ahead of time he would have been able to cooperate with his past self to accomplish what would otherwise be impossible. In Transcend, you will do just that. In levels that feature the time travel mechanic, the player will be called upon to complete the level once while anticipating what his/her future self will do, then again while cooperating with his/her past self. This mechanic is accomplished by recording the game pad inputs from the player and playing them back on a clone of the player. Such an approach allows for advanced game play by slightly altering the level as the player returns to it a second time. 

  • Colored Keys and Doors: Navigation through the world map is done in a unique way. Colored lines connect levels together indicating to the player which colored door he/she will have to enter in order to go to the desired level. The player will also have the option to combine two different primary colors of key and door in order to change the door's color to the required secondary color. For example, if the player sees that the next level he/she needs to navigate to is accessed along a purple line, the player will need to find a red key and bring it to a blue door in the previous level. See the example below.

For example, if the player sees that the next level he/she needs to navigate to is accessed along a purple line, the player will need to find a red key and bring it to a blue door in the previous level. See the example below. BudgetWe already have everything we need to finish this game except for time and money (which are pretty much the same thing!) If we are able to reach $150,000 we will be able to devote our full attention to this project without the added distraction of having to work at a job to put food on the table. This amount would allow us to set up a local office where we can work full time on this project. Our current goal, however, is more modest than that so we are hoping to exceed it. The team currently consists of two people, Brian and Chris. Brian Programs. Chris draws. They both design the game. This is the same set up that Team Meat had when they built Super Meat Boy and Polytron had when they built Fez. In both cases, however, the developers were working full time. If we are able to reach our modest goal of $60,000 but not $150,000, we will still be able to work on this project and bring it to completion, but we would be doing so in spite of the fact that we would not have removed our problem of having one of us only working part time.

story:
Hello my name is Dante and I am a 15 year old entrepreneur!

SSD is an idea that I came up with a couple of years ago. I have been working and perfecting it over that time. This app is very important to me because I told a good friend of mine before he died that I would build an app for him, and this is that app. I wan this app to be successful so I can start an application development company and build more apps! If you fund this project you will be helping my team and I immensely and we could never thank you enough!

SSD is game where the player draws their troops, as well as their stronghold depending on the game mode.

Stickman Stronghold Defense will have 5 levels with 5 waves from the Caveman time for free.

Caveman Levels

Players can then buy the paid version for $0.99 and then they can get the 5 waves per 10 levels from the Medieval time along with 5 additional Caveman levels along with the first 5 as well. 

They will also get an arcade and multiplayer mode in the paid version as well.

Medieval Levels


Arcade Mode

Arcade mode is where the player draws their stronghold and their soldiers, they can draw any soldier from caveman and medieval. They will be defending against the computer. They will get points for each wave they resist. They can also be attacking the computer and they get points for how fast they can take over the stronghold.

Multiplayer Mode

Multiplayer which is an offline/online mode where 2 players can play, one of them draws a stronghold and troops and the other draws troops to attack. There is also an online mode as well which is the same as the offline one just you are not sharing a screen for the multiplayer.

Between waves they can repair the walls.

The point of this game is for the player to fend off the enemy for each level. The player is defeated when enemy captures the leader of the stronghold or kills everyone inside, finalize this idea.The player moves on to the next wave after all the troops from that wave are dead. As each wave goes up in the free and the paid version the troops will increase by 5. If you can't understand everything you can ask me questions!

To fund this game we will need about $75,000. This money will be going towards building the app. $70,000 will be going towards the game and $5000 will be going towards advertising. This may seem like a lot but it will ensure that people are exposed to the app. I talked with a representative of Robots and Pencils (the application development company that will be building the app) and he said that a typical app costs about the same as what we need. If we do not reach the funding goal the money will go towards the app in the future once we come up with the funds. No matter what your money will go towards the app!
We already have an app if you would like to check it out: rabbitchase.webs.com.

We understand that their will be challenges along the way but we will get through them together!
If you have any questions or concerns please feel free to contact us: stickmanstrongholddefense@yahoo.ca
If you want to help in different ways you can tell your friends about us and any other way you can think of would be appreciated!
Thanks!

Arcade Mode
Arcade mode is where the player draws their stronghold
and their soldiers, they can draw any soldier from caveman and medieval. They will
be defending against the computer. They will get points for each wave they
resist. They can also be attacking the computer and they get points for how
fast they can take over the stronghold. 
Multiplayer
Mode
Multiplayer which is an offline/online mode where 2 players
can play, one of them draws a stronghold and troops and the other draws troops
to attack. There is also an online mode as well which is the same as the
offline one just you are not sharing a screen for the multiplayer. 
Between waves they can repair the walls.
The point of
this game is for the player to fend off the enemy for each level. The player is
defeated when enemy captures the leader of the stronghold or kills everyone
inside, finalize this idea.The player moves on to the next wave after all the troops from
that wave are dead. As each wave goes up in the free and the paid version the
troops will increase by 5. If you can't understand everything you can ask me
questions!
To fund this game we will need about $75,000. This money will be going towards building the app. $70,000 will be going towards the game and $5000 will be going towards advertising. This may seem like a lot but it will ensure that people are exposed to the app. I talked with a representative of Robots and Pencils (the application development company that will be building the app) and he said that a typical app costs about the same as what we need. If we do not reach the funding goal the money will go towards the app in the future once we come up with the funds. No matter what your money will go towards the app!

We already have an app if you would like to check it out: rabbitchase.webs.com.


We understand that their will be challenges along the way but we will get through them together!
If you have any questions or concerns please feel free to contact us: stickmanstrongholddefense@yahoo.ca
If you want to help in different ways you can tell your friends about us and any other way you can think of would be appreciated!
Thanks!

story:
Game Buffer

Optimizes your system for games by temporarily suspending unnecessary processes, individually or all at once, to focus resources on gaming performance. It analyzes your system and suggests courses of action for all processes and services & cleaning RAM, and intensifying CPU performance. Game Buffer makes it simpler to enjoy the latest games and take your experience to a new level. Game Buffer has 50 tweaks from network, cores unparked, system speed and system stability tweaks.

We Need Development Cash Flow

  • We need funding to make this software free for all users and no hidden adware like the one I model it after.
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

Little Helpers

We need your help to bringing to software to the world and making old computer come back alive.

  • Game Buffer speeds up older machines.
  • I spent 16 years learning all the flaws in Windows and offer my knowledge for free.
  • I spent over 200 hours making Game Buffer to what it is now.

Risks & Challenges

I have put all my time and effort in this program to make it happen and offer it all for free. 

  • Build a website with a large a data base to keep track of the users in needs $1500.
  • Build support chat within the clients for better management $1000.
  • Cash to pay for my network $500.
  • Hire customer support and moderators $2000. 
  • Cash for developer's $2000.

Offer Free Development Training

We will offer all our knowledge on the new website.

  • 24/7 Free Chat for Users.

story:
Content Update:

 Thank you for viewing my campaign for my Pieters Armory 80% Polymer Lower Receivers. I am currently using this crowd fund approach to hopefully bring my business up several levels from what it currently is.  My aim is to have several parts & accessories for guns made ready and available to the public. If you anything like me, then you also have a major passion for guns, the 2nd amendment, and gun owner privacy.

With these 80% Polymer Lower Receivers, they will provide privacy to gun owners who purchase them and build drill it out themselves. 80% Polymer Lower Receivers are considered a hunk of plastic by ATF and DOJ standards, so you do not need a waiting period to purchase them, nor do you need a background check or serial number.

I love the fact that this is a way for a Gun hobbyist to purchase, and build a gun hassle free without big brother breathing down your neck.  This is also a way for me to jumpstart my business, and provide this product to American citizens whom are law abiding.

My Goal is to build my company into something big, and offer innovative designs to the public in all aspects of the gun world. I do have artist and sculptures working on prototypes, along with some who are experienced in CAD and 3d printing. I do have a member who is working on apparel and prints as well.

With your help, This goal can be reached! If all you could do is contribute $1.00 ; that would still be a contribution that we did not have before. By spreading the word to other gun owners / gun lovers, it will bring the chances of this goal hitting the mark. Anything will help, and I will always be most greatful for any contributions of any kind.

I currently have 2 lower receivers left for anyone interested in purchasing for $40.00 + $5.95 shipping via USPS. This purchase will put you in the Research and Development where you can write reviews, post YouTube videos, and not to mention get free stuff for 12 months or possibly longer.


Website currently being developed 

http://www.PietersArmory.com

Thank you for viewing my Campaign,

Shon Pieters

story:
Who We Are

RouletteFair make up of a dedicated team of mathematicians and computer science experts, with great experience. RouletteFair team with depth of knowledge within the roulette gaming has experience working directly in the casinos and gambling industry for more than 10 years.

We have developed the innovative number prediction software with cutting-edge technology for winning in the roulette game with accuracy and over 75% win rate.

The software is based on deciphering Random Number Generators (RNG), deciphering algorithms, chaos theory, pattern matching, number triggering, relations within sequences of Pseudo-Random numbers, roulette bias and much more.

Until now we have achieved the following (visit our official website www.RouletteFair.com for more details):
  • RouletteFair software covers a wide range of roulette types including RNG electronic roulettes, live dealer roulettes and land based roulettes, suitable for any kind of players.
  • RouletteFair software can be used successfully on all popular casinos' software providers like Playtech, Microgaming, NetEnt, Real-time Gaming etc.
  • RouletteFair software offers a user-friendly interface.
    • No knowledge required
    • No technical or computer skills needed
  • RouletteFair software portability: instant unlimited 24/7 easy access through any PC/Tablet/Smart Phone to our software (no need to install anything on your PC).

What We Need & Your Rewards

We have created this campaign to improve and optimize the existing software (75+% win rate) in order to have win rate over 95% in any type of roulette game (electronic, live dealer).

Full amount of funding will be spent on the development & implementation of the software.

We want to reward the people that support us with amazing perks that no one else will ever get!
  • Use it before anyone else – everyone that contributes to this software is going to get access to the new software 7-15 days before it's available to general public.

  • Exclusive Content – access to a secret web page on our website where we will post insider information, tips, hints, and updates.

  • Exclusive Certificates – We’re going to launch certificates in this campaign that will NEVER be seen again. If you want the ultimate collector’s item, we’ll even sign them for you!

  • Name in our official video presentation - You'll be listed in the ending credits under "Special Thanks" in our official Roulette Fair video presentation.

  • Name in the Credits page on our WebSite – Yeah, it’s nice to be a part of it from a distance, but you need more than that. Get a special thanks in the web site's credits page,


The Impact

Why this project is valuable to you and to the world ?

Casino games and especially "Roulette" is an important part of the life of any modern person. Roulette is not only for fun, but a great way to make money. It's really possible to turn such a passion into a constant source of stable income. Just think about it.
Our aim is to help roulette players all over the world obtain highly consistent profits with minimum risk and low investment over long term basis.

Can't Contribute Right Now? You Can Still Help!

Sometimes you may have other priorities. Help us out by sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or Pinterest.

Bottom line, anything you can do is really appreciated!  We need all the help we can get.

story:
Presenting the 2015, 39 Twink Cup!

The aim of this event is to showcase the potential high-level gameplay the 39 XP-OFF bracket offers. Following the conclusion of the 19 Twink Cup, several teams have moved into the 39 bracket to repeat their success as well as new teams looking to make their own mark on the premading scene.

All dates will be provided once Blizzard announces release of Legion - approx after blizzcon November 6-7th.

Note: The 39 Twink Cup will occur before the release of Legion to ensure no major change in meta and to avoid the large hype of a new expansion.

Format (Arena's): Real double elimination - every game best of 5 - finals, first round BO7. If winning team loses then another round is done BO7.


Format (BG's): Real double elimination - every game best of 3 - finals, first round BO5. If winning team loses then another round is done BO3.

story:
About Einstein & The Honeybee

Introducing young naturalists and physicists to the fascinating world of bees, Einstein & the Honeybee inspires an interest in Apiology and Colony Collapse Disorder (CCD). Players explore the garden of Albert and Elsa Einstein as they work to pollinate flowers and rescue lost bees while avoiding predators, pesticides, and harmful mites. Players are able to use some of Einstein's discoveries to their advantage as they struggle to save the hive. The world of bees and physics has never been as fun and engaging as it is in Einstein's & the Honeybee, a game for players 8 and up.

The question you may be asking is, why is CCD important? Why have we created this game? The truth is, CCD is something that affects all of us. Honey bees are dying at an alarming rate. In 2015 42 percent of bee colonies in the United States died*. This is critical, especially when considering the fact that approximately one in three mouthfuls of food that we eat has been directly or indirectly affected by honey bees**. Not only that, but the economic value of crops in the United States that benefits from bee pollination is estimated to be 15 billion dollars a year***. Because of this, we here at Colmena strongly believe that educating and engaging people about the topic is essential to taking care of our communities. We hope that our game will help inspire those who play to learn more about CCD and honey bees, and that they take this knowledge to help create a better world. 

This game has been in the works since our first project bought us together, our book Einstein & The Honeybee: An Introduction to Game Design and Game Development (available to buy on Amazon). We are very excited to bring this game not only to you, the public, but to educators as well. This brings us to you and why you’re here. By donating and sharing our campaign you will help not only support our growing company, but you will also help spread awareness about CCD. Why is this important? Because every person who is aware of the issue is another person who can do something to affect change. Groups such as New York City Public Schools (River East Elementary), The Boys Club New York City, NYC BeeKeepers Association, El Puente Bushwick, and Picture the Homeless Reference Library will benefit from your generosity today. Your donation today will not only help these groups and others, but it will support our growing company dedicated to creating positive change in our communities and it will help support the bees! Remember, anything and everything helps. Thank you so much for your time and generosity.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We are looking to raise $17,550. That's a lot of money, and you may be wondering what exactly your donation is going to be used for. So let us break it down for you:
                    -$13,500 will go towards paying for the production of the game. That means paying our amazing designers and researchers for all of their hard work. Up until now they have not been paid, but have been happy just to work on something they feel so passionate about. They deserve to be paid for their hard work, and that's exactly what we plan to do. 
                   -$2,370 - the cost of making 100 physical copies of the game via. game crafter in order to donate our game to various groups/organizations.
                  -$1000 - the cost of distributing these games (postage, mailing supplies, etc.)
                  -$680 - the cost taken out by IndieGoGo if we raise all the money we hope to raise.
  • We have a lot of exciting perks for you! Firstly, every donor who pledges five dollars or more will be listed in a booklet that will be included in the game. For donations of $200 we will include a small advertisement of your choice in the booklet as well. We also have tote bags, t-shirts, coasters, our book about game design, and the game itself being offered as incentives. We have three high level incentives that we are excited to offer you. The first is a chance to play EATH with the the Colmena team and your very own copy of the game for $350. The second is the opportunity for the Colmena team to play test your game for $500, either in person or remotely depending on your location. And last but not least, for $1000 we will play test your game and you will also receive a copy of EATH, a copy of our book about game design, and an EATH tote bag. 
  • If we do not manage to reach our funding goal we will first use the money we did raise to pay our team that worked on creating this game, and then if there is anything left over we will order what games we can to donate. 

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks & challenges involved with making games like this. One of the biggest ones that inherently comes with the designing of games is whether or not it is actually playable (and enjoyable!). The second concern with creating games such as this one is whether or not they are actually educational. This is not the first game we have developed. We have designed and produced over a dozen games for Hostos Community College's Game-Framed Math & Science initiative which has been met with great success. Because of this and because of the extensive play testing that we have done with Einstein & The Honeybee, we feel confident in the success of this game.

There is also an inherent risk with relying on IndieGoGo from funding. This is our second IndieGoGo campaign, our last one was a complete success and we feel good about our chances of raising the money we need. This is a game and cause that we feel passionate about, and so we are willing to take this risk. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Every dollar counts, but if you find you cannot contribute financially to our campaign that does not mean that you can't still help. Whether or not you can donate today, sharing our page is an important way for our campaign to meet with success. There are a few ways that you can help to spread the word:

  • Share our campaign on all of your social media outlets - Facebook, Twitter, etc.
  • Write about our campaign on your blog
  • Spread news of our campaign by word of mouth - e-mail friends and family, or simply talk to them about it.
  • If you have access to a zine, magazine, newspaper, etc write about us!
And that's all there is to it! Thank you so much for taking the time to look at our IndieGoGo campaign, to donate, and/or to spread the word. We truly appreciate it!

story:
Notification: We are sorry to say that the campaign has been canceled and we will not receive orders or donations from now on. Thanks for your attention.

 

Hatashiai is an original 3D FTG game targeting to replicate realistic Sword Fighting (Kenjutsu), developed with Unreal 4 Engine. In Hatashiai, you take control of famous samurai/warriors skilled at different styles of melee combat techniques to experience their ways of fighting and learn about their stories and legends.


Literally, the Japanese word “Kenjutsu” means the method or technique of sword. While in fact, Kenjutsu is a complicated melee weapon combat system, including the effective guards, flexible footwork and efficient coordination of the whole body. By taking all these issues into consideration, we aim to make Hatashiai a serious sword fighting game, presenting how real melee combats between legendary masters would be like.

Summary

  • Planed platforms: PC (Win, via Steam)
  • Release Date: Q3, 2017 (early access on winter, 2016)

                                               

Our goal is to bring the Bushido Blade and Kengo fans back as well as new players in. So we would welcome all the following people to be our audience:

  • Bushido Blade and Kengo series fans longing for a remake or spiritual successor of those old classics
  • Players of fighting games that want something different but serious
  • Martial arts and melee weapon enthusiasts
  • People who have an interest in samurai, ninja or history

                                     

To best capture the quintessence of Kenjutsu, this game is designed to include the following features:

  • Cultural & Historical Accuracy

Includes at least eight famous Ryuha (shcool of Kenjutsu) with utterly different fighting styles. All skills and moves are actual techniques developed and used by the ancient Samurai/Warriors. All characters are legendary martial artists who have left glorious names in history.

　　

   


* Characters with weapons other than swords (e.g. spears, naginata or even harquebuss, etc.) will be added as non-controllable NPCs first, and afterwards made accessible to the players when their skills/moves are well balanced.


  • Pure physics based Sword Contact Detection

Physics based contact detection is introduced for all Kamae (guards/stances) and moves. Unlike many other games, one won't be able to press a single button to block most of his/her opponent's attacks anymore. To make effective defenses and seize advantages in a fight, players need to make proper moves according to his/her opponent's attacks all the time.

       


  • One-Hit Kill Fighting System

No life bar nor health point in this game! Similar to the Bushido Blade series, with a single hit one can disable or even kill his/her opponent. On the other hand, precise physics based contact detection of the weapon and the variety of balanced fighting skills will significantly enhance the viability of the fighters, preventing Hatashiai from becoming a boring seckilling game.

    


  • Weapon customization

Weapons can be customized in detail in Hatashiai. You can freely swap in and out each part of your weapon (e.g. blade, saya, tsuba, habaki, seppa, tsuka, etc.) Note that swapping parts is about more than just the looks, it can affect your performance in a combat in different ways.


  • Feudal japan-themed environments

Enjoy the beautiful scenery and stylized architectures of feudal Japan.

                                

Release version 1.0 will include the following modes:

Single-player

  • Story mode for at least 20 controllable characters
  • Practice mode in which you fight against AIs with real sword or non-lethal wooden sword

Local multi-player

  • 1P vs 2P mode

Online multi-player

  • 1 vs 1 mode

P.S. : Online multi-player modules enabling players to fight in field operations or castle siege tasks are also inside our future plan (as a future update after the game released).

 

 

                                 

Who we are

We are a small indie game develop team with two fixed members. Both of us are video game aficionados with long years of academic research backgrounds and martial art training experience. In order to make fantastic games, we have learned a complete skillsets associated with game producing, and we’ve been familiar with the Unreal Engine since UE3 (UDK). We have also got much real experience in project managing during our former careers. With our solid backgrounds, tons of reference materials and your enthusiastic support, we are very confident to deliver you a unique and fun-to-play sword fighting game. Below you can find a brief introduction of the team members and their duties in the project.

Team members

  • Maxi Stone  

I am a veteran Robotics researcher and martial art enthusiast. I have 9 years of martial art training experience, including Shinkage-ryu and Ittou-ryu Kenjyutsu, Iai-do, Hozoin-Ryu Sojutsu (art of spear) and Kyudo (Japanese Archery).
Being the Founder and Producer of project Hatashiai, I also work as Co-Lead Designer, AI Programmer, Level Designer, Rigger and Animator.

  • Rudel Stone

I’ve been a computer vision researcher for the past 8 years, with rich experience in computer graphics and programming. Besides, I have been engaged in martial art training for nearly 8 years, including Iai-do, Kendo, Japanese Ancient Kenjyutsu and Chinese Swordsmanship.
In this project, I work as Co-Lead Designer, Gameplay Programmer, Graphic Artist and Game Engine Engineer, Rigger and Animator.

                                                       

1. What platforms are planned for Hatashiai?
It is a high possibility that we will be able to make XBOX One and PS4 versions, while publishing on these platforms is subject to approval by the platform holders. For this Indiegogo campaign we only guarantee the PC version (via Steam) for backers.

2. Can I switch the in-game camera to other viewpoints?
Yes. In the demo video we only show you a 2.5D-like camera viewpoint, while in the final release we will enable the players to freely change the camera views through the controller. We are even considering supporting first person view or VR mode for fun.

3. What language versions do you plan?
We are currently creating the game in English. And the plan is to make Japanese, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese versions of the game as well.
story_txt:
Notification: We are sorry to say that the campaign has been canceled and we will not receive orders or donations from now on. Thanks for your attention.
 
 Hatashiai is an original 3D FTG game targeting
to replicate realistic Sword Fighting (Kenjutsu), developed with Unreal 4
Engine. In Hatashiai, you take control of famous samurai/warriors skilled at
different styles of melee combat techniques to experience their ways of
fighting and learn about their stories and legends.


Literally, the Japanese
word “Kenjutsu” means the method or technique of sword. While in fact, Kenjutsu
is a complicated melee weapon combat system, including the effective guards,
flexible footwork and efficient coordination of the whole body. By taking all
these issues into consideration, we aim to make Hatashiai a serious sword
fighting game, presenting how real melee combats between legendary masters
would be like.

Summary
Planed
platforms: PC (Win, via Steam)
Release
Date: Q3, 2017 (early access on winter, 2016)


                                                
Our goal is to
bring the Bushido Blade and Kengo fans back as well as new players in. So we
would welcome all the following people to be our audience:
Bushido Blade
and Kengo series fans longing for a remake or spiritual successor of those old
classics
Players of
fighting games that want something different but serious
Martial arts
and melee weapon enthusiasts
People who
have an interest in samurai, ninja or history
                                      To best capture
the quintessence of Kenjutsu, this game is designed to include the following
features: 

Cultural & Historical Accuracy 

Includes at least eight famous Ryuha (shcool of Kenjutsu) with utterly
different fighting styles. All skills and moves are actual techniques
developed and used by the ancient Samurai/Warriors. All characters are legendary
martial artists who have left glorious names in history.
　　
    

* Characters
with weapons other than swords (e.g. spears, naginata or even harquebuss, etc.)
will be added as non-controllable NPCs first, and afterwards made accessible to
the players when their skills/moves are well balanced.


Pure physics based Sword Contact Detection 

Physics based contact detection is introduced for all Kamae (guards/stances)
and moves. Unlike many other games, one won't be able to press a single button
to block most of his/her opponent's attacks anymore. To make effective defenses
and seize advantages in a fight, players need to make proper moves according to
his/her opponent's attacks all the time.
        
One-Hit Kill
Fighting System 

No life bar nor health point in this game! Similar to the Bushido Blade
series, with a single hit one can disable or even kill his/her opponent. On the
other hand, precise physics based contact detection of the weapon and the
variety of balanced fighting skills will significantly enhance the viability of
the fighters, preventing Hatashiai from becoming a boring seckilling game.

      


Weapon
customization
Weapons can be
customized in detail in Hatashiai. You can freely swap in and out each part of
your weapon (e.g. blade, saya, tsuba, habaki, seppa, tsuka, etc.) Note that
swapping parts is about more than just the looks, it can affect your
performance in a combat in different ways.


Feudal
japan-themed environments

Enjoy the beautiful scenery and stylized architectures of feudal Japan.

1.0 will include the following modes:

Single-player
Story mode
for at least 20 controllable characters
Practice mode
in which you fight against AIs with real sword or non-lethal wooden sword

multi-player 
1P vs 2P mode
Online
multi-player
1 vs 1 mode

 P.S. : Online multi-player modules enabling players to fight in field operations or castle
siege tasks are also inside our future plan (as a future update after the game released).

We are a small indie game develop team with two fixed members. Both of us are video game aficionados with long years of academic research backgrounds and martial art training experience. story:
PITCH-HIT:BASEBALL (Singleplayer) is available on STEAM for the HTC VIVE and Oculus

 

Why should you support this Multiplayer project?

  • You own a VR device and need more multiplayer games
  • Free Game = More Players
  • Because we live in the future and this is crazy!

We hope to raise $15K to support the development of our multi-player baseball game.  The majority of the funding will go to additional programmers, modelers, testing, and online hosting. We are offering some fun stuff like early-access to the single player game, baseball tees, custom avatar helmets, and more!  Have something you want to promote?  We're offering a one of the billboards inside our game as a perk!

 

CHALLENGES + PROGRESS REPORTS

Online networking and multiplayer interaction is the biggest programming hurdle at the moment. We are also focused on finding the best hosting solution for our experience with no latency and minimal delay.

PLAYER BOTS!  We're gonna need them. VR is getting bigger everyday.  But for the next year or so you might visit some pretty empty VR lobbies.  That's where these guys come in to help fill the positions.

Testing different locomotion techniques for hitters and outfielders.  Currently trying to find a middle ground with teleportation and other ways of "running."  Also have some fun ideas of mini-games the batting team can play while they kill the time.

We will release updates and progress report videos to our backers to keep everyone in the loop. We'll also ask for feedback from our backers about certain design decisions.

About Viewer Ready

We are a small startup that loves to play and develop in VR.  It could be mixed reality, augmented reality, passive 360, or VR games. We've usually got some sort of headset on.  

PITCH-HIT was originally an idea from a game jam for the HTC-VIVE.  HTC enjoyed the work and sent us a VIVE to continue development.

Want to Help

  • Post,Tweet or Youtube about this INDIEGOGO campaign
  • Talk about PITCH-HIT at your next gaming event

Thank you so much for the interest. Have a virtual day!
