story:
Choose your pilot, take control of a mech, and suit up with your choice of battle harness to create the ultimate combination of battlefield dominating warmachine.

Update 2! Check out VoH gameplay footage filmed during our testing. We found out some minor issues that are now being fixed. The launch date will be postponed until we have the fixes done and tested, stay tuned and support us on our journey!


Update 1! Take a look at the KV1-N Main Battle Mech gameplay, piloted by Kevin, the original go to driver of the K-Industries mech line.


Stay tuned for more gameplay vids from the other mechs in the game!


Create the trinity of war: the mech, pilot and suit. Tweak the abilities of each component, and create combinations to rule the battlefield. Void of Heroes is a combination of the mobile 3D online battle arena shooter game and our comic series sharing the same title. Void of Heroes game will be made available to Amazon Android, Google Play and iOS App store during 2015. The comic will be launched in the US by Cosmic Times in July. The comic and game share the same plot, characters and environments but function as stand alone products (comics: experience the past battles / game: take part to the current and future battles). The linkage between these two products is a redeem code reward system accessible by purchasing paperback comics that include the redeem codes. The collectible paperbacks are home delivered via Amazon internationally and they unlock unique in-game rewards. The system has been designed so that it's not necessary to purchase the comic (pay-to-win) since mostly the redeem campaigns provide cosmetic and game experience improvements, making the game more fun.

This campaign has been launched for speeding up the pace. The funding will be used for 1) product development, 2) starting up multiplayer servers and 3) adding a ton more content and mechs for you(and us) to play with. Your contribution will directly improve our mission to scale up the multiplayer back end by setting up a dedicated server infrastructure as well as enable us to quickly provide more multiplayer (PvP) and single player (PvE) content with semi-authoritative (PAAS) and continuing to server authoritative (IAAS) cloud based infra.

We are seeking a total of 100 000 Euros 1) for the server infrastructure and 2) further development of our multiplayer game. The core developers have 15 to 30 years experience on back end, client/server, testing & QA technologies and have developed similar systems before. We do not invest into user acquisition (UA) since we have partnered in relevant areas (US, Asia, and MENA region) to gain visibility (e.g. Comic Cons), comic purchases and game downloads (large scale partners).

In return for your contribution, in addition to our eternal gratitude and your name in the credits,  we have created a awesome selection of Perks that provide access to the servers you help to set up, collectible comics, merchandise and miniature models as well as unique in-game rewards! Check them out in more detail in the below images! We have the basic building blocks already in place, the first version with peer-to-peer multiplayer will be launched in July. -Updates to follow during the campaign...


Our campaign is all about bringing something we love to life. This is where you guys and gals come in. Our goal is to have the dedicated servers up and running by Christmas 2015, as well as fully fleshed out mech lines, to bring our vision of a strong arcady mech multiplayer system available. The Void of Heroes experience has everything that's needed of becoming a phenomenon, combining paperback comics and free to play online games. Void of Heroes has been developed by a six person core developer team including talent from comic book publishing, game design, programming and start-up development.

Jukka is a serial entrepreneur with Industrial- and strategic design masters degree, focusing mainly on 3D modeling, animation and front end programming (UI/UX). Jukka has a vast experience on product development and start ups.

Tapio has a creative background in industrial design, concept design, 3D and comics. Tapio is the lead Void of Heroes game and concept designer having extensive and competitive gaming background.

Topi has worked as a comic book artist in the comic industry for over 10 years and been involved in several published comics such as Punainen Kobra, Korkeajännitys and Aku Ankka (Finnish Donald Duck).

Jari has 30+ years back end programming, client & server experience from large (e.g. Tieto, Nokia, EDS) and smaller Finnish ISV companies.  In his free time, Jari brakes games into exel sheets...

Joni has 15+ years experience of testing & QA infrastructure and -programming from companies such as Qualcomm, AMD Finland, ATI Finland, Bitboys. Joni is also a heavy weight game cosumer.

Christian is a professional level programmer and game enthusiast, currently finishing his studies at Aalto University - Game development program.

3D graphics, VFX and gaming enthusiast for 20+ years. Participates in competitive gaming and closely follows the eSports scene. Has a Bachelors degree in IT and has completed a comprehensive training program in game development.

Our main challenge is to get dedicated servers running to upgrade our current peer to peer multiplayer system, and make the mulitplayer experience more solid and less prone to network quality variance, also allowing for server calculations of functions, lessening the load on the client end.  

Our secondary challenge is to push out enough content and playability for gamers to enjoy the game even more, which means more mechs, battle arenas, PvE content and overall optimization.

We made a quick demo video to show the meta game (as mentioned earlier, -Create the trinity of war: the mech, pilot and suit). The demo also shows that we combine mech- and human levels on the PvE front. Keep in mind that this video was made using a very early demo build that was made for testing the basic functionality of the game. A lot of polishing has happened since, also having focus on the multiplayer. -Similar features will still remain on the launch build of the game. -Stay tuned!


Spread the word, sounds the drums, yell out our message of joy in the form of f2p mech battles for all! 

What is Void of Heroes?

Void of Heroes is a comic series and free-to-play multiplayer online mech battle mobile game that puts you in control of dark future mechs, their pilots and more! Void of heroes features a highly customisable skill system based on three trees you can choose from to create the ultimate mix of combat prowess to defeat your enemies in team-based gameplay. Crush your enemies with the varied weapons available to you, and choose a mech that suits your gameplay to compete on the unforgiving battlegrounds deep underground. Void of Heroes also links paperback comics to mobile games. The comics include redeem codes that unlock unique campaign rewards in the game. -Here is a Previews World link to the first edition comic that is coming out in July published by our US partner Cosmic Times: Void of Heroes - Subterranean Dawn - Issue 1 of 4.

Who is developing Void of Heroes?

Void of Heroes is being developed by Tunnel Ground Inc, a Finnish startup company specialised in cross media entertainment, located in Espoo, Finland.

When will Void of Heroes launch?

Open testing will begin at the start of July 2015 with the release of the first areas of Void of Heroes. More info at www.voidofheroes.com. Progress updates will be released also on the campaign site.

What are the goals in Void of Heroes?

Your goal in Void of Heroes is to evolve your mechs and pilots into pinnacles of armoured fighting might and battle all that stand before you as you make your way to the surface of the world, the only place left that holds promise of a environment hospitable to humans. As you gain more resources through team battles and PvE content, you will find and unlock more vehicles, meet new characters, and gain access to increasingly more powerful weaponry, skills, mechs and other resources.

Will I be able to customise the Mechs and Pilots in Void of Heroes?

You’re responsible for the maintenance and upgrading of your vehicles, as well as customising skins and relevant upgrades. We might be adding equipment packs in the future. Stay tuned for more information.

What engine does Void of Heroes utilize?

VoH is built on the Unity engine. Unity offers a solid base for multiple platform release and a strong foundation for awesome visuals for mobile devices.

What are the recommended system requirements for Void of Heroes?

The baseline hardware is the iPhone 4s and Samsung galaxy 3, and devices with equivalent hardware.

What kind of Mechs, and other playable vehicles will be available in Void of Heroes?

Void of heroes is a sci-fi mech shooter, and will feature mechs, vehicles and monstrous creatures from the Void of Heroes comic series and more.

What kind of environments will be available for gamers in Void of Heroes?

We will continue to add new PvP maps based on the various areas in PvE, to represent the climb out of the darkness, so expect anything from battling inside huge coolant pipe filled massive machinery, to desolate high-rise futuristic suburban areas, to overgrown hydroponic gardens etc. Our goal is to keep the environments interesting and different, even with the gameplay being underground.

What type of controls will be used in Void of Heroes?

The standard controls are the normal console type controls for mobile, with an auto fire system to make Mobile gameplay more fluid. You can add a trigger to the screen if you do not want to use the auto fire. Possible Desktop releases will use the keyboard mouse configuration which is pretty much industry standard for most shooter games. Gamepad support will be featured at release or shortly after.

Can I play with friends in Void of Heroes?

Yes you can! Void of Heroes will have a teaming-up with friends system, and later a clan system will be added in for more organised grouping and battling.

What languages will Void of Heroes support?

Initial release will be in english, additional languages will be added ASAP.

How will vehicle/mech progress work in the game?

To access better equipment and more powerful mechs/vehicles, you will need to gain experience by participating in player versus player matches and playing through the single player campaign. This will mean that the most powerful machines will not be available at the beginning of the game.
More details of the progression system will be revealed in a future article.

What playable characters will the game feature?

Current plans is for Mechs, vehicles and some “bio-machines” and mech bio/machine hybrids. You can read the comics to get a forewarning of what’s coming! ;)

How many players will there be per team in the PvP system?

We are trying to get as many in as the minimum spec system will allow, we are looking at including up to 6 players per team.

What kind of rewards can we look forward to for teamwork in PvP and in general PvE content?

In PvP the focus is on teamwork to bring down enemy players. Vehicles are quite resilient, so it will take a few shots to take them down, so going alone will leave you at a disadvantage if you get caught out.
In PvE the rewards come from dealing with the environment and challenges presented therein, mostly in forms of enemy packs, wanderers and bosses. We are looking into a PvE co-op gameplay mode as well, which might get added in at a later stage.

Will vehicles have special abilities, or perks?

Every vehicle, every pilot and every suit a pilot wears comes with it’s own set of skills/ablities and stat bonuses. Playing with the combinations of these leads to a great variety of abilities, and when added to the different weapons available to the mechs and pilots, creates a truly unique playground for creating very interesting and powerful combinations.

How will mech variants be integrated into the game. Will they be in trees, or lines or how does it work? Can you upgrade directly to end tiers, or do you have to go through a set of vehicles?

In Void of Heroes, you have mech manufacturers and lines(though the end of the line is not always manufactured, but something that evolved…), and their mechs are set in tiered lines, so you choose a manufacturer, spend your earned experience and credits to research the tech, and then purchase the mechs, in order to be able to unlock the next one in the tree. There will be special vehicles outside of the trees, like specials from the comics, premium vehicles etc…

How I can receive important information about updates and offers etc by mail?

Sign up/subscribe for the newsletter for gamers, or check our Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Instagram, youtube or our site www.voidofheroes.com

 of Heroes is being developed by Tunnel Ground Inc, a Finnish startup 
company specialised in cross media entertainment, located in Espoo, 
Finland.When will Void of Heroes launch?Open testing will begin at the start of July 2015 with the release of the first areas of Void of Heroes. More info at www.voidofheroes.com. Progress updates will be released also on the campaign site.What are the goals in Void of Heroes?Your
 goal in Void of Heroes is to evolve your mechs and pilots into 
pinnacles of armoured fighting might and battle all that stand before 
you as you make your way to the surface of the world, the only place 
left that holds promise of a environment hospitable to humans. As you 
gain more resources through team battles and PvE content, you will find 
and unlock more vehicles, meet new characters, and gain access to 
increasingly more powerful weaponry, skills, mechs and other resources. Will I be able to customise the Mechs and Pilots in Void of Heroes?You’re
 responsible for the maintenance and upgrading of your vehicles, as well
 as customising skins and relevant upgrades. We might be adding 
equipment packs in the future. Stay tuned for more information.What engine does Void of Heroes utilize?VoH
 is built on the Unity engine. Unity offers a solid base for multiple 
platform release and a strong foundation for awesome visuals for mobile 
devices. What are the recommended system requirements for Void of Heroes?The baseline hardware is the iPhone 4s and Samsung galaxy 3, and devices with equivalent hardware. What kind of Mechs, and other playable vehicles will be available in Void of Heroes?Void
 of heroes is a sci-fi mech shooter, and will feature mechs, vehicles 
and monstrous creatures from the Void of Heroes comic series and more. What kind of environments will be available for gamers in Void of Heroes?We
 will continue to add new PvP maps based on the various areas in PvE, to
 represent the climb out of the darkness, so expect anything from 
battling inside huge coolant pipe filled massive machinery, to desolate 
high-rise futuristic suburban areas, to overgrown hydroponic gardens 
etc. Our goal is to keep the environments interesting and different, 
even with the gameplay being underground. What type of controls will be used in Void of Heroes?The
 standard controls are the normal console type controls for mobile, with
 an auto fire system to make Mobile gameplay more fluid. You can add a 
trigger to the screen if you do not want to use the auto fire. Possible 
Desktop releases will use the keyboard mouse configuration which is 
pretty much industry standard for most shooter games. Gamepad support 
will be featured at release or shortly after. Can I play with friends in Void of Heroes?Yes
 you can! Void of Heroes will have a teaming-up with friends system, and
 later a clan system will be added in for more organised grouping and 
battling. What languages will Void of Heroes support?Initial release will be in english, additional languages will be added ASAP.How will vehicle/mech progress work in the game?To
 access better equipment and more powerful mechs/vehicles, you will need
 to gain experience by participating in player versus player matches and
 playing through the single player campaign. This will mean that the 
most powerful machines will not be available at the beginning of the 
game. More details of the progression system will be revealed in a future article. What playable characters will the game feature?Current
 plans is for Mechs, vehicles and some “bio-machines” and mech 
bio/machine hybrids. You can read the comics to get a forewarning of 
what’s coming! ;) How many players will there be per team in the PvP system?We are trying to get as many in as the minimum spec system will allow, we are looking at including up to 6 players per team. What kind of rewards can we look forward to for teamwork in PvP and in general PvE content? In
 PvP the focus is on teamwork to bring down enemy players. Vehicles are 
quite resilient, so it will take a few shots to take them down, so going
 alone will leave you at a disadvantage if you get caught out. In 
PvE the rewards come from dealing with the environment and challenges 
presented therein, mostly in forms of enemy packs, wanderers and bosses.
 We are looking into a PvE co-op gameplay mode as well, which might get 
added in at a later stage. Will vehicles have special abilities, or perks?Every
 vehicle, every pilot and every suit a pilot wears comes with it’s own 
set of skills/ablities and stat bonuses. Playing with the combinations 
of these leads to a great variety of abilities, and when added to the 
different weapons available to the mechs and pilots, creates a truly 
unique playground for creating very interesting and powerful 
combinations.How will mech variants be integrated into the game.
 Will they be in trees, or lines or how does it work? Can you upgrade 
directly to end tiers, or do you have to go through a set of vehicles?In
 Void of Heroes, you have mech manufacturers and lines(though the end of
 the line is not always manufactured, but something that evolved…), and 
their mechs are set in tiered lines, so you choose a manufacturer, spend
 your earned experience and credits to research the tech, and then 
purchase the mechs, in order to be able to unlock the next one in the 
tree. There will be special vehicles outside of the trees, like specials
 from the comics, premium vehicles etc…How I can receive important information about updates and offers etc by mail?Sign up/subscribe for the newsletter for gamers, or check our Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Instagram, youtube or our site www.voidofheroes.com

story:
Welcome to the world of raft! 


You survived a crash of a cargo ship and stranded on a deserted island. 
In order to survive the local wilderness you must explore the island, gather resources, craft items and build a shelter. 

With our blueprint system you can create a multitude of items and buildings. 
See something of interest on the island? Draw it on the map with our map system. Each player is 
able to draw his or her own maps and playing coop with friends? You can share your own drawn map! 

The whole idea about the game Raft is exploration, you are not stuck on one island. 
Build a raft to sail the vast ocean and find other island, because resources are limited on every island 
and who knows what you will find on your journey? 
Each island is different in many ways. 


features: 

Gather materials: 

  • Chop down tree’s 
  • Mine rock’s 
  • Refine material's

Gather food like: 
  • Coconuts 
  • Bananas 
  • Fish 
  • Meat 
  • Berries 
  • Mango's 
  • Kiwi's 
  • eggs


Item crafting: 
  • tools 
  • clothing 
  • food 
  • buildings 
  • weapons


Inventory: 
  • Gain new recipes by experimenting with the discovery panel. 
  • Equip cloths and armor in the equipment panel. 
  • See game information and player created diary in the log panel. 
  • Draw your own idea on how the world looks, in the map panel. 
  • Craft countless items in the crafting panel.


Levels 
  • Craft items, gather resources, discover new items to level up your character.

Building 
  • Craft blueprints. 
  • Place blueprints. 
  • Add materials to the blueprint to complete the building. 
  • Remove resources or remove the intire blueprint.

Animals 
  • Each animal will have there own npc System to give them more animal specific behaviour. 
  • Chickens 
  • Pig 
  • Goat 
  • Boar 
  • Rabbit 
  • Fox 
  • Stag 
  • Wolf 
  • Lion 
  • Duck 
  • Eagle 
  • Seagull 
  • sparrow 
  • Fish 
  • flies 
  • Crab 
  • Shark 
  • Whale

Weapons 
  • Spear 
  • Knife 
  • Bow and arrow 
  • club 
  • shank

Terrain/Environment 
  • Day / Night cycle 
  • Fire will scorch the ground below it, like a fireplace. 
  • Walking over plants will crush the terrain below it, leaveing the plants damaged. 
  • Track animals by looking for footprints. 
  • Carefull when talking to your friends online as the animals can hear you talk.

Weather 
  • Rain 
  • Storm 
  • Sunny 
  • Foggy

Islands 
  • Generated islands 
  • Different terrain on other islands. 
  • Different trees/plants on other islands. 
  • Unique items can be found on other islands.

Mulityplayer 
  • 4 player co-op 
  • Password protected 
  • Server browser 
  • Server admin commands 
  • Server moderators 
  • Voice chat limited to area 
  • Text Chat public/private 
  • PvP or PvE options 
  • Changeable player spawn locations to random or fixed.

Singleplayer 
  • Export to mulityplayer option 
  • Auto save option 
  • Multible saved worlds 
  • Delete world option 
  • Export world file, share it online. 
  • God mode

Game options 
  • Rebind keys. 
  • Ingame options menus 
  • Video options 
  • Sound options 
  • Network options 
  • Language options

Support 
  • Multi Language 
  • Mod support

And more to come!


Who are we?

Lead game developer, Perry J

Concept Designer, Dennis V

3D Artist, Contmike

As we are only a team of 3, this will not stop use trying to make a good game.
We will make a game that people enjoy, like how we think all games should be. 

RoadMap?

    Game Progress
    Video options In development
    Audio options in development
    Network options In development
    Debug options In development
    Key rebing options In development
    Nature Progress
    Food plants Concept ready
    Cut down tree's Alpha tested
    Harvest plants Concept ready
    Terrain texture changes in development
    Mine rocks in development
    Pick-up rocks around the island Alpha tested
    Terrain properties Concept ready
    Weather Progress
    Day/Night cycle Alpha tested
    Rain/Storm weather Alpha tested
    Wet terrain Concept ready
    Cold/Warm System Concept ready
    Use of shadows to cold down Concept ready
    Food Progress
    Basic food system Alpha tested
    More food types Concept ready
    Rotting food Concept ready
    Bottled water/store food Concept ready
    Building Progress
    Blueprint basic building Alpha tested
    Drag and drop blueprint items to complete the building Alpha tested
    Physics based building system Alpha tested
    Snap/rotate options Alpha tested
    More building types Concept ready
    Water buildings Alpha tested
    Tools like water collection Concept ready
    Animal traps Concept ready
    Use of only parts of items in development
    Multiple items in 1 blueprint Alpha tested
    Return/remove items from buildings Alpha tested
    Server Progress
    Mod support Concept ready
    Password protected servers in development
    Advanced server options Concept ready
    Fast server joining in development
    Server admin commands in development
    Server moderators Concept ready
    Spawn options Concept ready
    PvP/PvE server options Concept ready
    Dedicated server software Concept ready
    Singleplayer Progress
    Mod support in development
    Multple savegame worlds Concept ready
    To server convert Concept ready
    Delete save option in development
    Monsters Progress
    Insects in development
    Small of large animals Concept ready
    Humans Concept ready
    Fish in development
    Crafting Progress
    Simple crafting menu, no grid. Alpha tested
    Experience based crafting system in development
    Discover new recipes system in development
    Map Progress
    Discover world system (Not saying more about it :P) in development
    Equipment Progress
    Armor types Concept ready
    Armor duraction Concept ready
    Player Progress
    Stats based of armor, levels and other stuff in development
    Die/Respawn Concept ready
    Level system Concept ready
    Combat system Concept ready
    Own home / sleep system Concept ready
    Own back system or shared Concept ready
    Other interface stuff Progress
    Player created logs Concept ready
    Game created logs Alpha tested
    Simple / Advanced Debug screen overlay in development
    Water Progress
    Swimming system Concept ready
    Underwater system Concept ready
    Underwater plants Concept ready
    Fish in development
    Islands Progress
    Random generated islands Concept ready
    Small/big/large islands Concept ready
    Model Progress
    Better dude model (Now only place-holder) in development
    Girl dude model in development
    More buildings in development
    More items in development

What We Need?

We are now working on the game for several months and our budget is running low.
We need your help to get the most out of the game.

What we will do with it:

  • 500,-     For the VR support
  • 600,-     Audio and equipment ( licenses )
  • 750,-     For testing environment equipment
  • 500,-     Game optimization
  • 200,-     For advertising
  • 850,-     Mac and Linux support
  • 1000,-  Additionalunforeseen cost
  • 600,-     Private server and website
  • 2800,-   25 - 40 Item models
  • 1000,-   For 15 or more building models

Other ways you can help?

Follow us on Facebook .
Subscribe to our Youtube channel.
Visit the website www.raftthegame.com
Follow the game on Steam Greenlight.

And remember?

Even if we don't get the goal, we will stil work on the game, only the process will be slower
Feel free to ask question about the game, we are happy to answer them.

story:
We at the Toronto Hearthstone Community have been growing over the past 2 years: with 18 Fireside Gatherings and visits from Hotform, Disguised Toast, and Kripparrian - we're ready to take that big leap forward!

Our community will be at Good Game Con, Toronto's largest esports event on May 21-22 at the Queen Elizabeth Building.  It features a $3,000 Open Hearthstone Tournament with guest hosts Kripparrian and Hotform.

Trump has agreed to join us at Good Game Con if we can accommodate for his visit.  This will be his first ever visit to not just Toronto, but Canada - and we'd love to show him how awesome our community and country is!  We need to hit $3,000 of funding to provide for his trip here.

He will be available for meet & greets during the weekend, and will participate in some fun programming for the crowd with our other guests!

You can find more information regard Good Game Con here.
Facebook event page.

We have a solid Toronto Hearthstone community I love to death, and if we were large enough to justify absorbing the costs of his trip I would have confirmed him in a heartbeat.  But the truth is we're aren't there yet to rely on ticket sales for the trip of someone that big. 

I know we will get there someday at our rate of growth, and Trump's visit should spark that.  Consider this an investment in our future!

We asked Trump to take the 40 hour drive to Toronto and sleep in his car, but he wasn't enthusiastic about it.  So we need to accommodate his flight, hotel, and the amount of time we take him away from streaming.  To make things even tougher, $1 Canadian is only worth $0.75 in the USA due to our lousy economy.

We have 2 stretch goals:

$4,000 - Trump will play a blindfolded arena run on stage and on stream.  
$5,000 - Trump will participate in a ramen eating contest on stage and on stream.  

Money raised from the stretch goals will go into acquiring better equipment for our stream and production, which will also be used for future Fireside Gatherings!

Anything above $5,000 we will put 100% (minus reward costs) into the prize pool.  

For those interested in the event, we're not just about Hearthstone!  We also feature:

$5: GOOD GAME CON WRISTBAND

Get a Good Game Con wristband and a huge thank you from the GGC team!

$30: SPECIAL LIMITED EDITION TSHIRT 

All 3 guests plus Canada's favorite piece of Toast beautifully drawn on this limited edition t-shirt. The shirt will not be available after Good Game Con.  Includes Good Game Con wristband.  You can choose to pick up this shirt at the event, or have it shipped.

$150: POUTINE DATE WITH TRUMP  

Do you enjoy eating poutine? Do you want a private meet & greet with Trump? .. or better yet, spend some private time (30 mins) with Trump eating poutine! Ask him for Hearthstone advice, or maybe explain to him why Hockey is the best game on Earth. Talk about whatever you'd like - it's your time with one of Hearthstone's greatest treasure!

Notes: 
- You can bring 2 lucky friends to join the poutine date.
- Includes 1 special edition t-shirt & Good Game Con wristband

$150: PRIVATE MEET & GREET WITH KRIPPARRIAN

Don't skip the Kripp with a 30 minute private meet & greet with the man himself. 

Notes: 
- You can bring 2 lucky friends to join the meet & greet.
- Includes 1 limited edition t-shirt & Good Game Con wristband
- Does not include Good Game Con admission.


$150: POUTINE DATE WITH HOTFORM 

Sit down and eat poutine with Canada's best player for 30 minutes, the perfect chance to Interrogate him for his secrets in winning. 

Notes: 
- You can bring 2 lucky friends to join the poutine date.
- Includes 1 limited edition t-shirt & Good Game Con wristband
- Does not include Good Game Con admission.

$200: CAST A GAME WITH TRUMP 

Are you ready for the big stage? Ever dreamed of casting a game live on Twitch with thousands of people watching? What could possibly go wrong? Uh... we mean no pressure, but with this reward you get to cast a match with Trump and another co-caster. 

Notes: 
- Includes 1 limited edition t-shirt & Good Game Con wristband 
- Game to cast will be on the Saturday 
- Does not include Good Game Con admission.

$200: CAST A GAME WITH KRIPPARRIAN 

Are you ready for the big stage? Ever dreamed of casting a game live on Twitch with thousands of people watching? What could possibly go wrong? Uh... we mean no pressure, but with this reward you get to cast a match with Kripparrian and another co-caster. 

Notes: 
- Includes 1 limited edition t-shirt & Good Game Con wristband
- Game to cast will be on the Saturday
- Does not include Good Game Con admission.

story:
Wormhole City is a single-player sci-fi adventure game with top-down platforming, puzzle and action elements developed in Unreal Engine 4 for PC. Control vehicles and gain power-ups through exploration and defeating enemies while making game-changing decisions throughout your story.

Compatible with 64-bit Windows PC users right now. Click here!

 Through faster-than-light technology, nations strive to colonize the universe while diverging factions struggle for control and freedom throughout space. Play as space forces, space pirates, and alien races and uncover their motivations in Wormhole City.




  • Story Elements- Absorb the setting and a cast of character backstories through visual and audio expositions and in-game events from our professional voice actors and level designs.
  • Variety of Different Skills- Guide NPCs in battle, summon your own allies and use special abilities to defeat a range of different enemies while unlocking new skills during your progress throughout the game.
  •  Platforming- Climb, slide, jump, and shoot your way to solving puzzles and challenges with different characters and scenarios.
  • Vehicle Gameplay- Use land, sea, and space vehicles to help complete your missions.
  • Immersive Atmosphere- Explore Wormhole City's history, experience different weather patterns and make story decisions as you progress throughout the game.
  • Voice Acting and Music- We plan to implement additional music, audio diaries and narration with NPCs to help add more immersion to our game.




    • Zenrok Studios LLC is a company founded in 2014 by two professional game designers with specialties in graphic design, programming, teaching, and music. We have years of experience with Game Maker, Unity and now Unreal Engine 4, Zenrok Studios' ultimate aim is to make games that are educational and appealing to all ages. Before creating Zenrok Studios we volunteered and have been commissioned independently in South Korea and the United States to help employers with artistic assets, game design, community management and marketing. 

    Wormhole City is a passion project inspired by a culmination of our favorite science fiction literature and media. In our current financial situation, we are having exponentially less time to develop this project to focus on making ends meet in our personal lives. Achieving our funding goal would allow us to have the time to complete Wormhole City with extra 3d art, animation, programming and content features.  

    By funding Wormhole City you are giving the opportunity and freedom for independent designers to pursue a chance in making their passions a full-time career. Extra funding will go towards programmers, voice actors and artists who have helped or want to expand on Wormhole City. All contributors and backers will be recognized in Wormhole City's in-game credits. Wormhole City will launch on PC with Mac and Linux releases shortly after. With our stretch goals we hope to bring Wormhole City to consoles in the near future.

    While designing Wormhole City, we have been involved with a development team of an upcoming asset to the Unreal 4 marketplace and achieved in creating a first-person demo with Oculus Rift compatible gameplay, available to download here:

    https://www.sendspace.com/pro/dl/hq2c5a


     Wormhole City is planned to release on PC, Mac, and Linux by late 2016. All additional funds will go towards the development, coding, design, art, audio, reward fulfillment, and quality assurance of our game along with the following:





    Risks & Challenges

    Having developed most of the programming foundation ourselves, the next most time-consuming aspects will be level design in our game while maintaining an efficient workflow to expand on gameplay mechanics and added nuances. With a release date in December 2016, we are confident we can deliver a polished and satisfying adventure game with features that will be unique in the current gaming market today.

    As a small studio of two local game designers, we are self-sufficient in many vital aspects of video game development. With your help we hope to commission extra artists and programmers who want to contribute to Wormhole City and decrease the production time needed in creating engaging stories, environments, events and interactions. We aim to make Wormhole City enjoyable and inspiring for a Teen audience.





    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please share our project through social media and contact us at @zenrok_studios ! Thank you for your time.
story_txt:
Wormhole City is a single-player sci-fi adventure game with top-down platforming, puzzle and action elements developed in Unreal Engine 4 for PC. Control vehicles and gain power-ups through exploration and defeating enemies while making game-changing decisions throughout your story.


Compatible with 64-bit Windows PC users right now. Click here!
 Through faster-than-light technology, nations strive to colonize the universe while diverging factions struggle for control and freedom throughout space. Play as space forces, space pirates, and alien races and uncover their motivations in Wormhole City.










Story Elements- Absorb the setting and a cast of character backstories through visual and audio expositions and in-game events from our professional voice actors and level designs.

Variety of Different Skills- Guide NPCs in battle, summon your own allies and use special abilities to defeat a range of different enemies while unlocking new skills during your progress throughout the game.
 Platforming- Climb, slide, jump, and shoot your way to solving puzzles and challenges with different characters and scenarios.

Vehicle Gameplay- Use land, sea, and space vehicles to help complete your missions.

Immersive Atmosphere- Explore Wormhole City's history, experience different weather patterns and make story decisions as you progress throughout the game.

Voice Acting and Music- We plan to implement additional music, audio diaries and narration with NPCs to help add more immersion to our game.

By funding Wormhole City you are giving the opportunity and freedom for independent designers to pursue a chance in making their passions a full-time career. Extra funding will go towards programmers, voice actors and artists who have helped or want to expand on Wormhole City. All contributors and backers will be recognized in Wormhole City's in-game credits. Wormhole City will launch on PC with Mac and Linux releases shortly after.  Wormhole City is planned to release on PC, Mac, and Linux by late 2016. All additional funds will go towards the development, coding, design, art, audio, reward fulfillment, and quality assurance of our game along with the following:

story:
Who we are


A couple of friends (us above) came together and tried to play a social in the same room that was fun, easy to use, didn't require a lot of waiting for our turn, and pieces couldn't get lost. So for the past year working with artist from all over, and mulling over the best logic we could conceive, GetPLayeD is less than 5 months from completion. It could be even sooner than that with your help!

The lead developer is Tchaikawsky Samuels- A former US Marine and software developer. He has one other app on the market (Pistol Instructor Marksmanship Program 2 a.k.a. PIMP2)  that he created while serving as a marksmanship instructor in Quantico, Virginia. The rest of the team are all close friends and family that have already put in thousands of hours combined over the past year to getting the game where it is now.

We (the team developing the app that's us in the image! Hi!) love having senseless fun! But when looking for games to play they were either pointless or time consuming to setup. Even outright boring or too senseless (like, lower your IQ senseless) to play. 

So we started on an epic journey imagining what the perfect game would be like. A game that gives you what you want, make you and everyone happy, get to know you and the people you hang out with, and when played together offers an amazing experience that would keep us coming back for more. 

Sooooooo..... we came up with over 900 things that we love to all do together and some crazier things that we would like to do if the stars were aligned with a special someone. Then painstakingly worked out the logic for not letting a bunch of time go before it's a single player's turn again, by intelligently picking other players to share their turn with.  Finally we considered that what some people think is crazy other may think is boring so we figured out a way to break the game up into different "difficulty" levels :) Finally The name GetPLayeD, why not have a game that knows more than the players and their desires and fears? Then have it use all that information to coordinate the most amazing time ever. The more you play the better your experience gets. That where our secret sauce comes in so it not just random silly things that someone would have done, just not that person that happened to get it. Whaalaaa. after  a few dry runs playing an excel based version we found ourselves hooked as we replaced lame task and introduced new ones, For drinkers the A.I. will do its very best to keep you and the rest of your drinking buddies "in the zone" not tired or throwing up :/ Young Adult Tested & Even mother approved we can't wait to share hat we have with everyone.

So if we are so close, why do we need your help? Because it's really expensive to afford a server, paying artist, developers, software licenses, musicians, lawyers, copyrights, and the list goes on and on. We are tapping into the fun loving community out there to help bring this masterpiece in the making to real whole world. So please pick one of the options below...

What We Need & What You Get


Breaking it down:

We are only focusing on only paying the developer. We tried cover all cost in a previous campaign and we are pretty sure the cost startled everyone. So now that we have an agreement and start/end date we are giving this another go.

Inside of the game we use credits to monetize it. For contributing to this fundraiser you will receive up to 10x the number of credits you would have otherwise received by buying them in the game. Just make sure to sign up with the same e-mail address that you use to identify yourself with INDIEGOGO.  If that fails, fear not. You can always e-mail us at admin@GetPLayedApp.com so we can resolve whatever issues.

One other perk! As we tweak and create a fully functioning version in excel, we will share an Excel based beta versions with some of you :) It's like you're part of our team so we may as well treat you like a team member.

If we do not reach our entire goal the funds will cover whatever portion of the development cost they can. We planned on doing it alone and are committed to its completion no matter what.

The Impact

Your contribution helps bring our product to the market on time. It will be submitted to the Apple, Android markets.

The role we all play is contributing to having fun with friends and our mobile device in the same room!!!!! Mind blowing. No one has to act busy on their fun anymore. They are busy, with everyone in the room :)

The lead developer made (Pistol Instructor Marksmanship Program 2 a.k.a. PIMP2) on his down time while serving on active duty working, and going to school full time, while raising 3 kids. Now as a civilian with a 9-5, he's got this.

I guess we are doing this all with the hope that the pastime of board games can be reinvented. We want to say goodbye to our phones being a distraction during quality time, yet instead an outlet to one heck of a good time :)

Risks & Challenges


There are a few hurdles being faced. Such as hiring the right developers, completing the insane logic necessary to manage all the variables in play that has made it take so long to get to this point. 

We have been and will continue to solve the math and logic problems that stand in our way. Tchaikawsky is a Lean Six Sigma Black Belt (fancy way of saying, "really good at using statistics to make things work well"). He is a developer. He studied art for a year at the Art Institute of Washington and was a Marine that partied in Japan and NYC for his excusable 20's. If there was ever a man suited for managing and contributing to the talent necessary to make this happen, He is our man. Likewise, the team as shown artistically in the image above is diverse and fun loving. We have a lot of new and interesting challenges planned for everyone.

We have a logic tree that list all of the task we have left to complete. If there comes an issue too difficult for anyone to solve we hire help using freelancers and contractors.

Other Ways You Can Help


For some of you that can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Please share a link to our website www.GetPLayeDApp.com having the newest product on the market has a host of its own challenges. We have to build up a reputation and a brand. With your single act of sharing, it can have exponential results! 

Please use the Indiegogo share tools! We can't wait to share this experience with all of you.

story: Omni Geneius Games
story_txt: Omni Geneius Games

story:
FireWalk

We envision a compelling game with the eloquence to appreciate your intelligence. Gone are the days of $60 video games, get the best for much less with Mythril Interactive.

This game is a first person multiplayer shooter game that we want to be heavly graphical and fun, but unlike most of our competitors who charge an outrages $60 for a video game we have a much cheaper idea in mind.

Why such a low cost?

Well, let's face it, no matter how bad the economic environment is, entertainment is key. The real question you should be asking is.....why am I paying so much for so little from other developers? Very few people are doing good in this economy yet we still enjoy games and playing with friends. Games are the link to friends. That should not cost so much.

What We Need

In short, financial assistance with up front capital so we can use pre-built designs. This also enables us to take measures to even make the audio so striking, just like live ammo.

In short we need some starter money to at least release a BETA on any market.

The money is going to be used for buying pre-built designs so that the project does not take half a year to release, this applies also for paying for our audio files as we want this game to be as realistic as possible.

The Impact

A team of 5 Students of video game development want to change the world, one game at a time! Not only will this fund our education, but we would like to mentor talent that would not otherwise be able to afford an education of this marketable skill. The more games that sell, the more we can help the next generation to do even more spectacular things!

I along with 4 collage students who are there to become a video game developer need the help of the community, if/when this game sells it'll help tremendously with the students and their schooling.

Risks & Challenges

The risk is not doing this. Behold the challenges before us, and make preparations for improvement for our Future. If we don't, who will? We believe the rewards much outweighs any risk. No reason why we can't have fun in the meantime. We love your ideas! Nothing is too small. If you see room for improvement, we need to know. We can make your great game idea into your great game! Working together can only improve our intelligence.

For the most part the biggest risk is the game does not do well, but event 99 cent video games sell, with that and other factors we believe that the reward much out weighs the risk.

Our biggest challenge is marketing, we have considered many different game engines but still short on idea's so feel free to give any.

story:
Short Summary

We already created and programmed online computer game and called it Gladiators of Colosseum. This game boasts with these key features:

  • Truly free to play game (you can tell us whether we succeeded)
  • Online gladiator game with robust item system
  • Development guided by the community (suggesting and voting on new features)
  • RPG/Rogue-lite gladiator system with multiple progression routes:
    • Leveling
    • Training
    • Spending skill points
    • Equipping items
 

What We Need

Most of the game development is finished, but here are the areas we need the funding for:

  • Art (mainly for gladiators and monsters)
  • Server costs (unless we want distributed servers)
  • Future development 
  • Steam client (with juicy steam achievements, trading cards and possibly steam inventory items)
  • Potential monthly tournaments with real-world prizes(game copies or steam/other console currency)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In case you can’t help us financially, there are few other ways you can help us: 

  • You can spread the word through social medias (facebook/twitter/reddit/etc)
  • You can offer us your artistic/designing skills and earn a little money on the side.

story:
A Quick Introduction:

Aquamare is a Platform anime style game project using the Unreal Engine. Developed for the PC and Mac platforms, featuring amazing 3-D characters with a great story. Discover a wonderful world with characters like Nayda, our main character, who is kind but she has a short temper and can get very angry at times and make some really bad decisions.

 

What The Story is About,

Nayda is a mermaid  that lives on a trapped reef. Having lived in the shelter of the reef for a very long time, she feels the need to look for her "kind". And now she finally understands that she must become strong in order to leave the shelter. While living in the shelter she "finally" learned about her kind and her birthplace...Atlantis.

 

Demo and Greenlight:

 

 

 

Credentials:

The Unreal Engine is a very powerful game development tool. We are using the Unreal Engine to make our game .

Blender is a 3-D modeling software that we use on the daily basis. We use blender to make most of our assets .

 

So What is AquaMare?


We are working on a new type of gaming experience combining 2 different type of game genre. Imagine a fuse with Katamari and Assassins Creed with a GREAT story. Our goal is to have this game released on Steam...we will also have an option for you to have a normal profile background on Steam and also one of those cool custom animated backgrounds as well.

 

Meet The Team:

1.- Tirso H. Project Manager.

2.- Roberto H. Project Manager.

3.- Miranda S. Modeler and Graphic Design.

4.- Salvador M. Modeler.

5.- Rodrigo N. Graphic Design.

6.- Santiago M. Music and Public Relations.

7.- Ricardo T. Promotion strategy.



Get to know the Characters:

1.- Nayda, 

A mermaid with a big imagination but a very short temper. There is a struggle inside of her...good vs. evil. She will generally be kind except when put into danger. Her "monster" side can emerge and cause mayhem to the player .

 

2.- Skeptic Eye,

A funny villain full of jokes and puns about eyes. In secret he tests Nayda all the time to develop her skills. ***But there is also "The Skeptic Eye Skepticism" that Nayda has about Skeptic Eye, but it will help her to grow in both being able to hone her skills, in both behavior and interaction and to be able to advance in the harder levels, but most of all to help her make it home.***

3.- Bluewatt,

Some sort of seafox with mermaid like features. Bluewatt is the only friend Nayda has known for a long time in the reef. Bluewatt is a character linked to hard work, chivalry and a developers satirical comparison. He likes Nayda and believes in her good nature, but worries of her "monster" side.

 

4.- Aquaneko,

Any catfish should have the chance for a good home and coral to sharpen its claws. Aquaneko lives in the reef and has a big family in the ocean. He knows all the secret caves to exit the hidden reef. He will have good stories and some other tales the more Nayda and him get along.

 

5.- Syrup,

She is some kind of feminine medusa with a really short term "fish" memory. Nadya considers her to be a good friend even though Syrup never seems to remember her.

 

Plot,

 

The story unfolds by keeping Nayda on her good side while clearing the levels. She must eat fish to gain weight and to grow in size, she must reach a certain size to escape the reef. There is a big fish blocking the only exit and Nayda can't use any of the secret passages that Aquanekos uses, so she must defeat the gigantic sea tormentor to finally escape.

 

Feeling,

 

The theme will be a quite relaxing and cheerful underwater style. There will be twists to it when Nadya gets mad and attacks the player. So by making mistakes in the game the mood can change from cheerful to quite dark and tense.

 

Games included on Rewards:

 

 

Rewards:

 

 

Stretched Goals:

Why the Founding?

Looking at things in more detail :

 

  • The resources will be well spent into making better models and animations. The coding is also a big expense especially if we want to get better mechanics into the game. Those elements really make a big difference for a better quality gaming experiences.
  • The more funding, the more we can work on details like, artificial intelligence for enemies and more quests.
  • Consider each pack carefully, you could end up developing something with us that could be of great use later .
  • If we don't reach our goal most likely the game will be much shorter. Also we believe in NOT having to sacrifice quality over quantity. 

 

Impact,

In short, we have a team that together has more than 10 years of experience. We have worked on smaller games before but nothing as big as this.

  • This project opens a new path for development and we would love to share it with you!
  • The first campaign is ALWAYS the hardest. We have made other campaigns on different sites.
  • Your help will make the difference!

 

Risks & Challenges,

Up to this point our risks are low. We have all of the hardest elements working and that has our spirits high.

  • The complicated movement scripts are 100% finished.
  • We have 100% of the music finished.
  • The first level is 100% complete.
  • Coding is done for first levels and there are no bugs.
  • We have a wide selection of enemies and can add intelligence to them .

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate you can also help us by getting the word out on Steam and Facebook, we value that also and it could get you the game for free as well. Here is our official account.

  • Join our Browith Developers group:  http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Browith.
  • Add me as a friend on steam: http://steamcommunity.com/id/browith/.
  • Watch our youtube channels: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClk26Q8x44U42IsqGFTeSgg  

**And please do not fret  if you cannot join our game campaign we still hope for high chance of success.

*** I do regret not being more supportive with Undertale when it was on this stage.

A Quick Introduction:
Aquamare is a Platform anime style game project using the Unreal Engine. Developed for the PC and Mac platforms, featuring amazing 3-D characters with a great story. Discover a wonderful world with characters like Nayda, our main character, who is kind but she has a short temper and can get very angry at times and make some really bad decisions.
 
What The Story is About,

Nayda is a mermaid  that lives on a trapped reef. Having lived in the shelter of the reef for a very long time, she feels the need to look for her "kind". And now she finally understands that she must become strong in order to leave the shelter. While living in the shelter she "finally" learned about her kind and her birthplace...Atlantis.
 
Demo and Greenlight:

 

 
 
Credentials:

The Unreal Engine is a very powerful game development tool. We are using the Unreal Engine to make our game .

Blender is a 3-D modeling software that we use on the daily basis. We use blender to make most of our assets .
 
So What is AquaMare?

We are working on a new type of gaming experience combining 2 different type of game genre. Imagine a fuse with Katamari and Assassins Creed with a GREAT story. Our goal is to have this game released on Steam...we will also have an option for you to have a normal profile background on Steam and also one of those cool custom animated backgrounds as well.
 
Meet The Team:
1.- Tirso H. Project Manager.
2.- Roberto H. Project Manager.
3.- Miranda S. Modeler and Graphic Design.
4.- Salvador M. Modeler.
5.- Rodrigo N. Graphic Design.
6.- Santiago M. Music and Public Relations.
7.- Ricardo T. Promotion strategy.
Get to know the Characters:
1.- Nayda, 
A mermaid with a big imagination but a very short temper. There is a struggle inside of her...good vs. evil. She will generally be kind except when put into danger. Her "monster" side can emerge and cause mayhem to the player .

 
2.- Skeptic Eye,
A funny villain full of jokes and puns about eyes. In secret he tests Nayda all the time to develop her skills. ***But there is also "The Skeptic Eye Skepticism" that Nayda has about Skeptic Eye, but it will help her to grow in both being able to hone her skills, in both behavior and interaction and to be able to advance in the harder levels, but most of all to help her make it home.***

3.- Bluewatt,
Some sort of seafox with mermaid like features. Bluewatt is the only friend Nayda has known for a long time in the reef. Bluewatt is a character linked to hard work, chivalry and a developers satirical comparison. He likes Nayda and believes in her good nature, but worries of her "monster" side.
 
4.- Aquaneko,
Any catfish should have the chance for a good home and coral to sharpen its claws. Aquaneko lives in the reef and has a big family in the ocean. He knows all the secret caves to exit the hidden reef. He will have good stories and some other tales the more Nayda and him get along.
 
5.- Syrup,
She is some kind of feminine medusa with a really short term "fish" memory. Nadya considers her to be a good friend even though Syrup never seems to remember her.
 
Plot,

 
The story unfolds by keeping Nayda on her good side while clearing the levels. She must eat fish to gain weight and to grow in size, she must reach a certain size to escape the reef. There is a big fish blocking the only exit and Nayda can't use any of the secret passages that Aquanekos uses, so she must defeat the gigantic sea tormentor to finally escape.
 
Feeling,

 
The theme will be a quite relaxing and cheerful underwater style. There will be twists to it when Nadya gets mad and attacks the player. So by making mistakes in the game the mood can change from cheerful to quite dark and tense.
 
Games included on Rewards:





 
 
Rewards:


 
 
Stretched Goals:










Why the Founding?
Looking at things in more detail :

 

The resources will be well spent into making better models and animations. The coding is also a big expense especially if we want to get better mechanics into the game. Those elements really make a big difference for a better quality gaming experiences.
The more funding, the more we can work on details like, artificial intelligence for enemies and more quests.
Consider each pack carefully, you could end up developing something with us that could be of great use later .
If we don't reach our goal most likely the game will be much shorter. Also we believe in NOT having to sacrifice quality over quantity. 


 
Impact,
In short, we have a team that together has more than 10 years of experience. We have worked on smaller games before but nothing as big as this.

This project opens a new path for development and we would love to share it with you!
The first campaign is ALWAYS the hardest. We have made other campaigns on different sites.
Your help will make the difference!



 
Risks & Challenges,

Up to this point our risks are low. We have all of the hardest elements working and that has our spirits high.

The complicated movement scripts are 100% finished.
We have 100% of the music finished.
The first level is 100% complete.

Coding is done for first levels and there are no bugs.
We have a wide selection of enemies and can add intelligence to them .


 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't donate you can also help us by getting the word out on Steam and Facebook, we value that also and it could get you the game for free as well. Here is our official account.


Join our Browith Developers group:  http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Browith.
Add me as a friend on steam: http://steamcommunity.com/id/browith/.
Watch our youtube channels: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClk26Q8x44U42IsqGFTeSgg   


**And please do not fret  if you cannot join our game campaign we still hope for high chance of success.*** I do regret not being more supportive with Undertale when it was on this stage.

story:
About Anointed Game

Welcome to the Indiegogo campaign for Anointed: Chronicles of Laftu: a "whack-a-mole" style video game based on the challenges of Laftu; a teenager who discovers the ultimate power present in the pages of the Bible, and uses his newly found authority and positivity to tackle all the challenges confronting him his community. Laftu’s adventure begins at Asie; his remote hometown in West Africa which is riddled with poverty, disease and terror. He soon realizes that through faith in the word of God which gives him courage to confront the challenges in his community, he is able to conquer all evil.

 

 

Anointed: Chronicles of Laftu relies on a fun and quality gameplay allied with scripture affirmation; ”Touch not my anointed, do my prophet no harm” (1 Chronicles 16:22). The mechanics are very simple; just tap/ click on an emerging enemy as fast as you can to repel them. Put on the whole armor of God (Ephesians 6:11) and stand as Laftu against evil. Equip protective gear such as the Shield of Faith and Belt of Truth. Attack your enemies with the words contained in the Bible which show as a ray of bright yellow light.

What We Need

Anointed has been one of the most fun times of our lives! After several months of bootstrapping by our studio, we released  a functional beta version of Anointed: Chronicles of Laftu in October 2017 on Google and IOS stores. Since then, we've been lucky enough to have our game featured on Pulse, Africanews, Everything Digital, and more!

This crowdfunding will help us to get this game across the finish line!  With your generous support we can complete the development, improve the art, publishing and other game components needed to officially launch Anointed to backers in June 2018 and others in July 2018. With your backing, together we can create an incredible mobile, social and web experience where families all over the world can enjoy Christian games – this release will be available for iOS, Android devices, Mac, Windows and Facebook. We would be truly grateful for your support - and we have great rewards to give out too. Please see below. What are you waiting for? Let's #PlayAnointed.

How will this work?

We know that asking for money for a Mobile game is a big "ask," so we are trying to give you as much as we can back, by releasing our games for free and offering lots of cool stuff.  This is kind of like you giving to us, and we give back to you; or paying forward.  Another way to think of it is that you are paying a discounted price for something you wanted anyway, and we're throwing in some extra gifts to say thank you for your help.  Here is the chart of perks you can get when you contribute:

Laftu

The story surrounds a teenage boy called Laftu and his sister who grew up in a foster home in a remote town called Asie. Short of confidence and in a sticky situation, Laftu is visited by an Angel who echoes the promises contained in the Holy Bible and this Angel becomes Laftu's guide throughout this adventure. This enables Laftu to see deeper into the power contained in the Holy Bible which he uses to summon powerful and exciting boosters to repel his enemies. Over the course of the adventure, Laftu’s sister will be introduced; categories of this Indiegogo campaign will give backers the opportunity of naming Laftu’s sister and creating new characters.

Weapons & Boosters

The primary weapon is the Bible. It emits bright rays of light used to repel the evil ones. It is also used to summon various boosters and power-ups via Angels .

Villains

We can all agree that the world will be a better place to live without vices such as: bullies, terrorists, diseases and poverty. It is important to reiterate to children and adults that prayers and positive thoughts and actions will help tackle and limit the effect of these vices on families and communities all over the world.The upcoming game release will include 3 main villains which include: Poverty, Disease and Bully. Our stretch goals will include additional villains like Terror and Sky Dragon; however, as part of our community, please suggest other suitable villains for this project.

52% - Development and Support Costs - We have some amazing artists and developers on our team and you are going to love the look, gameplay and the music in our game. Our engineers are seasoned industry professionals, dedicated to creative coding. They have done a fantastic job, and created a stunning game and you will appreciate the massive amount of effort we spent creating this game. Also, the QA team literally play the game from start to finish many, many times; collecting bugs to fix, and recommendations on balance.

20% - Marketing & Outreach Costs  - We really are passionate about the message behind Anointed and feel that while you guys play, enjoy and share this game; other people in communities around the world should also play and enjoy this game.

20% - Rewards - We have happily made promises to reward every backer of our game project. However, these items are unique items that will require detailed production, packaging and shipping.

8% - Crowdfunding Cost - We will happily pay Indiegogo for this campaign and manage the project with integrity.

Our goal is utilize our small and dedicated team to bring a level of sophistication to the creation and distribution of exciting Christian mobile content. It is our aim to entertain Christian families and spread the gospel all over the world. We hope to assist Christian parents and guardians train up their wards with edifying content. To create Anointed, we constantly carry out high quality Bible research and review to ensure that our content doesn’t lead its consumers astray from the teachings of Jesus Christ.

Below are the guys that truly make things happen:

  • Yinka  - Project Manager / Writer / Customer Service Rep / Book Keeper
  • Oluwaseye  - Lead Engineer
  • Martin - Illustrator
  • Tayo - Web engineer
  • Raymond - Junior Engineer
  • Ayoola - Sound Engineer.

If you are wondering what items you will receive for helping us finish our games (we probably should have told you this first)

We've had a blast designing material rewards to contain things we imagine would interest you, and we have some leads to ensure that anything we ship to you will meet our standards.

Here are the perks on offer:

Our artists have created hi resolution screensavers and wallpapers showing the creative process and giving you a glimpse into the Anointed in-game characters. You may also get printed version of these screensavers as wallpapers for your home.

Our team includes a talented music composer who has created awesome soundtracks that play in the background of our game. You get full versions of these gospel worship instrumentals that will soothe you and help you meditate.

Laftu’s adventure begins at Asie; his remote hometown in West Africa. The Asie climate suits Laftu in ways inexpiable; it listens to his fierce footsteps, the clicking of his shoes against its dirty pavements early in the morning. Asie saw him smile ear to ear until the villains arrived. Map of Asie is the game map for Anointed: Chronicles of Laftu, backers will receive printed versions of the map.

This cool adhesive art sticker fit on your cellphone, laptop, car bumper, refrigerator and other surfaces. You'll get a pack of 6 which means you can share these cool stickers with friends.

Your recognition is always rewarded; therefore, as a perk, you will be listed as a backer of this project on our website and other platforms.

A beautiful digital book showing the several in-game characters and events, this also doubles as a personal notepad. Your notepad will be specially issued in your name and signed off by Laftu.

Our character sequences fit so well on colorfully designed t shirts, these are available in many sizes, designs and colours (your choice).

The Danshiki is an essential trendy street wear that needs to reside in your wardrobe. This is a classic earthy t-shirt with African print and patterns. Laftu wears a yellow Danshiki for most parts of the game #BeLikeLaftu

Many ideas grow better when transplanted into another mind than the one where they sprang up. What will you name Laftu's sister? This perk earns you the right to name this character and others..

Ever wanted to make your mark on gaming history, and have thousand of people on Facebook, Web and Mobile play a game with you as a character? Digital immortality awaits you as our skilled artists will convert your approved* provided photograph into an in-game cartoon star!  Your digital self will help thousands of players play the game.

When Anointed: Chronicles of Laftu is finally released, we want you name up in lights as one of the project contributors. Your full name will be included in the credits on all platforms.

You have given this project a lot and to show appreciation for your contribution, you name will be included as one of the Executive Producers for Anointed: Chronicles of Laftu.

A detailed look into the cool rewards

 

Reward Categories

Two dollars gets you the full Anointed game before others + an e- post card from Laftu, thanking you for your donation. You’ll also get 9 pearls (in-game currency)

Ten bucks gets you the full Anointed game before others + Cool Anointed screensavers for all your devices + 18 pearls (in-game currency) an e- post card from Laftu, thanking you for your donation.

With a little bit bigger gift you can get our gratitude in the full Anointed game + 2 official Anointed soundtracks + 18 pearls (in-game currency) + Cool Anointed screensavers. You’ll also get an e- post card from Laftu, thanking you for your donation.

Your fifty dollar donation earns you the following perks. Get the full Anointed game + Printed Map of Asie + 18 pearls (in-game currency) + Cool Anointed screensaver + 2 official Anointed soundtracks and an e- post card from Laftu, thanking you for your donation.

With seventy dollars, you get so much more. Get the full Anointed game + a pack of 6 cool stickers + Printed Map of Asie + 18 pearls (in-game currency) + Cool Anointed screensaver + 2 official Anointed soundtracks and an e- post card from Laftu, thanking you for your donation.

A gift of a hundred bucks changes everything. Get Anointed game + Anointed story notepad / jotter + a pack of 6 cool stickers + Printed Map of Asie + 18 pearls (in-game currency) + Cool Anointed printed posters + 2 official Anointed soundtracks and a post card from Laftu, thanking you for your donation.

Your donation of One hundred and fifty dollars gets you the following perks: Full Anointed game  + Your pick from an array of t-shirts + Anointed story notepad + a pack of 6 cool stickers + Printed Map of Asie + 18 pearls (in-game currency) + Cool Anointed printed posters + 2 official Anointed soundtracks and a printed post card from Laftu, thanking you for your donation.

Your donation of Two hundred and fifty dollars gets you these amazing perks: Full Anointed game  + Laftu's Danshiki + your pick from an array of t-shirts + Cool Anointed printed posters + Anointed story notepad + a pack of 9 cool stickers + Printed Map of Asie + all the perks in the above grade.

Your gift of Five hundred dollars gets you these amazing perks: Full Anointed game  + Anointed Contributor Credits + Branded Cuddle Pillows + Laftu's Danshiki + your pick from an array of t-shirts + Anointed story notepad + a pack of 9 cool stickers + all the perks in the above grade.

Your donation of a thousand dollars moves us closer to our goal; therefore, you these amazing perks: Full Anointed game  + Anointed Producer Credits + A special Tote containing + Branded Cuddle Pillows + both of Laftu's Danshiki + all t-shirts from our array + Anointed story notepad + a pack of 12 cool stickers + all the perks in the above and other items.

This is exclusive to one backer only. Your donation of one thousand five hundred dollars gives you the exclusive right to name a lead female character in our game, you also get these amazing perks: Full Anointed game  + Anointed Producer Credits + A special Tote containing  all the perks above and other items.

Be our guardian angel to bring this project to life. Your gift of two thousand five hundred dollars gives you the right have a game character created in your likeness. This character will be illustrated to mirror the picture you provide to us. You can also name the character and supply the audio effects for your character. You also get a tote containing all the items above.

Stretch Goals

We would like to keep Anointed: Chronicles of Laftu growing an to make sure that the message reaches as many adults and kids as much as possible; so here is what we are planning to do if we manage to exceed our initial goal to aid Laftu on his adventure.

$12,500 – Game will be available on PC (Mac and Windows) + 1 Year free Manna for all backers.

Manna is a daily in-game gift that provides players with Pearls (in-game currency) which are used to purchase boosters.

$18,000 - 30 new levels, New Characters on mobile and PC versions.

$25,000 – Translations to French, Spanish, and any other 2 languages chosen by community.

$42,000 – Distribution of devices, game, posters and t-shirts to 5 local high schools and 5 local orphanages + 100 customized  stickers for every backer's orphanage of choice + goals above.

Risks & Challenges

The risks and challenges to this project are minimal as the game is 65% complete and with your help, we are on target for a September 2018 release date (Stretch goals will be handled in follow up releases) .

We hope everything goes according to plan without any hiccups, but in reality we cannot plan for every contingency. There are certain factors that could get in the way of progress (e.g international shipping issues, device testing). However, our goal is to handle any issues, should they arise in a professional manner by sending out daily messages via the Indiegogo updates thread. We believe in 100% transparency and you guys deserve nothing less. We at Yinola intend to keep every backer, fan and supporter informed by providing updates on a regular and timely manner.

What exactly can i do to help?

Even if this type of game is not your thing, why not contribute to the campaign? You will be aiding the distribution of this gospel project to kids and individuals all over the world.
If you cannot or simply do not like games at all, don't worry...we love you anyway. But please help us spread the word and share this project with all your friends on Facebook, Twitter and via email.

Thank you for reading until the end!
